Entries.Introduction: Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.#$e#It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.$9
Entries.Resort_Entering: I hope a mermaid visits the beach.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.
Entries.Resort_Leaving_2: Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.
Entries.Resort_Shore: The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?#$e#Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways.$h
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.#$e#I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Entries.Resort_Umbrella_2: Hey @, want to build a sand castle with me?#$e#Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!$h
Entries.Resort_Umbrella_3: Hey @, you think you could build a raft?#$e#I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.
Entries.Resort_Wander: An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.#$e#Quick, get me a shovel!#$e#Relax, I'm just kidding.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!$h
Entries.Resort: Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...$s#$b#And I brought my sword and everything...$s
Entries.danceRejection: That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry.
Entries.divorced: What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!$a
Entries.secondChance_Girls: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$s
Entries.breakUp: Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...$s#$b#I guess we weren't really a good match...$s
Entries.Mon: Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?
Entries.Mon2: Oh, hi!#$e#Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone.
Entries.Tue: Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.$s#$e#I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?$a
Entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$s#$e#I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just cannot understand my point of view. Weren't they ever young?
Entries.Wed: Hey. Sorry in advance if I say anything rude. I didn't get much sleep last night.#$e#What do you want?
Entries.Thu: #$1 Abigail1#Oh no, I think my Dad's going to cook dinner tonight...$s#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$u
Entries.Fri: Wow, I just realized it's Friday. $u#$e#Sometimes I totally lose track of time.
Entries.Fri2: We're all going to hang out in the saloon this evening. It's kind of like a friday tradition, I guess.
Entries.Sat: The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.$h#$e#I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.
Entries.Sun: Oh man... I've been pushing off my homework all weekend. Looks like I'll be pulling another all-nighter...$s
Entries.Sun2: I wonder what would happen if I spent all night in the graveyard?#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, What do you think happens to us after we die?#$r 17 0 Sun_17#I have no idea.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#We come back as spooky ghosts.#$r 17 0 Sun_17#We go to Heaven.#$r 18 0 Sun_17#Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.#$r 17 30 Sun_nothing#Nothing. We just cease to exist.
Entries.Sun_old: $p 17#I guess you think nothing would happen, right?$u|Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!
Entries.Sun_nothing: You know, that wouldn't be so bad.$8
Entries.Wed2: Oh, hi @. Taking a break from your work?#$e#Me too. Oh! Nothing physical... just some online classes I'm taking.
Entries.Tue4: Hi, I'm glad to see you.$h#$e#I want to take my mind off things for a while... how is your day going?
Entries.Sat6: You came all this way to visit me? That's nice.$h#$e#So have you been exploring the mountain caves at all?#$e#Interesting. I'd like to go there myself one of these days.$l
Entries.Mon8: ...Oh, @! Hi.$h#$e#Want to hang out for a while? Here! Let me read your palm. *giggle* $h
Entries.Thu10: Hi.$l#$e#Do you feel like everything seems unreal lately?$l#$b#Not in a bad way, though.$h
Entries.Fri6: The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.#$e#It's better to be like them, isn't it?
Entries.Event_VideoGame_Yes: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.$h
Entries.Event_VideoGame_No: Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...$s
Entries.Event_Grave1: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave2: Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave4: Really? That's surprising.$8#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Rain_2: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.
Entries.Event_Tragic_1: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...$s
Entries.Event_Tragic_3: I would feel better if I could believe that...#$b#But I don't.$s
Entries.Event_Cave_2: I guess when you have something to lose, it's normal to be afraid...$l
Entries.summer_1: Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.#$e#The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.
Entries.summer_Mon: My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy.
Entries.summer_Tue: The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.$u
Entries.summer_Wed: Have you decorated your house at all? That's what I'd be doing if I had a house.
Entries.summer_6: I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.#$e#Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore.
Entries.summer_Thu: If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there.
Entries.summer_Thu4: Ew, I hope I don't get a tan this summer.$s
Entries.summer_Fri: I kind of wish I had a cat. Unfortunately, my Dad is allergic to pretty much everything.
Entries.summer_Sat: I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*
Entries.summer_Sun: Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... pretend you just won a free vacation. Where would you go?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall
Entries.summer_Sun_old: $p 25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbors someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.$h
Entries.Sun_25: Huh. I think that would get old fast.
Entries.summer_Wed2: I would love to live in an old farmhouse like you.#$b#The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There's something special about an old building, isn't there?
Entries.summer_Tue4: You're an interesting guy, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h^You're an interesting lady, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h
Entries.summer_Sat6: I'm actually enjoying myself this summer.$h#$e#It's funny how quickly one's outlook can change.
Entries.summer_Mon8: I used to think Pelican Town was kinda drab, but lately I'm starting to love some things about it.$h
Entries.summer_Thu10: Wow, you look nice today.#$e#I mean, that summer air is really good for the complexion, isn't it?... heh...$l
Entries.summer_Fri10: Do you ever get lonely on your farm?
Entries.fall_1: Ah... Fall's here!$h#$e#I was getting so tired of summer.
Entries.fall_Mon: I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.
Entries.fall_Tue: $d joja#I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.|Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!$h
Entries.fall_Wed: I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.$h#$e#The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.
Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.fall_Sat: $d cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
Entries.fall_Sun: Hmm... what should I do tonight?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Dye it black.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Why not blonde?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#How about bubblegum pink?#$r 28 0 Sun_28#I like your hair just the way it is!
Entries.fall_Sun_old: $p 27#I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.|Yes? What is it?
Entries.Sun_27: I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?#$e#I'll think about it.
Entries.Sun_28: Of course that's what you'd say.$u
Entries.Sun_WildColor: You're always good for a laugh.$h
Entries.fall_Wed2: Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?#$e#Save one for me!$h
Entries.fall_Tue4: I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$8
Entries.fall_Sat6: Hi.$h#$e#Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?
Entries.fall_Mon8: You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...#$e#But how would that ever happen? *chuckle*$l
Entries.fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$h
Entries.fall_Fri6: I wish the season lasted a little longer.$8#$e#When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again.
Entries.fall_Fri10: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.$l#$e#@, what are your plans for the future?
Entries.winter_1: Well, fall is over...$s#$e#But I like winter, too!$h
Entries.winter_Mon: It's just too cold to go outside much.#$e#But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?
Entries.winter_Wed: Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?
Entries.spring_12: I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?
Entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...$s
Entries.winter_7: I'm looking forward to making a snow man tomorrow.
Entries.fall_26: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.$h
Entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
Entries.summer_27: You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
Entries.winter_24: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: Another year is almost over.#$e#It goes by so fast, doesn't it?$s
Entries.winter_Fri: One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
Entries.winter_Sat: It's the weekend!#$e#That means I can play twice as many video games.$h#$e#Bye.
Entries.winter_Sun: Oh, hello.#$q 29/30 winter_Sun_old#I made these two drawings. What do you think?#$r 29 20 Sun_29#I like the jungle island and the tiger.#$r 30 5 Sun_30#I like the orc with the battleaxe.#$r 29 -50 Sun_Bad#I don't like either of them.
Entries.winter_Sun_old: $p 29#Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.$s|Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!$h
Entries.Sun_29: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
Entries.Sun_30: I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.
Entries.Sun_Bad: Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!$s
Entries.winter_Wed2: Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.#$e#As long as I'm not changing, of course!
Entries.winter_Tue4: It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share.$h
Entries.winter_Sat6: I've been daydreaming a lot lately...#$e#Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well...$u#$b#...It's a secret.$h
Entries.winter_Thu10: Another year is almost over...#$b#But this was a really good year, don't you think?$h
Entries.winter_Wed6: It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.#$e#And that means you can hang out with me more often!$h
Entries.winter_Fri10: @, there's something I want to tell you...#$e#It's just... um... well... your boots! They, uh...look really clean... *gulp*#$e#That's all... *sigh*$s

Introduction.0: Oh, itu benar... Aku mendengar ada seseorang yang baru saja pindah ke kebun lama.#$e#Sungguh, itu sedikit disayangkan. Aku selalu menikmati menjelajahi kebun tak ter-urus itu.$9

Resort_Entering.0: Kuharap ada duyung yang mengunjungi pantai.

Resort_Leaving.0: Aku akan minta pada Willy untuk melewati daerah indah saat pulang nanti.

Resort_Leaving_2.0: Mungkin kita bisa melihat monster laut saat pulang nanti.

Resort_Shore.0: Pantainya bagus, tapi membuatku cepat bosan. Aku lebih senang menjelajahi hutan gelap atau gunung merapi!

Resort_Shore_2.0: Hmm, apakah aku bisa membawa tikus percobaanku secara diam-diam?#$e#Sepertinya tidak, Lagipula David tidak bisa berenang.$h

Resort_Umbrella.0: Kulitku sangat mudah terbakar. Jadi aku hanya akan berada di bawah payung.#$e#Aku suka berteduh dibawah bayangan. Sinar matahari membuatku pusing.

Resort_Umbrella_2.0: Hey @, ingin membuat kastil pasir denganku?#$e#Hmmm, sepertinya gua pasir akan lebih keren!$h

Resort_Umbrella_3.0: Hey @, apa kau bisa membangun rakit?#$e#Aku melihat beberapa pulau saat perjalanan kesini dan aku ingin mengunjunginya.

Resort_Wander.0: Pulau besar seperti ini pasti menyembunyikan harta karun.#$e#Cepat, beri aku sekop!#$e#Tenang, aku hanya bercanda.$h

Resort_Bar.0: Gus memberiku minuman segar berwarna ungu, seperti warna rambutku. Rasanya enak sekali!$h

Resort.0: Payah... Willy melarang kita keluar dari pantai...$s#$b#Padahal aku sudah membawa pedang dan alat-alat lain...$s

danceRejection.0: Aku tersanjung... tapi maaf, aku harus berkata tidak.

divorced.0: Apa yang kau lakukan disini? Tolong tinggalkan aku sendirian!$a

secondChance_Girls.0: *Hahh~*... Aku tidak bisa marah terus padamu, @. Kita lupakan saja masalah ini.$s

breakUp.0: Oh... Ak... Aku mengerti. Kau hanya menganggapku sebagai teman...$s#$b#Kurasa kita memang bukan pasangan yang serasi...$s

Mon.0: Oh, hai. Istirahat dari pekerjaan?

Mon2.0: Oh, hai!#$e#Apa kau pernah pergi ke kuburan? Itu tempat yang tenang untuk menghabiskan waktu sendirian.

Tue.0: Ugh... Persaanku lagi gak enak.$s#$e#Aku bilang persaanku lagi gak enak.... apa mau mu?$a

Tue2.0: ...*Hahh~*...$s#$e#Aku tau orang tuaku bermaksud baik, tapi kadang-kadang mereka tidak dapat mengerti aku. Apakah mereka tidak pernah muda?

Wed.0: Hai. Maaf jika perkataanku menyebalkan. Aku tidak tidur semalam.#$e#Apa mau mu?

Thu.0: #$1 Abigail1#Oh tidak, Aku pikir ayahku yang akan memasak nanti malam...$s#$e#Aku merasa tidak ingin melakukan apapun sekarang...$u

Fri.0: Wow, Aku baru sadar ini jumat. $u#$e#Kadang-kadang aku benar-benar lupa waktu.

Fri2.0: Kita pergi ke bar malam ini. Itu semacam tradisi hari jumat, Aku rasa....

Sat.0: Udara pegunungan sangat sejuk pada hari seperti ini.$h#$e#Aku sangat menikmatinya.

Sun.0: Oh man... Aku akan mengerjakan semua tugasku hari ini. Sepertinya aku tidak tidur lagi malam ini...$s

Sun2.0: Aku penasaran apa yang terjadi jika aku di kuburan setiap malam?#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, Menurutmu apa yang akan terjadi dengan kita setelah mati?#$r 17 0 Sun_17#Aku tidak tau.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#Kita kembali sebagai hantu yang menakutkan.#$r 17 0 Sun_17#Kita pergi ke surga.#$r 18 0 Sun_17#Jiwa kita diangkat ke akhirat.#$r 17 30 Sun_nothing#Tidak. Kita hanya mencari kebebasan.

Sun_old.0: $p 17#Aku tebak kau pikir tidak akan terjadi kan??$u|Mungkin hantu jahat akan bergentayangan!

Sun_nothing.0: Kau tau, itu tidak terlalu buruk.$8

Wed2.0: Oh, hi @. Sedang beristirahat?#$e#Aku juga. Aku hanya mengambil kelas online hari ini.

Tue4.0: Hi, Senang bertemu denganmu.$h#$e#Aku ingin mnjernihkan pikiranku... bagaimana harimu saat ini?

Sat6.0: kau datang hanya untuk menjengukku? Aku suka.$h#$e#Apakah kau pernah menjelajahi gua di gunung?#$e#Menarik. Aku ingin pergi kesana sendirian dihari seperti ini.$l

Mon8.0: ...Oh, @! Hi.$h#$e#Ingin pegi keluar sebentar? Sini! Aku baca pikiranmu. *hihihi* $h

Thu10.0: Hi.$l#$e#Apa kau merasa aneh akhir-akhir ini??$l#$b#Sedikit menakutkan aku rasa.$h

Fri6.0: Burung-burung berkicau dengan bahagia hari ini. Sepertinya mereka bisa melihat masa depan.#$e#Enak sekali seperti mereka, iyakan?

Event_VideoGame_Yes.0: Mantap! Aku yakin kau dapat menyelasaikan level ini dengan mudah.$h

Event_VideoGame_No.0: Oh? *Huhh~*... Sepertinya aku tidak akan pernah bisa melewati level ini...$s

Event_Grave1.0: Lihat? kau tahu kenapa aku pergi keluar.#$b#Aku sudah lama tinggal di desa, tapi aku tidak memiliki kenangan. Aku ingin pergi berpetualang!$8

Event_Grave2.0: Tentu. Aku tidak ingin membunuh apapun. Aku hanya ingin berpetualang tanpa membahayakan nyawaku!#$b#Aku sudah lama tinggal di desa, tapi aku tidak memiliki kenangan. Aku ingin pergi berpetualang!$8

Event_Grave3.0: Oh, itu karena aku cewe... bukan? Ugh...$u^Kenapa? Aku kuat sama sepertimu!$a#$b#Aku bukan tuan putri.. Aku bisa menjaga diriku sendiri!$a#$b#Aku sudah lama tinggal di desa, tapi aku tidak memiliki kenangan. Aku ingin pergi berpetualang!$8

Event_Grave4.0: Sungguh? itu mengejutkan.$8#$b#Aku sudah lama tinggal di desa, tapi aku tidak memiliki kenangan. Aku ingin pergi berpetualang!$8

Event_Rain_2.0: Yea... Apakah kau menikmati suasana yang suram ini.

Event_Tragic_1.0: Yeah... aku pikir hidupku baik-baik saja...$s

Event_Tragic_3.0: Aku merasa lebih baik jika kau mempercayainya...#$b#Tapi aku tidak.$s

Event_Cave_2.0: Itu normal jika kau takut untuk kehilangan sesuatu...$l

summer_1.0: Sekarang musim panas. Ini bukan musim kesukaanku.#$e#Udaranya sangat panas serasa terbakar.

summer_Mon.0: hewan peliharaanku, David, membenci cuaca panas. Dia berbulu halus.

summer_Tue.0: Udaranya sangat lembab dengan lebah dan madu di sepanjang musim panas. Aku hampir pusing.$u

summer_Wed.0: kau sudah mendekorasi rumahmu? Aku akan melakukanya jika aku punya rumah sendiri.

summer_6.0: Ingin pergi ke pantai nanti malam, kadang-kadang saat tengah malam kau bisa melihat cahaya terang dari laut.#$e#Aku pikir itu hanya mimpi... Itu sudah tidak nyata lagi.

summer_Thu.0: Jika aku tau bagaimana menggunakan pedang aku akan mejelajahi gunung sekarang. Itu kelihatannya keren sekali.

summer_Thu4.0: Ew, Aku harap kulikutku tidak menjadi coklet saat musim panas.$s

summer_Fri.0: Aku berharap punya kucing. akungnya, ayahku alergi dengan kucing.

summer_Sat.0: Aku berharap cepat musim gugur... angin gunung yang sepoi-sepoi, daun yang berjatuhan, jamur yang berbau... *sigh*

summer_Sun.0: Apa kau punya dorongan untuk berpetualang? @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... anggap saja kau menang hadiah liburan, tempat mana yang ingin kau tuju??#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall

summer_Sun_old.0: $p 25#Aku juga... mungkin kau tidak suka dengan tempat yang aku sedang pikirkan...|Suatu hari mungkin kita akan jadi tetangga. Aku pikir kita punya kesamaan.$h

Sun_25.0: Huh. Aku bikir bahwa dia akan cepat tumbuh.

summer_Wed2.0: Iaku ingin hidup di kebun sepertimu.#$b#Lantai yang berdecit, debu yang berterbangan... Sangay menyenangkan tinggal di rumah tua. Iya kan?

summer_Tue4.0: kau cowo yang menarik, @. Aku harap kau pindah kesini.$h^kau cewe yang menarik, @. Aku harap kau pindah kesini.$h

summer_Sat6.0: Aku menikmati hidupku di musim panas ini.$h#$e#Lucu sekali pandanganku cepat berubah.

summer_Mon8.0: Aku pikir Pelican Town adalah kota yang membosankan, tapi lama-lama aku mulai mencintainya.$h

summer_Thu10.0: Wow, kau tampak senang hari ini.#$e#Maksudku, musim panas cocok untuk mencoklatkan kulit. Iya kan?... heh...$l

fall_1.0: Ah... Akhirnya musim gugur!$h#$e#Aku lelah sekali saat musim panas.

fall_Mon.0: Aku butuh menginstirahatkan kakiku dan sedikit menghirup udara kencang.

fall_Tue.0: $d joja#Aku mencoba membantu toko seharian. Usaha sangan sulit ketika Joja Mart selesai dibuka.|Sejak Joja Mart ditutup kita melakukan hal yang sangat menyenangkan di toko!$h

fall_Wed.0: Aku tidak bisa menunggu panen labu hari ini.$h#$e#Spirit's eve festival diadakan di akhir musim. Itu sangat berbeda jika dibandingkan dengan di Zuzu City, tapi untuk kota yang kecil seperti ini, itu cukup menyenangkan.

fall_Thu.0: #$1 AbigailHAND#Tadi malam aku bermimpu tanganku menjadi besar %noun. pakah itu sebuah pertanda?#$e#%Abigail tidak tertaik melakukan pembicaraan sekarang.

fall_Sat.0: $d cc#Aku tidak percaya kau memperbaiki Community Center sendirian. Aku sangat terkesan.|Apakah kau punya orang-orangan sawah di kebun?

fall_Sun.0: Hmm... apa yang harus aku lakukan malam ini?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#Aku ingin mewarnai rambutku... apa yang kau suka?#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Hitam.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Kenapa tidak pirang?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#Bagaimana dengan pink?#$r 28 0 Sun_28#Aku suka rambutmu yang sekarang!

fall_Sun_old.0: $p 27#Aku akan mewarnai rambutku tapi aku membatalkannya.|Iya? Apa itu?

Sun_27.0: Aku pikir itu pilihan yang tepay?#$e#Aku akan memikirkannya.

Sun_28.0: Baiklah aku akan menuruti apa yang kau katakan.$u

fall_Wed2.0: Apa kau akan menanam labu tahun ini?#$e#Satu untukku ya...$h

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alex.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Finally, we're here!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Aw... I guess it can't last forever.$s
Entries.Resort_Wander: I knew I shoulda brought a frisbee... Oh well.$h
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: I wonder if anyone would be up for a volleyball tournament.#$e#Don't worry, I'll go easy!$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: I wonder how far I could swim out, and still make it back?#$e#I'm guessing at least a mile.#$b#... Don't worry, I'm not going to try it.$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, man... It's the beach!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!
Entries.Resort_Towel: With this island open, there's no excuse to be pasty anymore!
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Phew, it feels good to finally get these abs a little sunlight.#$e#Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home.
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: When I go pro, I'll vacation on islands all around the world.#$e#But for now, this place will do just fine!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: I'm ordering a banana shake with two scoops of protein powder.
Entries.Resort: Ah... The island life. I could get used to this!
Entries.danceRejection: Nah... I'm gonna ask someone else. Good luck.
Entries.divorced: I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: I don't know if I can trust you anymore, but I'm willing to give you a chance.$9
Entries.breakUp: You're giving me wha...?$7#$b#*huff*... Got it. Alright... well, you've made your choice. You're not gonna see me begging.$a
Entries.Mon: Did you know I was an all-star quarterback in high school? It's true.$u#$e#See this little star on my jacket here? That proves it.
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#*sigh*... I wish there were more girls in this town, know what I mean?$s^Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a bikini?
Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.^If you weren't a girl I'd ask you to play catch.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Wed_01_old: #$p 5#Go long! ...just kidding. Hahaha.|I just wish I had someone to play catch with...$s
Entries.Wed_01_01: Really? I guess I underestimated you.#$b#My arm's a little sore, but maybe next time.
Entries.Wed_01_02: Yeah, some people just aren't made for sports.
Entries.Thu: The air's starting to warm up... I'm feeling pumped.
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer guy?^Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a guy like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.Sun: Hey.#$e#What, you wanna talk to me? I'm busy.
Entries.Sun2: Hey, @.#$e#That's right, I remember your name.
Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.Tue6: Nothing's better than an energetic day at the beach with your friends... right?
Entries.Mon8: You know, I used to want fame and fortune, but lately I've been starting to sing a different tune. In the end it's the humble little things that satisfy, don't you think?#$e#I still want to go pro, but it's not the most important thing in the world.
Entries.Fri8: Hi @. You look sporty today.$h^Hey @. Did you do something different with your hair? Something keeps grabbing my attention.$h
Entries.Sat10: I've been having a hard time staying focused lately.$l
Entries.Event_beach1: Of course you do. If you didn't I'd think you were crazy. Or some kind of nerd.
Entries.Event_beach2: Really? You must be some kind of weirdo.$a#$b#Sorry.
Entries.Event_books1: No, I'm not! You're just trying to flatter me.$a
Entries.Event_books3: You were supposed to disagree with me.$a
Entries.event_box1: Yes... I know. That's why I've been so determined to be successful with my sports stuff...$9#$b#Make it or not... As long as I try my hardest I think she'd be proud. Thanks.
Entries.event_box2: Wow... It's the anniversary of my Mom's death! Have a heart...$a
Entries.event_box3: ...Thanks, @.#$b#You... you're different than the other guys. More sensitive.$l^You've become my best friend in the whole town... #$b#I'm glad.^Is that embarrassing to say?$l
Entries.event_box4: That doesn't make me feel any better, jerk.$a
Entries.summer_1: Hey. Summer is definitely the best time of year.#$e#Right now is great because we've got the whole season to look forward to. Catch you later.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.^Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman
Entries.summer_Wed_01_old: $p 52#Hey, when I turn pro you can say you were my first "fan". Not bad, huh?|Hey, I've been practicing twice as hard so I can turn pro and prove you wrong. You just wait.$a
Entries.summer_Wed_01_01: Hey, now that's what I'm talking about!$h#$e#You're cooler than I thought.
Entries.summer_Wed_01_02: Yeah, well I'm so good I'm not going to have to practice all that much.$u
Entries.summer_Wed_01_03: That's insane. You're just jealous that I'm talented and popular and you're not.$a^That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm way more popular than you'll ever be, freak.$a#$e#Get away from me.$a
Entries.summer_Thu: Hey, you must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day.^Hey, you must be getting pretty fit working on that farm all day.#$e#Maybe you'll reach my level some day. Something to look forward to, huh?#$e#Why do you have that look on your face?
Entries.summer_Fri: What do you want?#$e#I've got more important things to do right now.
Entries.summer_Sat: Mmmm... I smell a barbeque.#$e#Damn I could go for a burger.
Entries.summer_Sun: I got these new shoes yesterday 'cuz my old pair had a brown smudge.#$b#I just threw them into the garbage. I would've donated them but I don't like the idea of some weirdo wearing my shoes, ya know?#$e#...What?$a
Entries.summer_Sun4: Oh wow...your shoes are a little dirty... but that's fine, too!#$e#Different people have different tastes I guess.
Entries.summer_Thu4: Hey, you look like you're getting into some good shape this summer!#$b#All that farm work is paying off, huh?
Entries.summer_Fri6: Sorry my room is so messy.$s#$e#It's just hard to always remember to clean. I'm trying to get better, though.
Entries.summer_Wed8: You know, I actually wouldn't mind being a farmer... it seems a lot like playing sports, in a way.#$e#I like being outdoors and doing things with my hands.
Entries.summer_Sat10: I've been trying to do more reading lately... I feel like I've been neglecting my brain for years because of my athletic obsession.
Entries.fall_1: Sure, it's getting colder... But it's still warm enough for sports!#$e#That's all I care about.
Entries.fall_Mon: My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I was like, '...Grams, don't fret. I'm turning pro!'$h#$e#Studying is for nerds, anyway.
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Do you think the ladies like my haircut?^What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.
Entries.fall_Wed_01_old: I put too much gel in my hair today. It kind of hurts.#$e#Don't touch it!#$e#...what?
Entries.fall_Wed_01_01: Yeah, I know. That's why I have it like this.
Entries.fall_Wed_01_02: Yeah right. You're just jealous that I look so good.
Entries.fall_Thu: What's up?#$e#Isn't your name, like, %firstnameletter%name, or something?#$e#Oh. It's @? Okay. Sorry.
Entries.fall_Fri: I'm going to do two hundred sit-ups tonight.#$b#I'm pretty dedicated, aren't I?$h#$e#Need anything else?
Entries.fall_Sat: I think you can find salmon in the river this time of year.#$e#At least that's what I heard.
Entries.fall_Sun: Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#Sundays are pretty awesome in the fall.$u
Entries.fall_Fri6: I'm going to do a ton of sit-ups tonight.#$e#You have to work really hard if you want to achieve your maximum potential.
Entries.fall_Mon4: My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#Maybe she's right...$s
Entries.fall_Wed8: I finally took the plunge... I've decided to stop putting gel in my hair.#$e#I wouldn't want to be friends with someone who only liked me because I have gel in my hair.
Entries.winter_1: Winter is kind of lame. There's too much snow to do anything fun.#$e#I guess some people like it.
Entries.winter_Mon: You like the snow? Me... I'm just looking forward to spring.
Entries.winter_Tue: Hey, can you go find Haley and tell her I said 'hi'?
Entries.winter_Tue_inlaw_Haley: Oh, hey. How's the married life coming along?$9
Entries.winter_Wed: People stay indoors a lot during the winter, and do boring stuff.$s#$e#Maybe if I read a book I'd be less bored... nah.
Entries.winter_Thu: When I turn pro, I'll be so rich that I'll get a vacation home in the tropics.#$e#Then I won't have to deal with these boring winters.
Entries.winter_Fri: You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#I guess that makes sense.
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.
Entries.winter_Sun: Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#This might be my favorite day of the week.
Entries.winter_Fri4: You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#That's nice of you.$h
Entries.winter_Sat6: I guess it's interesting that some people are totally different than us, you know?#$b#I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9
Entries.winter_Wed8: You know what? I'm going to start reading a book!
Entries.winter_Thu6: I wish I could control the weather.
Entries.winter_Thu10: If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.#$e#That means you, too.$h

summer_Sat10.0: AKu banyak membaca akhir - akhir ini... Aku merasa otakku sudah beku karena obsesiku di olahraga.

fall_1.0: Sekarang lebih dingin... Tapi tetap hangat untuk olahraga!#$e#Itulah yang aku pedulikan.

fall_Mon.0: My nenekku berkata aku harus lebih banyak belajar.#$e#Aku berkata, '...Nenek, jangan cerewet. Aku akan jadi pro!'$h#$e#Belajar hanya untuk kutu buku.

fall_Wed.0: Hey, AKu ingin berkata sesuatu.^Hey, bolehkah aku berkata sesuatu?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Apakah cewek suka rambutku?^Apa kau suka rambutku?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#Itu keliatan keren.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#Itu keliatan seperti gerombolan jamur.

fall_Wed_01_old.0: Aku terlalu banyak memakai gel. Terasa agak sakit.#$e#Jangan sentuh!#$e#...Apa?

fall_Wed_01_01.0: Yeah, Aku tau. Itulah mengapa aku begini.

fall_Wed_01_02.0: Yeah benar. Aku hanya iri aku keliatan keren.

fall_Thu.0: Ada apa?#$e#Apakah namamu %firstnameletter%name, atau lainnya?#$e#Oh. Itu @? Okay. Sorry.

fall_Fri.0: Aku akan sit-ups 200 kali nanti malam.#$b#Aku sangat berdedikasi benarkan?$h#$e#Burtuh sesuatu yang lain?

fall_Sat.0: kau mungkin akan menemukan salmon di sungai tahun ini.#$e#Setidaknya itu yang aku dengar.

fall_Sun.0: Hey, gridball main hari ini!#e#Minggu sangat keren di musim gugur.$u

fall_Fri6.0: Aku akan banyak sit-ups malam ini.#$e#kau harus bekerja dengan giat jika ingin sukses.

fall_Mon4.0: Nenekku bilang aku harus lebih banyak belajar.#$e#Mungkin dia benar...$s

fall_Wed8.0: Aku akan bertekad... Aku nggak akan memakai gel lagi.#$e#Aku nggak mau punya teman yang menykaiku karena aku memakai gel di rambutku.

winter_1.0: Winter itu membosankan. Terlau banyak salju untuk melakukan sesuatu.#$e#Mungkin beberapa orang menyukainya.

winter_Mon.0: Aku ingin cepat - cepat musim semi.

winter_Tue.0: Hey, bisakah kau cari Haley dan bilang aku berkata 'hi'?

winter_Wed.0: Orang - orang tetap tinggal di rumah saat musim dingin dan melakukan hal - hal yang membosankan.$s#$e#Mungkin jika aku membaca buku aku bakal cepat bosan... nah.

winter_Thu.0: Jika aku menjadi pro, AKu akan kaya raya dan membeli rumah di tempat tropis.#$e#Lalu aku nggak akan bertemu musim dingin lagi.

winter_Fri.0: kau menerobos salju cuma untuk ketemu aku?#$e#Itu sangat menyentuh.

winter_Sat.0: Ada beberapa orang aneh dikota ini.#$e#...Seperti Sebastian. apakah ia 'gamer' or lainnya?#$e#Aku tidak paham.

winter_Sun.0: Hey, permainan gridball ada hari ini!#e#Hari Ini menjadi hari terbaikku di minggu ini.

winter_Fri4.0: kau menerobos salju hanya ingin menemuiki?#$e#kau memang terbaik.$h

winter_Sat6.0: Mungkin itu menyenangkan bahwa ada seseorang yang berbeda dengan kita, kau tau?#$b#Kadang aku tidak mengerti kenapa mereka melakukan sesuatu, tapi itu gak papa.

winter_Tue4.0: Hey, @. Aku boleh minta tlong?$l#$b#Jika kau bertemu Haley, beritau dia aku sibuk.$l#$e#Thanks.

winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley.0: Ku Akui... Aku sedikit cemburu saat kau dan Haley menikah. Tapi, hey... Itu kesempatan untuk belajar sesuatu yang baru.$9

winter_Wed8.0: Kau tau? Aku akan mulai membaca buku!

winter_Thu6.0: Aku harap aku bisa mengatur cuaca.

winter_Thu10.0: Jika aku punya banyak uang, Aku akan mebuat teman dan keluargaku hidup bahagia.#$e#Itu berarti kau juga.$h

Entries.Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.#$e#My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll sleep well tonight!$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!
Entries.Resort_Bar: I told Gus to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice!$h
Entries.Resort: Hi @. Are you here to relax, or to do work?
Entries.Mon: I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much time in her room.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!
Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Entries.Tue: I've seen wild horesradish in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items.
Entries.Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Entries.Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h
Entries.Sat2: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat4: Abby's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre's a bit traditional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
Entries.Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
Entries.Wed6: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends.
Entries.summer_Mon: On wednesdays the shop is closed.#$e#Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.
Entries.summer_Tue: I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items.
Entries.summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
Entries.summer_Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
Entries.summer_Wed6: Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall is Abby's favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
Entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
Entries.fall_Tue: I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.fall_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
Entries.fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
Entries.winter_Tue: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Entries.winter_Fri: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.#$e#I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.
Entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think Abby would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.
Entries.winter_Wed6: Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm.$h

Introduction.0: Hello! kau pasti @, si petani baru. Aku Caroline.#$e#Suamiku menjalankan usaha toko swalayan. Apakah kau sudah bertemu putriku, Abigail? Dia bermuka pucat dengan rambut ungu.

Resort_Entering.0: Willy memberi kami masing-masing satu dendeng ikan. Aku masih berusaha mengunyahnya.

Resort_Leaving.0: Aku akan tidur nyenyak malam ini!$h

Resort_Shore.0: Air di sini sangat hangat dibandingkan di kota. Sangat nyaman!

Resort_Bar.0: Aku meminta Gus untuk memberiku kejutan, dan dia membuatkan ice greentea dengan mango zest. Sangat baik!$h

Resort.0: Hi @. Kau kesini untuk bersantai, atau bekerja?

Mon.0: Aku harap Abby tidak terlalu lama diam dikamar.

Mon_inlaw_Abigail.0: Hai, @. Apa kau menikmati pernikahanmu? Kuharap ya!

Mon8.0: #$1 Caroline23#Ketika kita pertama kali pindah ke Pelican Town aku pergi ke menara Wizard. Jangan bilang Pierre, dia mudah iri.#$e#Abigail lahir beberapa tahun setelah kami pindah ke Pelican Town. Aku pensaran jika dia ingin keluar dari desa?

Tue.0: Aku pernah melihat horesradish liar di hutan.#$e#Mencari makanan sangat menyenangkan untuk menambah penghasilan. Dan bisa juga digunakan untuk hadiah atau dimakan sendiri.

Wed.0: Hai. Apakah kau punya butuh sesuatu untuk kebunmu?#$e#Jika tidak, kami bisa membantu.#$e#Kami punya banyak barang berguna.

Thu.0: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... Aku harap aku bisa mengajak Pierre maka malam.#$e#Hmmm... Apa yang seharusnya aku buat untuk makan malam?#$e#Mungkin karena aku hanya terbiasa ke bar

Fri.0: Ini hari yang indah.#$e#Suatu hari, aku ingin membanttu Evelyn.#$e#Di umurnya saat ini dia sangat kuat, tapi aku pikir dia akan menghargai bantuanku.

Sat.0: Hanya perasaanku, atau hanya Abigail yang sangat menyukai hal-hal mistis?#$e#Mungkin aku terlalu tua untuk mengerti.

Sat_inlaw_Abigail.0: Makan malam menjadi sepi sejak Abigail pindah...#$e#Tidak, bukan karena dia berisik ketika makan!$h

Sat2.0: Abby selalu menyukai keanehan dalam hal gaib. Aku tidak yakin darimana dia mempelajarinya...

Sat4.0: Abby selalu menyukai keanehan dalam hal gaib. Aku tidak yakin darimana dia mempelajarinya...

Sat6.0: #$1 Caroline12#Ketika kita pertama kali pindaj, Aku duduk termenung... Aku tidak siap menjadi ibu rumah tangga.#$e#Pierre sangat tradsional... tapi dia pria yang baik. Dia sangat berambisi, tapi dia selalu mementingkan keluarganya.

Sun.0: Hari ini aku hanya santai dan berpikir positif.#$e#Pernahkan kau istirahat sebentar saja?

Wed6.0: Stardew Valley sangat menyenangkat, tapi aku ingin tau banyak orang.#$e#Aku ingin banyak teman.

summer_Mon.0: Di hari rabu toko tutp.#$e#Inat baik-baik jika kau menginkan sesuatu.

summer_Tue.0: Aku serinng melihat buah liar dihutan.#$e#Mencari makanan sangat menyenangkan untuk menambah penghasilan. Dan bisa juga digunakan untuk hadiah atau dimakan sendiri.

summer_Wed.0: Hai. Apakah kau punya kebutuhan sesuatu untuk kebunmu?#$e#Jika tidak, kami bisa membantu.#$e#Kami punya banyak barang berguna.

summer_Sat.0: Hanya perasaanku, atau Abigail terlihat sedikit pucat?#$e#Mungkin aku terlalu menghawatirkannya.

summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail.0: Bagaimana kabar Abigail? Dia selalu terlihat pucat. Kuharap kehidupan kebun menambah warna pada pipinya.

summer_Sun.0: Hari ini aku hanya santai dan berpikir positif.#$e#Pernahkan kau istirahat sebentar saja?

fall_Mon.0: Musim gugur adalah musim favorit Abby, jadi aku harap dia sering keluar kamar.

fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail.0: Dulu Abby mengambil kelas Online disini, tapi kupikir ia tak terlalu suka...#$e#Jiwanya adalah jiwa orang bebas, persis sebelum aku bertemu Pierre. Dia mungkin bahagia tinggal dikebunmu.

fall_Tue.0: Aku melihat jamur yang dapat dimakan dihutan.#$e#Mencari makanan sangat menyenangkan untuk menambah penghasilan. Dan bisa juga digunakan untuk hadiah atau dimakan sendiri.

fall_Sat.0: Hanya perasaanku, atau Abigail yang terlalu banyak bermain video games?#$e#Mungkin aku sudah terlalu ketinggalan zaman.

fall_Wed6.0: Kau tau, Aku sendiri ingin mejadi petani. Atau seperti pemilik peternakan.#$e#Aku suka film wild west ketika aku masih muda.

winter_Tue.0: Musim dingin sangat keras, tapi kau bisa menggali akar jika beruntung.#$e#Mencari makanan sangat menyenangkan untuk menambah penghasilan. Dan bisa juga digunakan untuk hadiah atau dimakan sendiri.

winter_Fri.0: Meskipun cuaca dingin, Aku selalu mengecek kasur di public garden.#$e#Aku hanya memastikan agar tidak rusak ketika musim semi tiba.

winter_Sat.0: Pakah kau pikir Abby terlihat lebih baik dengan rambut alaminya?#$e#Dia menggunakan cat rambut ringan.

winter_Wed6.0: Apakah kau menantikan tahun baru?#$e#Aku memprediksi kau akan suskes dengan kebunmu.$h

Entries.Introduction: Er... hi. I'm Clint.#$e#I'm the town blacksmith. If you ever need to upgrade your tools, I'm your guy.
Entries.Resort_Entering: I'm gonna put on my special red trunks. They're supposed to be really eye-catching.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Well, that didn't turn out like I was imagining...
Entries.Resort_Shore: Oh no... I forgot to clip my toenails.$s
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: I thought working a furnace would have prepared me for this heat, but I'm sweating in places I didn't know I could.$s#$e#I hope no one noticed...#$e#%Clint's body is glistening...
Entries.Resort_Chair: Ow... my whole torso is burnt to a crisp.$s
Entries.Resort_Bar: I'm hungry...$s
Entries.Resort: *sigh*... We're all at the beach but I still feel so alone...$s
Entries.reject_868: Hmm... That's an interesting stone, like nothing I've ever seen before.#$b#I wouldn't know what to do with it, though. I deal in the mundane, not the magical...
Entries.cc_Minecart: Somehow, the old town minecart system started working again. It's very convenient for getting to and from the mines.#$b#Don't get too cozy, though... if it can start up so suddenly, it could just as well shut down...
Entries.Mon: Yep. I'm a blacksmith.#$e#My father was also a blacksmith.#$e#My grandfather was a blacksmith as well.$u#$q 9/9 Mon_old#I bet you can't guess what my great-grandfather was...#$r 9 30 Mon_9#A blacksmith.#$r 9 50 Mon_clown#A silly clown.#$r 9 -50 Mon_rude#A sarcastic jerk.
Entries.Mon_old: And yes, my great-grandfather was also a blacksmith.
Entries.Mon_rude: Wow. That was rude. I was just being funny and you took it to a whole new level.
Entries.Mon4: Be glad you're a farmer, @. It's nicer to work outdoors than by a hot furnace all day.#$e#I'm only a blacksmith because my father pushed me into it.
Entries.Tue: If you want me to upgrade your tools you'll have to give me the correct ore.#$e#And you'll have to pay me a fee, of course.
Entries.Wed: Hey. What do you need?
Entries.Wed6: Oh, hi @. Sorry If I look a little messy. I've been working at the furnace all morning.$h#$e#So, did you need anything, or do you just want to visit?
Entries.Thu: Business has been slow lately.#$e#You should upgrade your tools. I could use the cash.
Entries.Fri: The weather doesn't really matter to me. I typically stay near my shop year-round.#$e#Depressing, huh?
Entries.Sat: Sometimes I wonder how I ended up in this town.$u
Entries.Sat6: Damn it, I'm too old to do anything exciting anymore. All I have to look forward to is years and years of sweaty, hot furnace-work.
Entries.Sun: Don't you have work to do?
Entries.Sun4: So how are your tools holding up?
Entries.event_advice1: Okay... I'll keep that in mind.
Entries.event_advice2: That's the problem... I do act natural... but I never have any success.$s
Entries.summer_Mon4: Be glad you're a farmer, @. It's nicer to work outdoors than by a hot furnace all day.#$e#I'm only a blacksmith because my father pushed me into it.
Entries.summer_Wed6: Oh, hi @! Sorry If I look a little messy. I've been working at the furnace all morning.$h#$e#So, did you need anything, or do you just want to visit?
Entries.summer_Thu: Business has been slow lately.#$e#You should upgrade your tools. I could use the cash.

Entries.Introduction: Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my daughter Maru? She's interested to meet you.
Entries.Resort_Entering: I already spotted a rare crab. This place is great.$h
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll be analyzing this data for months.
Entries.Resort_Shore: *crunch*... whoops, there goes an endangered crab species...$s#$b#...#$b#Oh, nevermind. It was just the empty shell! I can sleep tonight.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Are you having fun, @? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!
Entries.Resort_Bar: I usually don't partake... but I'm usually not on a tropical island, either. Hahaha.$h
Entries.Resort: Can you believe this place? It's teeming with exotic life!
Entries.reject_869: It's a good specimen, but a very common species. You can keep it.
Entries.reject_865: Fruit and salt? What an odd combination...$s
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Robin won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h
Entries.Mon: Maru helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Maru: It's hard to do good science without Maru's help...#$b#But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.Tue: This valley has a very vibrant and diverse ecosystem. That's one reason I was excited to move here.
Entries.Wed: You're probably growing a lot of interesting plants on your farm, huh?#$e#Maybe I'll stop by your place some day and check it out.
Entries.Thu: How's the farming business going? It's parsnip season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.Fri: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h
Entries.Sat: Let's see... If compounds in the rhizosphere contain sufficient levels of Carbon-13, then...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?
Entries.Sun: It's good to take a break from work every now and then.#$e#I guess that's kind of difficult when you live on a farm, though.#$e#Hey, at least in the winter you don't have to worry about crops.
Entries.Fri4: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u
Entries.Wed6: Hi @! How are you doing today?#$e#I wish I could make your farming job easier somehow.
Entries.Event_tomato1: Really? I figured a farmer would know the correct answer...$s
Entries.Event_Lab_Silence: Well, we'd better titrate this solution before it crystallizes on us.
Entries.summer_Mon: #$e#%Demetrius is deep in thought.#$e#Sorry, I'm really busy.#$e#There's so many plants to study right now.
Entries.summer_Tue: Make sure to water your plants every day.#$e#Although, if you're using water retaining soil you don't need to worry about watering as often.#$e#It's pretty convenient.
Entries.summer_Thu: How's the farming business going? It's tomato season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.summer_Fri: $p 40#So I heard Maru had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and Maru become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.summer_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I hope my daughter's keeping up on her math and science!
Entries.summer_Sat: Hmm... If strigolactone levels could be increased, would it have a proportional effect on mycorhizal growth?$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?

Entries.fall_Mon: During this time of year I divert my attentions to fungi.
Entries.fall_Tue: We know a lot about nature thanks to science.#$e#But there's always a lot more to learn.
Entries.fall_Thu: How's the farming business going? It's corn season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.fall_Fri: Maru sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.#$e#I'm glad she's so dedicated.
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I'm still flabbergasted about Maru's secret robot... was it all a dream?
Entries.fall_Sat: Let's see... perhaps the nitrogen fixation level is affected by nematode secretions...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?
Entries.fall_Wed6: Hi @. I'm always glad when you come for a visit.#$e#It's nice to have some company after all this lonely lab-work.
Entries.winter_Mon: I'm taking a break from my research right now.
Entries.winter_Tue: Talk to my wife if you want to increase the size of your house.
Entries.winter_Wed: Do you have a kitchen in your house yet?#$e#Cooking is kind of like doing lab work.
Entries.winter_Thu: Do you have any animals on your farm?
Entries.winter_Sat: Let's see... if seasonal nitrogen levels could be modeled by a piecewise function...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was analyzing data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?
Entries.winter_Sun: Feel free to harvest as much lumber and stone from this area as you please.
Entries.winter_Fri4: Thanks for stopping by. I need to think about something other than legumes for a while.#$e#So, what have you been doing lately?#$e#That sounds interesting.

Introduction.0: Hai! aku Demetrius, aku seorang ilmuan dan seorang ayah. Terima kasih sudah berkenal denganmu!#$e#Aku belajar hewan dan tanaman lokal di laboratoriumku.#$b#kau sudah bertemu putriku Maru? Dia sangat tertarik bertemu denganmu.

Resort_Entering.0: Aku menemukan kepiting langka. Tempat ini sangat bagus.$h

Resort_Chair.0: Apa kau bersenang-senang, @? Sesekali kau harus bersantai juga!

Mon.0: Maru kadang-kadang membantuku di laboratorium... Dia anak yang baik.

summer_Thu.0: Bagaimana bisnis pertanianmu? Ini musim tomat, bukan?#$e#Aku bisa membayangkannya, bekerja di luar ruangan dengan tanaman sepanjang hari.

summer_Mon6.0: Aku menjadi seorang ilmuwan karena aku ingin berkontribusi pada perkembangan manusia.#$e#Tentu saja, semua ini tidak akan mungkin tanpa petani seperti dirimu.$h

fall_Mon.0: Tahun uni aku tertarik meneliti jamur.

fall_Tue.0: Kami tahu banyak tentang alam berkat ilmu pengetahuan.#$e#Tapi masih banyak hal untuk dipelajari.

winter_Wed.0: Kau punya dapur di rumahmu?#$e#Memasak sama dengan meneliti.

winter_Thu.0: Kau punya hewan ternak di kebunmu?

winter_Sat.0: Mari kita lihat ... mungkin tingkat fiksasi nitrogen dipengaruhi oleh sekresi nematoda...$u#$b#Oh! Maaf. Aku sedang sibut meneliti dan aku tidak melihatmu.#$e#Apa kau butuh sesuatu?

winter_Sun.0: Jangan ragu untuk menyimpan banyak kayu dan batu untuk persediaan.

winter_Fri4.0: Terima kasih untuk mampir. Aku sementara harus berpikir selain penelitian kacang-kacangan.#$e#APa yag kau lakukan akhir-akhir ini?#$e#Kedenganrannya menarik.

Entries.Introduction: Hey, you're pretty good at mining, for a human.
Entries.Mon: I got all this stuff from the surface. I just take it from your people during the night.#$e#Hmm? What is this concept you call "private property"?
Entries.Tue: Ah... cave carrot stew, cave carrot roast, cave carrot soup and cave carrots au gratin.#$e#...And a ramekin of cave carrot brulee to sweeten the night.#$e#What?
Entries.Wed: Hey, wanna buy something?
Entries.Wed_6: Long ago, my people knew the secrets of advanced technology. The archaeological evidence proves that.#$e#But I wonder where it came from? And where did it all go? I guess some questions will never be answered...
Entries.Thu_4: I feel most comfortable underground.#$e#The deeper underground the better.
Entries.Fri: You've never seen a dwarf before, have you?
Entries.Sat_8: The mines can be a treacherous place. Be careful, friend.
Entries.Sat: It's dangerous in the mines. Why don't you buy a few things from my shop to ensure your safety?
Entries.Sun: One day you'll have to tell me about this beverage you call "milk".
Entries.Thu: You're not a spy sent by the Shadow People, are you?#$e#I'm keeping my eye on you.
Entries.Fri_2: Most humans fear the unknown... that's why I've hidden my shop here.#$e#Your mining skills prove you're trustworthy.

Introduction.0: Hey, kau hebat sekali menambang, untuk ukuran seorang manusia.

Mon.0: Aku menDapatkan alat ini dari permukaan. Aku mengambilnya dari orang-orang saat malam hari.#$e#Hmm? kau namakan apak konsep ini "private property"?

Tue.0: Ah... rebusan wortel gua, wortel gua panggang, sup wortel gua dan wortel gua dengan parutan keju.#$e#...Dan sebuah brulee wortel gua yang enak di malam hari.#$e#What?

Wed.0: Hey, ingin membeli sesuatu?

Wed_6.0: Dahulu kala, orang-orangku tau rahasia teknologi masa depan. Arkeolog membenarkan hal itu.#$e#Tapi darimana datangnya itu? Dan kemana mereka pergi? Aku pikir beberapa pertanyaan sulit dijawab...

Thu_4.0: Aku senang tinggal di bawah tanah.#$e#Semakin dalam bawah tanah semakin baik.

Fri.0: kau belum ernah melihat seorang dwarf sebelumnya?

Sat_8.0: Tambang bisa menjadi tempat yang berbahaya. Hati-hati, kawan.

Sat.0: Sangat berbahaya di tambang. Kenapa kau tidak membeli perlengkapan keamanan?

Sun.0: Suatu haru aku ingin kau menceritakan minuman apa yang biasa kau sebut itu "milk".

Thu.0: Aku harap kau bukan seorang mata-mata.#$e#Aku akan terus mengawasimu.

Fri_2.0: Kebanyakan manusia berpikiran jahat... itulah mengapa aku menyembungikan tokoku disini.#$e#Kemampuan menambangmu membuatku mempercayaimu.

Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm Elliott... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.Resort_Entering: That was quite the ride!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll see you back in the valley.
Entries.Resort_Leaving_2: Hopefully a crab hasn't snuck onto my clothes again.$s#$b#Imagine crawling out of a pocket and finding yourself on a beach hundreds of miles from home!$h#$e#Hmmm... Perhaps this could make for an interesting novel...
Entries.Resort_Chair: I'm just taking a quick break to slather some coconut oil on my body.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus, I'll order a round for everyone!#$b#*hic*... Oh... I don't have the G.$s#$b#Heh heh... Never mind!
Entries.Resort_Wander: I've heard rumors of pirates coming to shore near here at night. They say it can get pretty wild!
Entries.Resort: I must admit, this beach blows my own humble strand out of the water.
Entries.Resort_2: Oh dear! Some seaweed has tangled itself in my hair.#$e#That's the trouble with relaxing on the beach.
Entries.divorced: ...$s#$e#Why do you torment me? Can't you see you've shattered all my hopes and dreams?$s
Entries.dumped_Guys: Go away. I can't bear to see you.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: You've hurt me beyond measure... but I'm willing to leave the past behind us.$s
Entries.breakUp: Ah... the wilted bouquet. A sight I'd hoped to never see...$s#$b#I suppose there are other horizons to set my eyes upon...$s
Entries.Mon: I'm kind of new to this town myself, but I really feel at home.$h#$e#I moved here only a year before you.
Entries.Mon4: I hope you've come to think of this place as 'home'.
Entries.Tue: A great idea can pass through your head when you least expect it... but if your mind is too busy you might miss it.#$e#Well, I really must get back to my work.
Entries.Tue6: The sweet friction of pen and paper is the music of my soul.$u#$b#That's why I chose this beach as my home, so that I could have peace and quiet to do my work.
Entries.Wed: The forest is a wonderful place. Have you been there?
Entries.Wed8: Sorry, I'm feeling morose today.$s#$e#I wish there was more certainty about the future.$s#$e#I don't want to grow old as a lonely hermit on this beach...$s
Entries.Thu2: I can't seem to find the inspiration to begin writing my novel...$s
Entries.Thu4: I've been feeling hopeful lately. Perhaps the weather is changing.
Entries.Thu6: Sometimes I wonder if I might just have an inflated self-image and no real skills...$s#$e#No, no... I'm not fishing for compliments. Though they are appreciated...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 elliottApol#It's a little lonely out here on the beach... so I apologize if I was ever a little too forward with you when we first met. I was just eager to have a friend.$k#$e#It feels good to have a close friend like you.
Entries.Thu: Hello, @.#$e#Are you well?
Entries.Fri: The fresh air of this valley is good for body and mind.#$e#A quick stroll outdoors always invigorates me.
Entries.Fri4: Ah... do not get too close to my hair with a torch...$8
Entries.Fri8: I'll admit... it takes me several hours each morning to make my hair look this good.
Entries.Sat: You probably wouldn't like it inside my cabin. It's dark and full of spiders.$s
Entries.Sat4: Please excuse the sorry state of my cabin.
Entries.Sat6: Some people are shy. Keep showing interest in them and they'll get comfortable around you.#$e#Everyone likes to have friends, even that grumpy blacksmith.
Entries.Sun: Hello. I hope your new farming life is panning out as you'd hoped?
Entries.Sun6: Oh, @! I was hoping you'd show up.#$e#It's always a pleasure to see you.$h
Entries.event_idea1: Mystery, huh? It's definitely an exciting genre. I'll remember that.
Entries.event_idea2: Ah, one of the classic genres. I'll remember that.
Entries.event_idea3: I would've never guessed! I suppose even those of the 'earthiest' profession sometimes have their heads in the stars.$h#$b#I'll remember that.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about another man.$l^So am I.$l
Entries.event_toast2: That's a great idea!$h#$b#Here's to us!
Entries.event_toast4: Ah, to a harmonious future for the community... what a virtuous idea.#$b#Here's to Pelican Town!
Entries.summer_Mon: A gentle little sunbeam woke me up this morning. I've never felt so refreshed.$u#$e#I'm sorry if that isn't very interesting to you.
Entries.summer_Mon4: I know that I am kind of an 'oddball'.#$e#I hope you don't mind.$h
Entries.summer_Mon6: @, I know you have faith in my abilities as a writer. That means a lot to me.$h
Entries.summer_Tue: I've encountered some beautiful shells in front of my house.#$e#I would imagine the rarer varieties to be quite valuable.
Entries.summer_Tue6: I write in hopes of connecting with others through time and space.$u#$e#*sigh*...times are changing, though. People don't read anymore.$s
Entries.summer_Wed: It must be satisfying to follow your crop from seed to harvest.#$e#It's as if your essence is infused into the fruit.$u
Entries.summer_Thu: Oh dear! My shoes are filled with sand.$s#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.
Entries.summer_Fri: @? You look puzzled.#$b#I guess the hot summer air can make us a little dizzy.
Entries.summer_Sat: The sun is angry today... My skin is a bit too delicate, I'm afraid.
Entries.summer_Sun: You came all the way here just to talk to me? How kind.$h
Entries.summer_Sun4: Visit my cabin whenever you like. I could use the company.$h
Entries.fall_Mon: Hello @.#$e#Make sure and take breaks from your work now and then.
Entries.fall_Mon4: Come visit me if you need a break from your labors.$h#$e#I'm usually at my house.
Entries.fall_Tue: It's been said that a pirate's ship, full of plundered gold, shipwrecked here a long time ago.
Entries.fall_Tue8: @, I was just thinking about you.$l#$e#Maybe you sensed it.$h#$e#So! Tell me about your day.
Entries.fall_Wed8: I wouldn't mind trying my hand at farming.#$e#The quiet atmosphere of a farm might be a good source of literary inspiration, don't you think?$h
Entries.fall_Thu: Oh dear! A tiny crab appears to have made his home in my shirt pocket.$l#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.
Entries.fall_Fri4: My legs are stiff from sitting at my writing desk all night.$s#$e#Sometimes I envy you, @.
Entries.fall_Fri: My legs are stiff from sitting at my writing desk all morning.$s
Entries.fall_Fri10: @, when you're around... I feel unusually creative.$l#$e#I know... strange, but it's true.
Entries.fall_Sat: It gets windy this time of year. Marvelous!$h
Entries.fall_Sun: I have to remember to water my plants today. And not with sea water this time!
Entries.winter_Mon: You've come to visit me in the cold?#$e#I could do with a respite from my lonely labors.
Entries.winter_Mon4: @, you've trudged through the snow to visit me?#$e#I'm honored!$h
Entries.winter_Tue: People have scraped a living off the sea for thousands of years.#$e#I just go to the grocery store.$s
Entries.winter_Tue10: @, I had a feeling that you would show up.#$e#Perhaps we're connected by an other-worldly thread.$l
Entries.-winter_Wed: A day can never be boring when you follow the whims of your imagination.$u#$e#Sorry, am I babbling on about nonsense?
Entries.winter_Thu: Breathe deeply. Do you notice it? That's the smell of the sea.#$e#How does it make you feel?
Entries.winter_Thu6: Breathe deeply. Do you notice it? That's the smell of the sea.#$e#Whenever I smell the sea, it reminds me of my youth. The ocean really impressed me as a child.
Entries.winter_Fri: I have to brush my hair daily, or else it'll clump up into messy knots.#$e#It's a lot of work.#$e#I'm surprised I haven't just shaved it off in a fit of passion.$h#$e#I suppose I am too vain.
Entries.winter_Sat: I've been doing little indoor exercises, since it's often too cold to go out.#$e#Sorry if it's a little humid in the cabin.$s
Entries.winter_Sun: I really should scrub my floorboards today. I think an algae is starting to form.$s#$e#Do you make time for cleaning?

Entries.Introduction: Ooh!... I can read it on your face. You're going to love it here in Pelican Town.#$b#If you're ever looking for something to do in the evening, stop by the saloon. That's where I work!
Entries.Resort_Entering: Oh, I like this place! It's full of parrots!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Ah... my lungs feel perfect.
Entries.Resort_Shore: Can you feel it? The ocean has a profound healing energy.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Are you having fun, @? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!
Entries.Resort_Bar: It's nice to be on this side of the bar for once!$h
Entries.Resort: If you open your heart to the sun, you can feel a loving energy inside of you.$h
Entries.danceRejection: I'm very sorry... but I've already agreed to dance with someone else.$u
Entries.divorced: @... You broke my heart... I just can't talk to you anymore.$s#$e#Please, let me try to heal...$s
Entries.breakUp: B...But I thought we had a special bond... *sniff*$s
Entries.reject_866: Oh, that's beautiful... I have a friend who would love that! But she lives far from here...
Entries.secondChance_Girls: @... I'm ready to give you a second chance. I still have faith that there's a good person inside of you.$s
Entries.Mon: Have I told you Haley and I are sisters? Strange, isn't it?
Entries.Mon2: I have a secret hobby, but I won't say any more.#$e#Maybe I'll show you some day.$h
Entries.Mon4: This world is full of spirits and magic... Some don't believe me, but I know it's true.#$e#I can see it in your eyes... you believe in the other world, like me.
Entries.Mon6: I wish Haley would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.$u
Entries.Mon6_inlaw_Haley: I have to say, now that Haley's gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order.
Entries.Mon8: There's good people in this town who just can't seem to find happiness. It makes me sad.$u#$e#Working in the saloon, I hear first-hand about everyone's problems.$u
Entries.Tue: I work part-time at Gus' saloon. It pays the bills.
Entries.Tue4: I'm just working at Gus' to make ends meet... but my real passion is tailoring.$u#$e#I made these clothes from scratch, see?
Entries.Tue6: Oh, hi... It's nice of you to visit me like this.$h
Entries.Tue8: You know, @... I think the future looks bright for both of us.
Entries.Wed: I've heard rumors of rare and powerful magic rings, forged long ago by forgotten civilizations. I'm not sure if it's true or just a fairy tale.
Entries.Wed4: You catch fish? I just hope you treat the poor things humanely.$s#$e#Every critter deserves our respect, even the slimy ones.
Entries.Wed6: Have faith... every day you're taking one more step on the path of your destiny.
Entries.Wed8: Hi, @.$u#$e#I always knew we'd become close like this...
Entries.Thu: I hope you're farming in a sustainable way. The valley's ecosystem is fragile!#$e#How do I know? I have a strong gut-feeling!
Entries.Thu4: Sometimes the flowers speak to me... each one has a different story to tell!
Entries.Fri: Ah, spring. The season of pastels. I actually prefer jewel tones, myself.#$b#Oh, excuse me! I was mumbling about fashion again, wasn't I?
Entries.Sat: I like making my own clothes, but it's not easy to get cloth.#$e#And it's such a long trip to the city.
Entries.Sat6: Do you ever think about the texture of fabric, @? Each texture has a distinct personality... feel my dress... see?
Entries.Sun: Hi @!#$e#Do you raise sheep in your barn? You can turn their wool into beautiful bolts of cloth!#$e#You'll need a loom, though. You can make them yourself if you know the crafting recipe.
Entries.Sun4: This house was left in our care by my parents. They've been traveling the world for the last two years.#$e#We have no idea when they'll be back.#$e#I enjoy living here, though. It's a beautiful area and the town is nice.
Entries.event_dance2: Um... Okay. Sorry you didn't like it. I guess those three years of practice were a complete waste...$s
Entries.event_dance3: Did you really think so? That's exactly the effect I was shooting for!$h#$b#I'm so glad you liked it.
Entries.summer_Mon: Haley is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for her.
Entries.summer_Mon4: Eating healthy is very important to me. I want to live a long and active life.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Haley: Haley and I get along much better now that she's moved out. I look forward to her visits!
Entries.summer_Tue6: I feel bad for Linus. People judge him, but he's just living a different lifestyle.$u#$e#I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others.
Entries.summer_Sun6: Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#That's fine with me. You're a cool guy.^I'm glad.$h
Entries.summer_Sun8: Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#This may sound weird, but I've always been certain this would happen.
Entries.summer_Wed: It doesn't rain much in summer, does it?#$e#That just means more watering work for you, huh?#$e#Or do you enjoy the sunny weather?
Entries.summer_Thu: I consider the bees and butterflies to be my special friends!
Entries.summer_Fri: If I wasn't so busy I'd come help you on the farm!#$e#But Gus would be upset if I had another job...$s
Entries.summer_Fri6: You know, I'm sure Gus would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.#$b#There's so much out there, I can't stay a barmaid forever.$u
Entries.summer_Sat: Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in Harvey's clinic!
Entries.summer_Sun4: It's around this time of year that my good friends visit the region... I mean the parrots!
Entries.fall_1: Well, fall is here. Time to plant some new crops, huh?
Entries.fall_Mon: It's good weather for a picnic, isn't it?
Entries.fall_Mon8: If I didn't have to work I'd suggest we go on a nice picnic!
Entries.fall_Tue: Hello. Did you have a good summer?
Entries.fall_Tue4: Hi @! I bet your farm did great this past summer, huh?#$e#You're an excellent farmer.$h
Entries.fall_Wed: My friend runs a shop in the desert. If you ever go there stop in and say hi for me.#$e#I think she sells some rare products.
Entries.fall_Thu: Are you friends with Clint? He's a nice guy, if you get to know him.#$e#He gets lonely working in his shop all day. But he's so shy he has trouble making new friends.
Entries.fall_Thu8: I think Clint's mad at me. He never looks at me anymore...$u#$e#I always thought we were friends.$u
Entries.fall_Fri: Another beautiful fall day.#$e#It's a pity it'll soon be over.
Entries.fall_Fri6: Smell that clean air? It's lovely, isn't it?#$b#I just fear that the Joja Co.'s of the world will take this away from us.$u
Entries.fall_Sat: Keep your mind open and some interesting things might take root.#$e#Anyway, how is your day going?
Entries.fall_Sat6: I don't have any huge plans for life. I prefer not to stress about the future.
Entries.fall_Sun: Nothing like a sunny sunday to lift the spirits!
Entries.fall_Sun6: There's so many invisible barriers holding us back. Why can't people learn to let go and celebrate freedom?#$e#Me? Well, you know what they say... 'You can't cage a wild Junimo'.
Entries.fall_Sun10: You're such a nice person, @! Thanks for being my friend.$h
Entries.winter_Mon: Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head!
Entries.winter_Mon10: Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head! I wouldn't want you to get hurt!
Entries.winter_Tue: Oh, hello @!$h#$e#You must be getting very good at farming by now, huh?
Entries.winter_Tue2: I bet you're an excellent farmer by now!
Entries.winter_Tue4: I think my hair is frozen solid...$s
Entries.winter_Wed: Haley and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: It must be so cold for the poor fish.$s#$e#I wonder if any fish hibernate? Maybe I should ask Demetrius.
Entries.winter_Fri: If I wasn't so busy I'd help you dig around in that cave by the lake.#$e#I bet there are some powerful crystals inside there.
Entries.winter_Sat: Do you know how to cook 'Bean Hotpot'?#$e#I like that dish quite a bit.$h%revealtasteEmily207#$e#It's hard to get fresh ingredients in the winter, huh?
Entries.winter_Sun6: My sister and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss her if she left.#$e#I think she'll become a very nice young lady some day... Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#So, is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_Haley: Say hi to my sister for me! And remind her to visit me tomorrow.
