Entries.Introduction: Why, hello and welcome to our little community, dear! #$b#You can call me 'Granny' if you like.$h
Entries.reject_867: Oh, I'm sure George would be interested in that!
Entries.reject_866: That's a very pretty rose, dear. Have you shown it to Emily? It makes me think of her.
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Oh, sweetie... that was so nice of you to put Pam up in a beautiful new house!$h#$e#It warms my heart when people take care of each other like that...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Call me a silly old fool... but I think I have an idea who paid for Pam's new house... *wink*
Entries.MovieInvitation: Oh my! That's so kind of you, dear. Why yes... I'd love to go to the movies!$h#$b#You go on ahead, and I'll meet you at the theater.
Entries.Mon: Oh my! What a lovely day.$u
Entries.Tue: Don't mind my husband, George. He isn't very friendly to strangers.#$e#If you get to know him better he'll warm up to you.#$e#I'm sure you two could become good friends one day!$h#$e#Since you're so interested in my husband I'll let you in on a little secret: he really likes leeks! You can find them in the mountains this time of year.
Entries.Wed: #$1 evelynGarden1#I saw the most beautiful family of butterflies sunning themselves in the town garden yesterday.$k#$e#The good Mayor put me in charge of the town's public gardens.#$e#I've been working on the town flower beds for weeks, so don't step on them!
Entries.Thu: I'll be baking cookies today. I like to make flower shapes in the spring.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.Fri: George spends the whole day in front of that darned television set.#$e#I wish he'd go outside more. Some fresh air would do him good.
Entries.Sat: I used to love looking at the clouds, but I have trouble seeing them these days.#$e# My eyes just don't work as well as they used to.$s
Entries.Sun: It's nice to be so close to the ocean. The sound of the sea makes going to sleep a lot easier.#$e#As kids we hunted for seashells after the tide went out. Those were the days...
Entries.Tue6: It's nice of you to take the time to visit George and I.#$e#Without young people around, we'd age much faster.$h
Entries.Event_cookies2: What was that, dear? I could've sworn you said 'hockey puck'. *sigh* My ears aren't what they used to be.$s
Entries.summer_Mon: I feel more energetic in this wonderful weather.$u
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my grandson doing? I imagine he's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#He deserves to be happy... he's a good boy.
Entries.summer_Tue: George is always a little less grumpy in the summer. The warm weather softens his bones.#$e#You might not be able to tell, but I can. I've known him for sixty years!
Entries.summer_Wed: The good Mayor put me in charge of the town's public gardens.#$e#I've been working on the town flower beds for months, so don't step on them!
Entries.summer_Thu: I'm going to bake cookies today. They're coconut wonders shaped like little palm trees! Heehee.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.summer_Sat: Be careful out there, dear. You could get sunburnt!
Entries.summer_Sun: Sweet peas are in bloom right now.#$e#They've got such a wonderful fragrance, haven't they?
Entries.summer_Thu4: It seems like we always have more visitors when I start baking cookies.#$e#My mother taught me the recipe.
Entries.fall_Mon: With every year I appreciate the seasons more and more. For young people it's easy to let them slip by.
Entries.fall_Tue: I've been putting raisins in George's oatmeal... but he hasn't said a word. I wonder if he even notices these things?
Entries.fall_Wed: The good Mayor put me in charge of the town's public gardens.#$e#The fall flowers are delicate, so don't go stomping on them! I know how you kids like to do.
Entries.fall_Thu: Today I'm baking cookies. They're shaped like little pumpkins.$h#$e#Maybe I'll tell you my recipe one of these days.
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with Alex?#$e#Sometime he worries me sick.
Entries.fall_Sat_inlaw_Alex: Oh, hello my dear. I think of you as my own grandson now.$h^Oh, hello my dear. I think of you as my own grand-daughter now.$h
Entries.fall_Sun: My eyesight may be poor, but my nose hasn't failed me yet!#$e#I can smell fallen leaves and mushrooms. It reminds me of the forests I used to play in as a girl.
Entries.winter_Mon: Be careful you don't slip on the ice, dear.
Entries.winter_Tue: Aren't you cold? You should wear a thicker jacket, my dear!#$e#This weather isn't good for my joints...$s
Entries.winter_Wed: I usually tend to the gardens, but they're covered in snow.#$e#I still like to check up on them now and then.
Entries.winter_Sat: We've lived here for over 30 years.#$e#We've seen a lot of people come and go. Your grandfather, for one. Bless him... *sigh*
Entries.winter_Sat6: Oh... my dear. You have your grandfather's eyes...$s#$e#Yes... yes... I knew him very well.
Entries.winter_Sun: You should make some hot soup to stay warm.#$e#And make sure you wear a jacket!
Entries.winter_Sat8: @, have I told you that George and I have lived in our house for 30 years?#$e#I hope you stay here for a while.$h

Introduction.0: Selamat datang di kota kecil kami, nak! #$b#kau bisa memanggilku 'Granny' jika kau suka.$h

reject_867.0: Oh, aku yakin George akan tertarik dengan ini!

reject_866.0: Sungguh mawar yang indah, nak. Bukankah harusnya kau menunjukkan pada Emily? Mawar ini mengingatkanku padanya.

pamHouseUpgrade.0: Oh, nak... Sungguh mulia perbuatanmu dengan memberi Pam rumah baru!$h#$e#Aku sangat senang ketika penduduk memperhatikan satu sama lain...

pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous.0: Haha, mungkin orang melihatku nenek tua bodoh... tapi aku tau siapa yang membelikan Pam rumah baru... *berkedip*

MovieInvitation.0: Oh Tuhan! Kau sungguh baik, nak. Tentu saja... Aku ingin pergi menonton film!$h#$b#Pergilah lebih dulu, aku akan menyusulmu di theater.

Mon.0: Ini hari yang sangat indah.$u

Tue.0: Jangan pikirkan suamiku, George. Dia sangat tidak ramah.#$e#Jika kau mengenalnya lebih baik, dia akan suka.#$e#Aku yakin kalian akan berteman akrab!$h#$e#Apaka kau sangat mengenalnya? Baiklah aku akan memberikan rahasianya: Dia sangat suka bawang perai! kau bisa menemukannya di gunung.

Wed.0: #$1 evelynGarden1#Aku melihat sekawanan kupu-kupu di taman kemarin.$k#$e#Mayor menyuruhku bekerja di taman.#$e#Aku bekerja merawat bunga dan rumput berminggu-minggu, jadi usahakan jangan diinjak!

Thu.0: Aku akan membuat kue hari ini. Aku suka bentuk bunga di musim semi.$h#$e#Kapan-kapan aku akan memberitahumu resepnya.

Fri.0: George menghabiskan waktunya di depan Televisi.#$e#Aku ingin sekali-kali dia keluar. Udara segar baik untuknya.

Sat.0: Aku sangat suka memandangi awan, tapi akhir-akhir ini susah melakukannya.#$e# Mataku mulai tidak bekerja secara semestinya.$s

Sun.0: Hari yang bagus untuk ke pantai. Suara laut mudah membautmu tertidur.#$e#Saat kecil aku suka sekali mencari kerang. Itu sudah lama sekali...

Tue6.0: Hari yang bagus untuk menjenguk George dan aku.#$e#Tanpa orang-orang disektar, kami cepat bosan.$h

Event_cookies2.0: Apa itu, nak? Aku bersumpah kau berkata 'nenek lampir'. *sigh* Atau telingaku yang mulai tidak berfungsi.$s

summer_Mon.0: Aku sangat energik di musim yang indah ini.$u

summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex.0: Bagaimana cucuku? Aku membayangkan dia hudp bahagia di kebun.#$e#Dia pria yang baik.

summer_Tue.0: George sedikit pemarah di musim panas. Udara panas membuat tulangnya lemas.#$e#Kau tidak akan mengetahuinya, tapi aku tau. Aku sudah mengenanlnya selama 60 tahun!

summer_Wed.0: Mayor menyuruhku bekerja di taman.#$e#Aku bekerja merawat bunga dan rumput berbulan-bulan, jadi usahakan jangan diinjak!

summer_Thu.0: Aku akan membuat kue hari ini. Bentuknya mirip buah kelapa! Heehee.$h#$e#Kapan-kapan aku akan memberitahumu resepnya.

summer_Sat.0: Hati hati diluar, nak. Kulitmu bisa terbakar!

summer_Sun.0: Bunga kacang polong tumbuh sekarang.#$e#Mereka membuat bau wangi, bukan?

summer_Thu4.0: Kelihatannya kita sering mendapat tamu setalah aku sering membuat kue.#$e#Ibuku yang memberikanku resepnya.

fall_Mon.0: Setapi tahun aku menyukai musim-musimnya. Untuk anak mudah itu tidak mudah ,kan?

fall_Tue.0: Aku menaruh kismis di Oatmeal George... tapi ia belum berkata apapun. Apa dia belum menyadarinya?

fall_Wed.0: Mayor menyuruhku bekerja di taman.#$e#Bunganya mudah sekali gugur, jadi jangan sampai kau injak! Aku tau kebiasaan anak kecil seperti kalian.

fall_Thu.0: Aku akan membuat kue hari ini. Bentuknya sperti labu.$h#$e#Kapan-kapan aku akan memberitahumu resepnya.

fall_Sat.0: Apa kau berteman dengan Alex?#$e#Kadang-kadang dia menghawatirkanku saat aku sakit.

fall_Sat_inlaw_Alex.0: Oh, halo nak. Aku menganggapmu sebagai cucuku.$h^Oh, halo nak. Aku menganggapmu sebagai cucuku.$h

fall_Sun.0: Penglihatanku buruk, tapi penciumanku masih bagus!#$e#Aku bisa mencium bau daun berguguran dan bau jamur. Itu mengingatkanku saat aku kecil, aku suka bermain di hutan.

winter_Mon.0: Hati-hati jangan sampai kepleset di es, nak.

winter_Tue.0: Apa kau tidak kedinginan? Kau harus pakai jaket yang lebih tebal, nak!#$e#Cuacanya sangat tidak bagus...$s

winter_Wed.0: Aku biasanya pergi ke taman, tapi sudah tertutup salju.#$e#Kapan-kapan aku harus memeriksanya.

winter_Sat.0: Kita tinggal di kota ini lebih dari 30 tahun.#$e#Kami melihat orang-orang datang dan pergi. Kakekmu, salah satunya.... *sigh*

winter_Sat6.0: Oh... nak. kau mempunya mata yang samadengan kakekmu...$s#$e#Iya... aku mengenalnya lebih baik.

winter_Sun.0: kau seharusnya membuat sup agar tetep hangat.#$e#Dan jangan lupa memakai jaket!

winter_Sat8.0: @, apakah aku sudah menceritanmu bahwa George hidup disini lebih 30 tahun?#$e#Aku berharap kau tinggal disini lebih lama.$h

Entries.Introduction: Hmmph... It's irritating to have to meet all these new people, huh?#$b#Name's George, by the way. Now buzz off... Hmmph.
Entries.accept_867: What's this?#$b#Hmmph... so you push this button first? What's this button do? Hmmph... *grumble*#$b#Hehe! Well, how about that! It's a new channel!$h#$b#Here, take this. It's a stone I found when I was a coal miner back in the day. Funny thing, it's glowed blue and stayed cold for over forty years. Like magic!
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Thanks for replacing that beat up old trailer... the new house is much nicer to look at.#$e#You know, I'll bet it increases the value of our property too!
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Welp... that new house blocks my view of the river a little... but it sure looks nicer than that old tin can Pam was livin' in.
Entries.MovieInvitation: You wanna see a movie with an old geezer like me? ...Well... okay. I'll meet you there.
Entries.joja_Begin: So... the old Community Center is gone, huh? Whatever happened to small-town values? It's a shame how times have changed...
Entries.Mon: I'm not much of a talker. Especially not to strangers, if you don't mind me saying.
Entries.Tue: Hmmph... Looks like another gloomy day.$s
Entries.Wed: Alex is my grandson. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: How can two men get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...^You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grandson found such a nice wife.
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two men to be together. But you're such a nice young man, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.^You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.
Entries.Thu: I can't talk right now, young man.^I can't talk right now, miss.#$e#My favorite program is on.
Entries.Fri: So you're a farmer, huh? At least it's honest work.
Entries.Sat: The weekend is no different than any other time, for me.#$e#That's how it is when you're retired.
Entries.Sun: Aren't you cold? They don't make sweaters like they used to.#$e#*Sigh*
Entries.Mon6: I'm surprised you want to be friends with an old-timer like me.
Entries.Thu6: Hello, @. Wanna watch the TV with me?
Entries.Fri4: My grand-pap was a farmer. It's a respectable profession.#$e#If I wasn't so darned old I'd come to your farm and show you a thing or two...
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with Alex.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s
Entries.Fri8: I've been thinking...Maybe I've been a little bit of a grouch.$s#$e#I used to think no one cared about us old folks.
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old man to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, son.^Take care, hun.
Entries.Wed10: @! Let me turn off this darned television and we can have a little chat.$h#$e#So what are the young people doing these days?
Entries.Tue10: You know, I shouldn't get too depressed about my legs.#$e#I should just be happy that I'm alive.$h
Entries.Thu10: When you get as old as me it's a lot harder to adjust to new things.#$e#One day you'll know what I mean.#$e#Go on, enjoy yourself while you're still young.
Entries.winter_1: Ohh... It's so cold.#$e#When you're young the cold doesn't bite as hard.

Introduction.0: Hmmph... Sangat menyebalkan bertemu orang baru, kan?#$b#Namaku George... sekarang pergi dari hadapanku... Hmmph.

accept_867.0: Apa ini?#$b#Hmmph... jadi pencet dulu tombol ini? Apa fungsi tombol ini? Hmmph... *grumble*#$b#Hehe! Lihatlah! Channel baru!$h#$b#Ini, ambil ini. Batu ini kutemukan saat aku masih menjadi seorang penambang. Uniknya, batu ini menyala biru dan tetap dingin selama 40 tahun. Seperti sihir!

pamHouseUpgrade.0: Terimakasih telah menggantikan mobil kemah tua itu... rumah baru lebih enak untuk dipandang.#$e#Kau tau, aku bertaruh itu membuat harga jual rumah disini meningkat juga!

pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous.0: Bagus... rumah baru itu menghalangi pandanganku ke sungai... tapi itu lebih bagus daripada kaleng tua tempat tinggal Pam dulu.

MovieInvitation.0: Kau ingin menonton film dengan kakek tua sepertiku? ...Hmm... okay. Kutemui kau disana.

joja_Begin.0: Jadi... Community Center tua itu sudah hilang ya? Masa bodoh dengan kehidupan alam ya? Sangat disayangkan pemikiran generasi sekarang...

Mon.0: Aku bukan tipe orang yang banyak omong. Aplagi dengon orang yang tidak dikenal.

Tue.0: Hmmph... Sepertinya ini hari yang suram.$s

Wed.0: Alex adalah cucuku. Apakah kau sudah tau?#$e#Baiklah kalau begitu.

Wed_inlaw_Alex.0: Bagaimana kalian bisa menikah? Itu tidak alami... Hmmph. Aku kira aku hanya "old fashioned"...^Kau sekarang bagian dari keluarga. Aku senang dia punya istri yang baik.

Wed10_inlaw_Alex.0: Agak aneh kalian bersama. Aku tau kalian anak muda yang baik dan saling mencintai... Aku teah mengubah pikiranku.^Kau sekarang bagian dari keluarga dan aku sangat bangga.

Thu.0: Aku tidak bisa ngobrol sekarang, anak muda.^Aku tidak bisa ngobrol sekarang, nyonya.#$e#Program favoritku sudah tayang.

Fri.0: Kau adalah petani ,kan? Itu merupakan pekerjaan yang mulia.

Sat.0: Akhir pekan sama saja dengan hari biasa untukku.#$e#Itu ketika kau sudah pensiun.

Sun.0: Tidakkah dingin? Mereka tidak membuat sweater lagi.#$e#*Sigh*

Mon6.0: Aku kaget kau mau berteman dengan orang tua sepertiku.

Fri4.0: Kakekku seorang petani. Itu peerjaan yang terhormat.#$e#Jika aku tidak terlalu tua aku mungkin akan mengunjungimu dan mengajarimu beberapa hal...

Wed8.0: Aku harap kakiku lebih kuat sehingga aku bisa bermain dengan Alex.$s#$e#Tapi itu tidak akan terjadi.$s

Fri8.0: Aku berpikir... Mungkin aku sering menggerutu.$s#$e#Aku pikir tidak ada yang perhatian dengan orang tua seperti kami.

Fri10.0: Kau tau, Aku dikenal sebagai orang tua galak. Tapi aku sekarang lebih halus daripada buah yang layu. Hehe!$h#$e#Jaga dirimu, anak muda.^Jaga dirimu, nyonya.

Wed10.0: @! Bolehkah aku mematikan Televisinya dan kita saling mengobrol.$h#$e#Jadi apa yang biasanya anak muda lakukan?

Tue10.0: Kau tau, aku seharusnya tidak depresi dengan kakiku.#$e#Aku seharusnya bahagia aku hidup.$h

Thu10.0: Saat kau tua sepertiku, sangat susah melakukan hal baru.#$e#Suatu hari kau akan tau apa maksudku.#$e#Pergilahn, nikmati selagi kau masih muda.

winter_1.0: Ohh... dingin sekali.#$e#Ketika kau muda dingin tidak terlalu berat.

Entries.ComeBackLater: ...Come back when you've got something to show me, kid

ComeBackLater.0: ...Kembalilah saat kau punya sesuatu untuk ditunjukan, bocah

Entries.Introduction: Well hello there! I'm Gus, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.$h
Entries.accept_865: *sniff* sniff* ... that sharp smell!#$b#*slurp* *slurp* ... that zesty taste! That gritty texture!#$b#It can only be gourmet tomato salt! I'll trade you for it.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Hey, @! Glad you're here. I'm gonna be serving up some good stuff from behind the bar.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll see you back home, @.
Entries.Resort: Meet me at the bar if you need a beverage.
Entries.IslandSouth_14_21: Hey, need a drink? I've got some special beverages that showcase local ingredients from this island.$h
Entries.willyCrabs: These might be the best crab cakes I've ever made...
Entries.Mon: Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.#$e#That's one of the benefits of being a bartender.$h#$e#Sometimes I hear too much...
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Hey. I heard what you did for Pam. That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I saw Pam earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!#$e#Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!$h
Entries.Saloon: Good evening. Can I get you anything?
Entries.Saloon4: Good evening. Make yourself at home.
Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Hi, Pierre!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/Pierre! What's fresh?/Pierre! Waddya got for me?
Entries.Saloon8: Hi there @. I'm glad to see you! You're always welcome here.
Entries.Saloon_Tue: Hi! Please relax and enjoy yourself.
Entries.Saloon_Thu: Hey, you look like you could use a beverage.
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Business has been really good tonight. I'm pleased.
Entries.Tue: I sell different dishes each week, so make sure and check in every now and then!#$e#You might taste something spectacular.$h#$e#Just let me know if you have any allergies.$s#$e#Okay, see you around.
Entries.Wed: Emily's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu: Pam and Clint come into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive them away!
Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Emily with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
Entries.Thu8: Pam comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgement on my customers.
Entries.Fri: Hi there, @. If you're ever thirsty, the Saloon is the place to be.
Entries.Fri4: I don't actually drink very much myself. I'm mainly doing this to make a living.#$e#Although I do enjoy a taste of the Stardew Valley vintage from time to time.
Entries.Sat: Are you much of a chef, @?#$e#If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.#$e#Home-cooked meals make great gifts, as well.
Entries.Sun: Business has been pretty steady thanks to my regular customers.

Introduction.0: Halo! Perkenalkan aku Gus, pemilik dari Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Berkunjunglah jika kau ingin beristirahat. Aku punya kopi atau bir untuk diminum.$h

accept_865.0: *sniff* sniff* ... bau tajam ini!#$b#*slurp* *slurp* ... rasa unik ini! Dan teksture ini!#$b#Apalagi kalau bukan tomat garam! Aku ingin membelinya.

Resort_Entering.0: Hey, @! Senang kau disini. Aku akan memberimu 'barang bagus' di belakang bar.

Resort_Leaving.0: Sampai jumpa di kota, @.

Resort.0: Temui aku di bar kalau kau butuh minuman.

willyCrabs.0: Ini mungkin cake kepiting terbaik yang pernak kubuat...

Mon.0: Yeah, Banyak orang tinggal dikota ini.#$e#Itulah keuntungan menjadi bartender.$h#$e#Kadang-kadang aku terlalu banyak mendengar...

pamHouseUpgrade.0: Hei. Kudengar apa yang kau lakukan untuk Pam. Itu sungguh perbuatan baik!$h#$e#Sayangnya, kupikir itu tidak akan mempengaruhi kebiasaan minumnya...

pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous.0: Aku tadi bertemu Pam... dia tersenyum sangat lebar! Ia bilang seseorang membelikannya rumah baru!#$e#Siapapun itu, dia benar-benar the best!$h

SeedShop_Entry.0: Hai, Pierre!/Sekarang, apa yang kau butuhkan.../Ah, itu terlihat bagus!/Membuat sausku makin nikmat!/Pierre! apanya yang segar?/Pierre! Kau mempunyainya?

Saloon8.0: Hai @. Senang bertemu denganmu! kau selalu datang kesini.

Saloon_Fri.0: Pekerjaan kadang baik dimalam hari. Aku tersanjung.

Tue.0: Aku menjual hidangan yang berbeda tiap minggu, jadi sering-seringlah mengeceknya!#$e#kau mungkin akan terkesima.$h#$e#Tolong bilang kepadaku jika kau punya alergi.$s#$e#Okay, sampai bertemu kembali.

Wed.0: Emily sudah bekerja lama disini. Aku tidak tau apa jadinya jika tanpa dia!#$e#Aku malas membersihkannya sendiri.$s

Thu.0: Pam dan Clint datang ke bar setiap malam.#$e#Aku mungkin akan bangkrut jika mereka berhenti datang.$h#$e#Jadi jangan sampai kau bermusuhan dengan mereka!

Thu6.0: Clint datang ke bar tiap malam dan duduk di meja yang sama.#$e#Kadang-kadiang dia memandang Emily dengan tatapan gugup. Hmmm.#$e#Mungkin itu alasan dia sering kesini. Ah, itu bukan urusanku.

Thu8.0: Pam datang ke bar hampir tiap malam dan minum terlalu banyak bir.#$e#Ah, seharusnya aku tidak membatasi pelangganku.

Fri.0: Hai @. Jika kau haus kenapa tidak mampir ke bar?

Fri4.0: Aku tidak pernah minum terlalu banyak. Aku melakukannya untuk hidupku.#$e#Walaupun aku menikmati panan di Stardew Valley dari masa ke masa.

Sat.0: Apakah kau pandai memasak @?#$e#Jika kau punya dapur dan resep, kau bisa membuat hidangan yang nikmat.#$e#Hidangan buatan sendiri sangat cocok sebagai hadiah.

Sun.0: Pekerjaanku sangat tergantung pelangganku.

Entries.Introduction: Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, nevermind.$h
Entries.Resort_Entering: I saw a dolphin on the way in!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: There's something about the sun that just makes me feel good.
Entries.Resort_Shore: It's strange the places life can take you... who knows what other lands are out there?
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Wow, look at how the sunlight sparkles on the horizon!$h#$b#I bet the sunsets here would make for an amazing photo.#$e#I have to remember to bring my camera next time.
Entries.Resort_Towel: Getting the perfect tan is an artform...#$e#It's kind of like toasting a marshmallow... you have to rotate the body just right.$h
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Laying out on a tropical beach.#$b#*sigh* I think I've finally found my place in the universe.#$e#But I guess Stardew Valley's not such a bad place either!$h
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: Emily's friend had this swimsuit shipped to me from all the way out in Zuzu City.#$e#City fashion is on a whole different level, isn't it?$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: I painted my toenails blue to match the sea. What do you think? *wiggle* *wiggle*$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus made a cute, fruity drink just for me!$h
Entries.Resort: This is such a perfect beach. I'd stay here forever if I could!
Entries.divorced: I'll be fine on my own...$7#$e#Thanks for the memories.$7#$e#Why are you still clinging to me? Go live your own life.$7
Entries.breakUp: Agh!$8#$b#Oh... hmph. Beat me to it, huh? Alright...
Entries.dumped_Girls: I've got nothing to say to you!$a
Entries.secondChance_Girls: Alright, alright... I'm done giving you the cold shoulder. Just promise me you'll never, ever lie to me again.$s
Entries.Mon: This town is so small. It sucks.$u#$e#I have to drive, like, twenty miles to buy any decent clothes.$s#$e#That's why I usually just order online.#$e#What?
Entries.Tue: Nice shoes.^Nice makeup.#$b#Are those made out of plastic?^Or wait... Are you even wearing any?#$e#I'm bored.
Entries.Wed: The only thing I like about this town is the beach.$u
Entries.Thu: #$1 HaleyClothes#I've decided I am going to organize my clothes today. I'll have to throw out all of last year's styles to make room for the new ones!#$e#*sigh* I could really go for a cupcake right now.#$e#Do you need something?
Entries.Fri: %Haley is ignoring you.
Entries.Fri2: Don't you get tired of running around on that farm all day, or whatever it is you do?#$e#I couldn't stand getting all dirty like that.#$e#You probably get a nice tan, though.
Entries.Sat: I'm feeling an urge to go shopping. Ugh! I wish there was a mall here.
Entries.Sun: My sister is so weird. Sometimes I wonder if we're actually related.$u
Entries.Wed8: There are only two things I like about this town.#$b#One of them is the beach.#$e#The other one is a secret! *giggle*$h
Entries.Tue2: I wonder if any nice shells washed up on the beach this morning?#$e#This isn't the best time of year for shells, though.
Entries.Wed4: I'm glad that the flowers are starting to bloom.#$e#Those pink ones smell so good.$h
Entries.Fri6: I need to find some kind of hobby other than shopping.#$e#I've decided I want to expand my horizons.#$e#Maybe I should learn to play the mini-harp?
Entries.Mon6: I used to complain about this town being so small, but I've grown to like it.#$e#If it was much bigger it wouldn't feel like a community.
Entries.Thu6: I cooked dinner last night. It actually turned out okay!#$e#But I did make a huge mess in the kitchen...
Entries.Sun6: I'm thinking about donating a bunch of clothes... I must have a hundred pairs of shoes.
Entries.Sat8: #$1 haleySeagull#Yesterday I found a seagull with her wing caught in a net. I set her free, of course. She looked so helpless, the poor thing.$k$s#$e#You know, I should probably start exercising more... this youthful metabolism won't last forever.
Entries.Fri10: @, can we go on a camping trip someday?#$e#The most exotic place I've been is Zuzu city.
Entries.Event_clean2: NO!! I'm not going to do it!$a#$b#You guys are both stupid!%fork$a
Entries.Event_clean3: She should take the 'high road'? What's that supposed to mean?$u#$b#You think I'm being a baby, huh?%fork$a
Entries.Event_jar1: Great, then you shouldn't have any problem opening this jar for me!$h
Entries.Event_jar2: Oh... you aren't? Hmmm...$s#$b#Well could you try opening this jar for me anyways?
Entries.Event_darkroom2: Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos.
Entries.Event_darkroom5: Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos.
Entries.Event_beach1: No, you won't! This bracelet was passed down to me by my great-grandmother!$a
Entries.Event_beach2: *sigh*$s#$b#...Maybe it'll wash up on another shore. I can't bear to think of it at the bottom of the ocean.$s
Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. But not anymore! He's immature.
Entries.Event_room2: What? That sounds fun, but I wouldn't want to leave Stardew Valley right now...
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going to get such a nice tan this summer.
Entries.summer_Wed: Um... Yes?#$e#I didn't hear you, I'm thinking about something else.
Entries.summer_10: Do you have baby bunnies on your farm? Bunnies are SO cute! <
Entries.summer_Thu: If you stay in the sun a lot it'll make your hair lighter.#$e#It's a good thing to know!
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alex is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.summer_Sat: Farming sounds so boring...#$q 42/43 summer_Sat_old#What do you even do all day?#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Care for plants#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Explore the caves#$r 43 -10 summer_Sat_13#Snoop around in your room#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Dig for treasure
Entries.summer_Sat_old: #$p 43#Hey, you better not be snooping around in my room anymore!$a|But I guess it could get you in pretty good shape.
Entries.summer_Sat_12: Hmm... sounds like a lot of work.
Entries.summer_Sat_13: What? You'd better not be doing that!$a
Entries.summer_Sun: Emily usually cooks dinner... But she makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Tue2: Do you wear those clothes every day?
Entries.summer_Tue4: $p 47#Hey I found this new tool to open jars with. So you won't need to help me anymore.$h|There's not a cloud in the sky today.$h
Entries.summer_Wed4: It's so hot today!#$e#I wish I had some ice cream.$s
Entries.summer_Fri4: I spent 3 hours practicing my signature today.#$e#I guess that's pretty silly, huh?
Entries.summer_Thu6: If you stay in the sun a lot it will make your hair lighter... But you don't want to get sunburnt, either.#$e#I just want a healthy amount of sunlight. Everything in moderation, right?
Entries.summer_Mon6: I should start reading some books instead of magazines.#$e#It's good to learn things, isn't it?#$e#I only ever look at the pictures.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my sister for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, Emily's not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell her I said so.
Entries.summer_Sat6: It seems like a good day to go swimming.
Entries.summer_Tue8: I guess living in the country isn't so bad.#$e#If I lived in the city I might start to miss all the trees.#$e#@, I think I've been hanging out with you too much.$h
Entries.fall_Mon: It's gross when all these fallen leaves get slimy.
Entries.fall_Tue: Hmm... Something smells weird...#$e#You've been working on the farm, huh?
Entries.fall_Wed: Oh, hi. Did you want something?
Entries.fall_Thu: I feel the urge to go shopping. *sigh*
Entries.fall_Fri: Is that a grass stain on your knee?#$e#Sorry, I'm allergic to grass.
Entries.fall_Sat: It's too cold to go to the beach anymore.#$q 44 fall_Sat_old#*sigh*...what do you think I should do today?#$r 44 10 fall_Sat_12#Watercolor painting#$r 44 20 fall_Sat_12#Relax and read a magazine#$r 44 -30 fall_Sat_13#Stop being a selfish crybaby
Entries.fall_Sat_old: I'll probably take a nap later.
Entries.fall_Sat_12: Hmm... That's a pretty good idea, actually.
Entries.fall_Sat_13: Get away from me, you stupid jerk.$a
Entries.fall_Sun: I've never been to the forest. It's muddy and I could get a blister on my foot.
Entries.fall_Tue2: Something smells earthy...#$b#Oh, right. You work on a farm.
Entries.fall_Fri4: You look like you've been doing a lot of hard work.#$b#Why don't you take the rest of the day off?
Entries.fall_Wed4: If you're ever bored, come say hi.
Entries.fall_Thu6: Shopping just doesn't sound as fun as it used to.#$e#What's happening to me?#$e#Hmm...
Entries.fall_Mon6: $p 48#Did I ever tell you I found another one of my great-grandma's bracelets in the attic?|See this bracelet? It belonged to my great-grandmother.#$e#She was a really interesting lady.
Entries.fall_Sun6: I've never been to the forest, you know.#$e#It might be interesting to explore it some day.
Entries.fall_Tue8: I'm starting to like the smell of dirt. Isn't that weird?#$e#I think it's because you're around all the time.$h
Entries.fall_Mon10: @, I'm happy to see you today.$h
Entries.winter_Mon: I want to move somewhere warmer.
Entries.winter_Tue: Hi. Do you need something from me?#$e#...
Entries.winter_9: Hmm. What brand is your shirt?#$e#Oh. Um, nevermind.
Entries.winter_Wed: I wish someone would bring me a peppermint coffee.$s#$e#Don't even bother, I know you won't be able to make one.
Entries.winter_Thu: I'm going to start writing a list of all the clothes I need for next spring.
Entries.winter_Fri: Do you have a pony on your farm?$h#$e#Oh. That's disappointing...$s
Entries.winter_Sat: The only good thing about winter is that I get to sleep more.#$e#I like at least 10 hours of sleep every night.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to Alex for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Tue2: Your name is @, right?#$e#I keep forgetting.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hi @.#$e#Is anything exciting happening on your farm?
Entries.winter_Wed6: I think I'm starting to realize that clothes aren't the most important thing. Right?#$e#I still like clothes, though. I mean, what's wrong with expressing yourself a little?
Entries.winter_Thu6: Maybe I'll donate some of my skirts to a charity this spring.#$e#I mean, I do have over 1,000 skirts.$h#$e#...what?
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alex could you tell him I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Mon8: I wish it were warmer here in Stardew Valley.#$e#I could move somewhere else, but...
Entries.winter_Fri8: Do you think you'll ever have a pony on your farm?
Entries.winter_Sat8: I'm glad you have less work to do in the winter.#$e#It must be nice to have a break, huh?
Entries.winter_Sun10: @, you look rugged today. I like it.^@, you look pretty today.#$e#...$h

Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harvey, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h
Entries.Resort_Entering: Sunscreen? Check...#$b#Sun hat? Check...
Entries.Resort_Leaving: If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin.
Entries.Resort_Shore: I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!
Entries.Resort_Chair: It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.#$b#The trouble is actually letting go of your worries...$s
Entries.Resort_Bar: It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water!$h
Entries.Resort: I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties.$s
Entries.danceRejection: Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... have plans to ask someone else.$s
Entries.divorced: I... I can't look at you. Please spare me any more pain.$s
Entries.breakUp: ...Y...You...?$s#$b#*gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick...$s
Entries.dumped_Guys: I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: I want you back in my life, @. I'm willing to forget what happened.$s
Entries.Mon: We sell a few over-the-counter medicines at the clinic... feel free to stop by if you're feeling exhausted.#$b#I know that being a farmer is pretty tiring work... don't overdo it!
Entries.Mon2: I feel responsible for the health of this whole community... it's kind of stressful.#$e#It's a pretty small community, and I'm fortunate to be able to build a good relationship with my patients.
Entries.Mon6: I'd like to stay in Stardew Valley for a while. I'm finally starting to feel involved in the community.#$e#It feels good to know that you're useful.
Entries.Mon10: Oh! Hi, @.$l#$e#Do you... have any medical questions?$l
Entries.Tue: Feel free to stop by my office if you're ever feeling ill.#$e#You're young, though. You'll probably stay healthy without trying.$h
Entries.Tue8: Don't overwork yourself, @. Doctor's orders!#$e#Your health is important to me.$l
Entries.Wed4: I'd like to get to know you better, @. Let's put aside our doctor-patient relationship.
Entries.Wed6: It's nice to have a friend in town.$h
Entries.Wed8: You have a really healthy glow. That's good.$h
Entries.Wed: Remember to cover your mouth when you sneeze.#$e#Then make sure to wash your hands.
Entries.Thu8: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.$s#$e#If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.$l
Entries.Thu: Nutrition is important, so make sure and eat well. Try to increase your vegetable intake!#$e#Home-cooked meals are best. Do you cook?
Entries.Fri: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?#$e#I wish I had less work to do.$s
Entries.Fri4: If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic.
Entries.Fri10: Stop by my place if you ever need a confidential check-up.$l
Entries.Sat: Can I do anything for you?#$e#Take care.
Entries.Sat4: I came here because I liked the small-town atmosphere, and the potential for a holistic approach to patient care.#$e#I've grown to really love it.$h
Entries.Sat8: *Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...#$e#The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.$s#$e#I think I'll stay younger with you around.$l
Entries.Sun: Hmm... I'm struggling to make ends meet. I don't have enough patients.#$e#I guess I should try to get patients from the neighboring towns...
Entries.Sun6: Imagine having a patient's life completely in your hands, and failing to keep them alive... that's something that will haunt you forever.$s
Entries.event_george1: Thanks, @.$h#$b#You see, George, I'm just trying to help you.
Entries.event_george2: *Sigh*$s#$b#Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.
Entries.event_heart1: Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?#$b#Just try and relax. I'm here to help.$h
Entries.event_heart3: Um. Okay... If you say so.$s
Entries.summer_Mon: It's okay to get a moderate amount of sunlight. Just don't get burnt.#$e#Okay. Take care! Stay healthy.
Entries.summer_Thu: Exercise is important, but don't get too exhausted, or you might end up at my clinic!#$e#Make sure and listen to your body.
Entries.summer_Fri: People don't get sick much during the summer. That's nice, but it also means less business for me.
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you been going into the mines, @?#$e#It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it.
Entries.fall_Sat: When you eat certain foods you'll perform better.#$e#Eating a 'Farmer's Brunch' will give you the nutrition you need to water and harvest crops better!
Entries.winter_Wed: It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.#$e#Make sure to wash your hands often.
Entries.winter_Sun: I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.#$e#I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.#$e#Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!

Introduction.0: Senang bertemu denganmu. Aku Harvey, dokter lokal.#$e#Aku melakukan check-ups dan prosedur kesehatan untuk semua penduduk Pelican Town. Ini adalah tugas yang mulia.#$e#Aku harap kau juga menemukan pekerjaan yang mulia.$h

Resort_Entering.0: Sunscreen? Ok...#$b#Topi pantai? Ok...

Resort_Leaving.0: Jika kulitmu terbakar, sedikit krim aloe vera akan membuat kulitmu nyaman.

Resort_Shore.0: Aku menyisiri sepanjang pantai untuk mencari pecahan kaca. Kita tidak ingin seseorang terluka!

Resort_Chair.0: Dapat kesempatan untuk bersantai sesekali, boleh juga.#$b#Masalahnya adalah bagaimana agar pikiranmu bisa tenang...$s

Resort_Bar.0: Sangat penting menjaga asupan air di udara yang panas ini. Aku akan bertanya pada Gus, siapa tau dia punya air kelapa!$h

Resort.0: Aku akan memberitaumu sebuah rahasia... Aku tidak bisa berenang tanpa pelampung.$s

danceRejection.0: Oh! Maaf... Aku, aku... punya rencana mengajak orang lain.$s

divorced.0: Aku... Aku tak kuat memandangmu. Tolong jangan beri aku rasa sakit lagi.$s

breakUp.0: ...K...Kau...?$s#$b#*gulp*... K... Kurasa aku tidak enak badan ...$s

dumped_Guys.0: Aku sibuk. Aku tidak bisa bicara denganmu.$s

secondChance_Guys.0: Aku ingin kau kembali di kehidupanku, @. Aku akan melupakan apa yang telah terjadi.$s

Mon.0: Kami menjual obat-obatan di klinik.. mampirlah jika merasa lelah.#$b#Aku tahu bahwa menjadi petani adalah pekerjaan yang cukup melelahkan ... jangan berlebihan!

Mon2.0: Aku merasa bertanggung jawab untuk kesehatan seluruh masyarakat.#$e#Disini adalah kota yang cukup kecil, dan aku beruntung untuk dapat membangun hubungan yang baik dengan pasienku.

Mon6.0: Aku ingin tinggal di Stardew Valley untuk sementara waktu. Akhirnya aku mulai merasa terlibat di dalam masyarakat.#$e#Rasanya baik untuk tahu bahwa kau berguna.

Tue.0: Jika kau merasa tidak enak badan, jangan ragu datang ke kantorku.#$e#Tapi, kau masih muda. Kau mungkin akan selalu sehat.$h

Tue8.0: Jangan memaksakan dirimu, @.#$e#Kesahatan sangat penting untukmu.$l

Wed6.0: Lebih baik jika punya teman di kota ini.$h

Wed8.0: kau memiliki badan yang sehat. Bagus sekali.$h

Wed.0: Ingatlah untuk menutup mulut ketika bersin.#$e#Lalu jangan lupa mencuci tangan.

Thu8.0: Sebagai dokter aku punya banyak kerjaan. Aku bahkan jarang makan.$s#$e#Jika aku tidak hidup sendiri aku pikir akan lebih mudah.$l

Thu.0: Nutrisi sangat penting, jadi pastikan kau makan dengan benar. Coba tingkatkan asupan sayuran!#$e#Masakan rumah adalah yang terbaik. Apa kau bisa memasak?

Fri.0: Ini hari yang indah, bukan?#$e#Aku ingin beristirahat sebentar saja.$s

Fri4.0: Jika kau ingin mengunjungi apartemenku, kau bisa mengajakku. Aku tinggal didekat klinik.

Fri10.0: Mampir tempatku jika kau ingin mengecek kesehatanmu.$l

Sat.0: Apa yang bisa aku bantu?#$e#Take care.

Sat4.0: Aku datang kesini karena aku suka udaranya, dan potensi untuk mendekatkan pasien.#$e#Aku benar-benar menyukainya.$h

Sat8.0: *Sigh*... Aku mulai merasa agak tua...#$e#Semakin tua kau akan mendapatkan lebih banyak kenangan. Hal ini dapat luar biasa.$s#$e#Aku merasa lebih muda jika bersamamu.$l

Sun.0: Hmm... Aku berjuang untuk memenuhi kebutuhan. Aku tidak punya cukup pasien.#$e#Aku kira akua harus mencoba untuk mendapatkan pasien dari kota-kota tetangga...

Sun6.0: Bayangkan jiga hidup dan mati pasien berada di tanganmu... Itu sangat menghantuiku.$s

event_george1.0: Terima kasih, @.$h#$b#Kau lihat, George, Aku hanya mencoba membantumu.

event_george2.0: *Sigh*$s#$b#Lihat, George. Jika kau ingin  tetap bersikap seperti ini aku akan harus memberitahu istrimu. Aku berpikir dia tidak akan senang.

event_heart1.0: Oh! Rumah sakit membuatmu gugup, ya?#$b#JCoba santai. Aku di sini untuk membantu.$h

event_heart3.0: Um. Okay... Jika kau berkata begitu.$s

summer_Mon.0: Tidak apa-apa mendapatkan banyak sinar matahari. Tapi jangan sampai terbakar.#$e#Baik. Jaga tubuhmu.

summer_Thu.0: Latihan memang penting, tapi jangan terlalu lelah, atau kau mungkin berakhir di klinikku!#$e#Dengarkan suara tubuhmu.

summer_Fri.0: Orang-orang jarang sakit, itu bagus sekali. Tapi itu mengurangi bisnisku.

fall_Fri.0: Pernahkah kau pergi ke tambang, @?#$e#Itu tempat yang berbahaya. Aku menyarankan jangan kesana.

fall_Sat.0: Ketika kau makan dengan benar, kau akan tampil lebih baik.#$e#Makanlah 'Farmer's Brunch' akan memberikan nutrisi yang cukup!

winter_Wed.0: Musim ini banyak yang flu. Sebaiknya kau hati-hati.#$e#Pastikan kau mencuci tanganmu.

winter_Sun.0: Aku benci mengatakan ini, tapi penghasilanku bertambah saat musim flu.#$e#Aku kira jika orang berhenti sakit, aku akan bangkrut.#$e#Jangan salah paham! Aku ingin orang-orang sehat... sungguh!

Entries.Resort_Entering: I see a crab!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I've got sand in my shoe...$s
Entries.Resort_Shore: I'm collecting seashells... I'm gonna make a necklace!
Entries.Resort: Aunt Marnie told me not to get burnt... But when I walk fast, it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay.$h
Entries.Mon: Oh...Are you looking for Aunt Marnie?$u
Entries.Mon4: Hi, Mr. @.^Hi, Ms. @.#$e#It's fun to live on a farm.$h
Entries.Tue: What? *giggle*$h#$e#...hi.
Entries.Tue6: You can play with my dolls if you want to. Just make sure to brush their hair when you're done.
Entries.Wed4: Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!$s#$e#I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!
Entries.Thu: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers...$u
Entries.Thu2: Miss Penny is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#She has such pretty handwriting.
Entries.Fri: ... I don't know you.$u
Entries.Fri4: I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk.
Entries.Sat: You smell like grass.$u
Entries.Sat2: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it.
Entries.Sat8: You're always so nice to me, Mr. @$h^You're always so nice to me, Ms. @.$h#$e#Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different.
Entries.Sun: Um... d...do you want something?$u#$e#I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.$u
Entries.Sun2: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h
Entries.Sun10: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s

Resort_Entering.0: Aku lihat kepiting!

Resort_Leaving.0: Sepatuku dimasuki pasir...$s

Resort_Shore.0: Aku cari kerang laut... Aku akan buat kalung!

Resort.0: Bibi Marnie bilang kulitku tidak boleh terbakar... Tapi kalau jalan cepat, rasanya dingin, jadi sepertinya tidak apa.$h

Mon.0: Oh...Apakah kau mencari bibi Marnie?$u

Mon4.0: Hai, Mr. @.^Hai, Ms. @.#$e#Menyenangkan tinggal di kebun ,bukan?$h

Tue.0: Apa? *giggle*$h#$e#...hai.

Tue6.0: Kau bisa main dengan bonekaku. Jangan lupa sisir rambutnya jika sudah digunakan.

Wed4.0: Bibi Marnie tidak memperbolehkan aku keluar diatas jam  6. Itu tidak adil!$s#$e#Aku sudah tidak takut kegelapan lagi!

Thu.0: Aku tidak ingin berbicara dengan orang tidak dikenal..$u

Thu2.0: Bu Penny mengajariku menulis.$h#$e#Tulisannya sangat bagus.

Fri.0: ... Aku tidak kenal kau.$u

Fri4.0: Aku suka di kebun... favorit ku es krim dari sapi peliharaanku.

Sat.0: Baumu seperti rumput.$u

Sat2.0: Kadang-kadang aku melihat kadal di sungai. Jangan bilang ke Bibi Marnie... aku memberi makan ke sapi.#$e#Ia menyukainya.

Sat8.0: kau selalu baik kepadaku, Mr. @$h^kau selalu baik kepadaku, Ms. @.$h#$e#Orang tua biasanya membosankan, tapi kau tidak.

Sun.0: Um... apa...apakah kau butuh sesuatu?$u#$e#Aku tidak mau berboicara dengan orang tidak dikenal.$u

Sun2.0: Shane sudah pergi dan Bibi Marnie sibuk setiap saat... jadi aku bermain sendiri.#$e#Aku berterima kasih kepada mainanku.$h

Sun10.0: Apakah kau tau kalau Shane ayah angkatku? Ia teman baik orangtuaku.$s#$e#...Tapi mereka sudah tiada.*sniff*$s

Entries.Introduction: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm Jodi.#$e#It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a farmer around could really change things.
Entries.Resort_Entering: What a treat!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I think I'll make seafood tonight.$h
Entries.Resort: The view is breathtaking! Deep blue as far as the eye can see...
Entries.Resort_Bar: We all love it when Gus shows up.
Entries.reject_864: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. Maybe you should show it to him?
Entries.Mon: Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.#$e#Yes?
Entries.Mon6: It's nice to have a family... but I'd be lying if I said I never miss the freedom of being young...$s
Entries.2_1: My husband Kent is a soldier, working overseas. That's why he's not here right now.#$b#I know he'll come back safe once his tour is over!!#$e#Need something?
Entries.Tue: Exercise is important for staying healthy. I always make sure to set aside some time for it.#$e#As a parent, I don't have much time to devote to myself. So I try and make every minute count.
Entries.Wed4: I wish I could spend more time outside, but there's so much work to do.#$e#I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my hands soft.#$e#The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy.$s#$e#Ok, bye!
Entries.Wed: What did you say? It's %time already? My goodness!#$e#I still have tons of work to do!$s
Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. He was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell him I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.Thu: So you're a farmer, huh? Interesting.#$c .5#I've never met a farmer before.$k#$e#Maybe some day you can teach me how to grow vegetables.$h
Entries.Fri: $d Joja#The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!|The food at Pierre's is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Entries.Sat: Hi.#$e#Need something?
Entries.Sat4: I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old farm.#$e#Once you've got everything in order, it's going to add a lot to our community!$h#$e#It's going to be a lot of work for you, though.#$e#Bye.
Entries.Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my husband's safe return.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my husband's safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Entries.Sun: #$c .5#I'm taking a break from house chores today.$h#$e#I'm taking the day off.$h#$e#If I don't spend any time outside, I'll go crazy!#$e#Plus I don't want my legs to turn soft.
Entries.Sun8: I had a dream that I had complete freedom, no obligation to anyone but myself...#$b#...Then I woke up and realized I had a full day of house chores ahead of me...$s#$e#But I don't regret having a family, @... Sam and Vincent mean everything to me!
Entries.summer_Mon: Summer is nice, but it also means more work.#$e#I'll have to keep the garden in shape on top of working in the house!
Entries.summer_Tue: Hello.#$e#Do you need something? I'm a little busy.
Entries.summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam: How's my little Sammy doing on the old farm?$h
Entries.summer_Thu: Housework is frustrating because you're never finished.#$e#The day after I sweep the floor, it's dirty again.
Entries.summer_Sun: What in the world am I going to make for dinner?#$e#*sigh*...
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the boys a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a man now, though.#$b#I hope he hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam: Is Sam just bumming around the farm, or is he contributing?
Entries.fall_Sun: Caroline and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
Entries.fall_Sun2: When you become a parent, you have to leave your old lifestyle behind.#$e#Maybe that's not entirely true... but if you're not careful, it will happen.
Entries.winter_Mon: I loved playing in the snow when I was a kid. The great thing about being a mother is that I get to enjoy it again.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Hi. Do you get tired of people asking about your farm all the time?#$e#I think I would.
Entries.winter_Tue6: *sigh*... Sometimes I dream about life on my own... without a family to look after. Is that horrible?$s#$e#Don't tell anyone.$4
Entries.winter_Wed2: What do I do for fun? Hmm... That's a good question.#$e#I like sleeping.$s
Entries.winter_Wed4_2: Kent has been home for a while now, but he still seems uneasy.$s
Entries.winter_Thu: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of his. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since he moved out...
Entries.winter_Thu8: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with Kent being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.$s#$e#I can't believe I'm saying this to you.$4
Entries.winter_Fri: It would be nice to take a vacation once in a while...$s
Entries.winter_Sun: If I was rich the first thing I'd do would be to hire a maid and a chef.#$e#My goodness, that would be nice!$h

Introduction.0: Oh! kau tidak persis dengan apa yang aku bayangkan ... tapi tidak apa-apa! Aku Jodi.#$e#Ini adalah sebuah kota kecil yang tenang, sehingga sangat menarik ketika seseorang bergerak dalam hal baru!.

Resort_Entering.0: Luarbiasa!

Resort_Leaving.0: Sepertinya aku akan makan seafood malam ini.$h

Resort.0: Pemandangannya sungguh menakjubkan! Sejauh mata memandang, semua berwarna biru...

Resort_Bar.0: Kita semua senang ketika ada Gus.

reject_864.0: Apa ini? Ini terlihat seperti teman Kent dari medan perang. Mungkin kau harus menunjukkan ini padanya?

Mon.0: Mempertahankan rumah tangga adalah pekerjaan yang sulit ... tapi seseorang harus melakukannya.#$e#Yes?

Mon6.0: Aku suka punya keluarga... tapi aku berbehong jika aku tidak punya kebebsaan saat muda dulu..$s

2_1.0: Suamiku Kent adalah seorang prajurit, dia bekerja di luar negeri. Itu sebabnya dia tidak di sini sekarang.#$b#Aku tahu dia akan kembali setelah semuanya selesai!!#$e#Butuh sesuatu?

Tue.0: Latihan itu penting untuk tetap sehat. Aku selalu memastikan untuk menyisihkan waktu untuk itu.#$e#Sebagai orang tua, aku tidak punya banyak waktu untuk mencurahkan untuk diriku sendiri. Jadi aku mencobanya setiap menit.

Wed4.0: Aku berharap aku bisa menghabiskan lebih banyak waktu di luar, tapi ada begitu banyak pekerjaan yang harus dilakukan.#$e#Aku mulai memakai sarung tangan karet untuk menjaga tanganku lembut.#$e#Semakin tua, Semakin banyak pekerjaan yang harus kammu lakukan untuk tetap sehat.$s#$e#Ok, bye!

Wed.0: Apa katamu? Ini %time already? My goodness!#$e#Aku masih punya banyak pekerjaan!$s

Thu6.0: Kemana semua waktunya pergi? *sigh*#$e#Aku ingat ketika Sam masih bayi memakai popok. Dia seperti anak kecil yang lucu.$s#$e#Jangan ceritakan dia.$h#$e#kau benar-benar ingin berbicara dengan ku, ya?

Thu.0: Jadi kau seorang petani, ya? Menarik.#$c .5#Aku belum pernah bertemu seorang petani sebelumnya.$k#$e#Mungkin suatu hari nanti kau bisa mengajariku bagaimana untuk menanam sayuran.$h

Fri.0: $d Joja#Makanan di JojaMart mungkin tidak sehat untuk keluargaku, tetapi dengan harga rendah seperti kau akan menjadi malas untuk berbelanja di tempat lain!|Makanan di Pierre ini begitu jauh lebih segar dan sehat dari apa yang pernah aku beli di JojaMart. Aku rindu mereka menjual dengan harga murah.

Sat.0: Hai.#$e#Butuh sesuatu?

Sat4.0: Aku sangat senang kau mencoba untuk meningkatkan pertanian.#$e#Setelah kau punya segala sesuatu, itu akan menambahkan banyak komunitas kami!$h#$e#Ini akan menjadi banyak pekerjaan untukmu.#$e#Bye.

Mon2.0: #$1 JodiAltar#Kemarin aku mengunjungi Yoba's Altar untuk meminta suamiku kembali aman.#$e#Aku mencoba untuk tetap positif, tapi kadang-kadang sulit.$s

Sun.0: #$c .5#Aku mengambil istirahat dari tugas-tugas rumah hari ini.$h#$e#Aku mengambil cuti.$h#$e#Jika aku tidak menghabiskan waktu di luar, aku akan gila!#$e#Ditambah aku tidak ingin memnuat kakiku lemah.

Sun8.0: Aku punya mimpi mempunyai kebebasan, bukan orang lain tapi diriku...#$b#...Lalu aku terbangun dan melihat semuanya peduli denganku...$s

summer_Mon.0: Musim panas yang bagus, tetapi juga berarti lebih banyak pekerjaan.#$e#Aku harus menjaga taman dalam bentuk yang baik!

summer_Tue.0: Halo.#$e#kau butuh sesuatu? Aku sedikit sibuk.

summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam.0: Bagaimana kabar Sammy kecilku di kebunmu?$h

summer_Thu.0: Pekerjaan rumah tangga membuat frustasi karena tidak pernah selesai.#$e#Sehari setelah aku menyapu lantai, itu kotor lagi.

summer_Sun.0: Apa di dunia aku akan selalu membuat untuk makan malam?#$e#*sigh*...

fall_Thu.0: Mungkin aku sudah terlalu memanjakannya. Mereka tidak pernah melakukan pekerjaan apapun.#$e#Aku ingin mereka bisa menikmati masa kecil mereka saat mereka masih bisa. Sam pada dasarnya akan menjadi dewasa.#$b#Aku berharap dia tidak tumbuh menjadi pemalas.$s#$e#Menjadi orang tua tidak mudah.

fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam.0: Apakah Sam hanya bermalas-malasan di kebun, atau dia ikut kerja juga?

fall_Sun.0: Caroline dan aku adalah teman baik. Aku menceritakan semuanya.

fall_Sun2.0: Ketika kau menjadi orang tua, kau harus meninggalkan gaya hidup lamamu.#$e#Mungkin tidak semuanya benar.

winter_Mon.0: Aku suka bermain disalju saat kecil. Hal yang bagus ketika jadi seorang ibu adalah kau dapat melakukannya lagi.$h

winter_Tue.0: Hai. Apa kau tak capek jika orang-orang bertanya tentang kehidupan kebunmu?#$e#Kalau aku pasti capek.

winter_Tue6.0: *Hahh~*... Kadang aku bermimpi hidup sendiri... tanpa keluarga yang harus kujaga. Apa aku jahat?$s#$e#Jangan beri tau yang lain.$4

winter_Wed2.0: Apa yang harus aku lakukan untuk bersenang-senang? Hmm ... Itu pertanyaan yang bagus.#$e#Aku suka tidur.$s

winter_Wed4_2.0: Kent telah memiliki rumah untuk sementara waktu sekarang, tapi ia masih tampak gelisah.$s

winter_Thu.0: Sam membuat banyak suara dengan musik-nya. Aku berharap itu tidak mengganggu tetangga.

winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam.0: Bagaimana kabar Sam? Harus ku akui, rumah menjadi lebih bersih sejak ia pindah...

winter_Thu8.0: Aku terburu-buru ke dalam pernikahan Kent. Lalu ia menjadi seorang tentara ... aku hampir tidak punya, dan sekarang sudah terlambat untuk pernah kembali.$s#$e#Jangan membuat kesalahan yang sama.$4

winter_Fri.0: Akan lebih baik untuk mengambil liburan sekali-kali...$s

winter_Sun.0: Jika aku kaya hal pertama yang aku lakukan adalah menyewa pembantu dan koki.#$e#Ya tuhan, itu akan menyenangkan!$h

Entries.Mon: Hello, farmer.#$e#I've been gone so long... I feel like a stranger.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Hey, @. Nice to see you.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Time to head home.
Entries.Resort_Shore: Standing on this beach... I feel a rare sense of peace.$h#$e#The ocean is a very special thing.
Entries.Resort_Chair: This is a great place to bond with the family. I really appreciate you fixing it up.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Just getting some water.
Entries.Resort: The boat ride was fun. I even got to use some of my nautical training to help navigate.$h
Entries.MovieInvitation: Erm... okay. Thank you. I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.accept_864: ...!$4#$b#...Where did you find this?$4#$b#...$5#$b#This man... We fought together in the war, @. He was like a brother to me. #$b#But... only one of us made it back.$5#$b#He never lost his courage, though. Even in the face of death. A true hero... I'll never forget him.#$b#Thanks for bringing me this... It means a lot to me.#$b#Here, take this. It's been sitting in the back of our cupboard for years, and we've never used it.
Entries.reject_865: Yep... It's been tightly sealed, so the flavor should still be really potent.
Entries.Mon4: I don't know if I'll ever get used to being back home.#$e#The peacefulness of the town feels like a mask. That's probably just me though.
Entries.Tue: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Well, except that you're here.
Entries.Tue2: Things haven't changed much since I've been gone.#$e#Except that we have a new farmer in town.$h
Entries.Wed6: ...I lost a lot of friends in battle.$s#$e#What's sad is that I can't even remember their faces.#$e#...
Entries.Wed: You've been here a while now, haven't you? Your farm must be thriving.
Entries.Thu6: #$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#Sam has really grown up since I left. He's a man now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for him.$s

Entries.Thu_inlaw_Sam: Hey, @. Are you enjoying the married lifestyle?
Entries.Fri: It looks like a decent day for fishing, doesn't it?
Entries.Sat: Jodi tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it.
Entries.Sat8: I have trouble sleeping, so please excuse me if I seem tired.#$e#I'm sure you can understand.
Entries.Sun: I don't know what to do with myself now that I'm back.#$e#I'm used to having more structure in my day.

Entries.event_popcorn3: Don't lie to me! I hate lies more than anything!$u

Entries.4: ...Have you encountered others like me, in the mines? I'm sorry if they were hostile towards you. You see, we've learned to fear humans... there have been too many... unpleasant encounters.#$e#You haven't... slain any of my friends, have you?
Entries.8: A 1000 year war between my people and the dwarves recently ended. There's still a lot of resentment on both sides.
Entries.15: Please keep my location a secret. If the dwarves knew of me, they'd surely send an assassin.
Entries.reject_868: Oh, it's an arctic shard! That's a very rare magical item.#$b#I'd bring that to the Wizard if I were you!
Entries.Wed: I find things here and I sell them. Care to buy anything?
Entries.Wed6: If you put your ear up to the right pipe, you can hear into any house from down here.#$b#I wouldn't eavesdrop, though!$3
Entries.Thu: Please don't tell anyone about me.#$b#Humans tend to destroy things they can't understand.
Entries.Thu6: Please don't tell anyone about me.#$b#Most humans are frightened by us shadow people... maybe for good reason.$s#$b#But regardless, if the townspeople knew about me, I might not be safe here.
Entries.Tue: I am too sensitive to sunlight to go out on most days.#$b#The conditions in here are perfect.#$e#Care to buy anything?
Entries.Mon: Please, don't be alarmed. I am different than the others.#$e#I've spent a lot of time observing humans. I know you like to shop. Care to see my wares?
Entries.Mon2: Back again? I suppose it does fit into my theory of human behavior.
Entries.Sat: On Fridays I stay silent as a sign of devotion to Yoba.
Entries.Sun: ...Sorry, I'm still a little wary of humans. My shop is still open to you, however.
Entries.Sun4: You're not like the other humans, are you?
Entries.Sun8: You've opened my eyes to the world of humans. I appreciate that.

4.0: ...Apakah ada yang lain sepertiku di tambang? Maaf kalau mereka memusuhimu. Kita telah belajar untuk menakuti manusia... Karena banyak pengalaman pertemuan dengan manusia yang tidak menyenangkan.#$e#Jangan-jangan... Kau pernah membunuh temanku?

8.0: Perang selama 1000 tahun antara kaum-ku dan para kurcaci baru-baru ini berakhir. Masih banyak kebencian di kedua sisi.

15.0: Harap rahasiakan lokasiku. Jika para kurcaci tahu keberadaanku, merekan pasti mengirim seorang pembunuh.

reject_868.0: Oh, sebuah pecahan arctic! Itu merupakan barang magic yang sangat langka.#$b#Kalau aku, aku akan memberinya kepada Wizard!

Wed.0: Saya menemukan banyak hal di sini dan saya menjualnya. Silahkan jika ingin membeli sesuatu?

Wed6.0: Jika kau meletakkan telingamu di pipa, kau dapat mendengar rumah manapun dari bawah sini.#$b#Tapi aku tidak suka menguping!$3

Thu.0: Jangan beritahu siapa pun tentangku.#$b#Manusia cenderung untuk menghancurkan hal-hal yang mereka tidak mengerti.

Thu6.0: Kumohon jangan beritau siapapun tentangku.#$b#Kebanyakan manusia takut dengan makhluk bayangan... Mungkin itu yang terbaik.$s#$b#Lagipula, jika warga kota tau tentangku, aku tidak akan aman disini.

Tue.0: Aku terlalu sensitif terhadap sinar matahari.#$b#Kondisi di sini sempurna.#$e#Silahkan jika ingin membeli sesuatu

Mon.0: Tolong, jangan khawatir. Aku berbeda dari yang lain.#$e#Aku telah menghabiskan banyak waktu mengamati manusia. Aku tahu kau hanya ingin berbelanja.

Mon2.0: Kembali lagi? Aku kira kau itu tidak masuk ke dalam teoriku tentang perilaku manusia.

Sat.0: Pada hari Jumat saya diam sebagai tanda pengabdian kepada Yoba.

Sun.0: ...Maaf, aku masih sedikit waspada manusia. Tokoku masih terbuka untukmu.

Sun8.0: kau telah membuka mataku ke dunia manusia. Aku hargai itu.

Entries.Introduction: Hello, it's nice to meet you. $h#$e#You picked a good time to move here... The spring is lovely.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes.$h
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Well, that was deeply relaxing.
Entries.Resort: I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective.
Entries.Resort_Shore: The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.#$e#I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture.
Entries.Resort_Chair: I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still.$h
Entries.Resort_Wander: Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.#$e#Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship!$h
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.#$e#I think I saw some tasty looking walnuts growing on a bush nearby.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Have you tried the Piña Colada? I'm on my second one... hehe.
Entries.danceRejection: I'll be honest. I don't want to dance with you.$u
Entries.divorced: I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be.$u
Entries.breakUp: Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff...$s
Entries.dumped_Girls: I don't want to see you for a while...$s
Entries.secondChance_Girls: You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us.$s
Entries.Beach: I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?
Entries.Mon: The trees look nice today, don't they?#$q 21/22/211132 Mon_old#So why did you become a farmer?#$r 21 -5 Mon_21#I want to make tons of money.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#It's more "real" than living in the city.#$r 211132 5 Mon_211132#To follow in grandpa's footsteps.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#I wanted to escape my old life.
Entries.Mon_old: $p 21#So are you making as much money as you hoped?|Spending time in nature is very rewarding.
Entries.Mon_21: Hmm. That seems kind of shallow, doesn't it?$s
Entries.Mon_22: That's pretty much the reason I came here, too!$h
Entries.Mon_211132: That's very sweet to honor your grandfather like that.
Entries.Tue4: Hi. Oh, you want to talk?#$e#The landscape around here gives me a lot of ideas. The terrain is almost like a sculpture itself.#$e#I don't make art for money. It's just an urge that I have.#$e#Farming seems like a very rewarding profession. You get to create delicious food for everyone!$h#$e#You're probably busy. Sorry.
Entries.Tue: Hello, neighbor.#$e#We both live outside of town. Does that mean something?
Entries.Wed: #$1 LeahBug#This morning I accidentally stepped on a bug.$s#$e#Sometimes I think it's impossible to live without destroying nature in some way.
Entries.Wed6: I love being around animals. They're so innocent.#$e#Farm animals are wonderful, too.$h
Entries.Wed8: Hi @! I was just thinking about you and your farm.#$e#I was imagining how good it must feel to harvest a big bunch of crops.$h#$e#Wouldn't it be nice to have help, though?$l
Entries.Thu: There's actually a lot of wild food in this area, if you know where to look.#$e#I've been having fresh salads almost every day.$h
Entries.Thu6: Foraging is a specialty of mine. Someday I'll make you a fresh salad.$h
Entries.Fri: It's simpler to be friends with the trees. They don't have much to say.$h
Entries.Fri2: We wouldn't be able to survive without nature. It's good to remember that.
Entries.Fri4: Hello, @. It's a nice day, isn't it?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.Sat: I love to decorate for the different seasons.
Entries.Sat8: Farming sounds so fun. I want to try it, someday.$l
Entries.Sun: If you hear any banging from inside my hut, it's probably just me working on one of my sculptures.
Entries.Sun8: If you ever find any interesting looking driftwood, I could use it.#$e#It would be special that you gave it to me.$l
Entries.event_sculpt2: There's nothing wrong with that... I think there's lots of beauty to be found in raw, untouched nature!#$b#But as a human, I'm also interested in how we shape and interpret the world around us... I guess what I'm saying is that I'm interested in 'art'.
Entries.event_sculpt3: You pig!%fork$a^Oh! You're...? Me too.$6#$b#Get out!$a^That's good to know.$l
Entries.event_parents1: You're right... I just wouldn't have been happy back there.$u#$b#It was better for both of us... to end an unsustainable relationship while we were still young and flexible.$u
Entries.event_parents2: That's a little harsh... but, yeah. We had different priorities.$u
Entries.event_parents3: Oh yeah? Well maybe I'll just leave, then!%fork$a
Entries.event_parents4: *sigh*...$s#$b#I guess you're right... it was kind of selfish. But can you really blame me for wanting to be happy? Ugh... I don't know...$s
Entries.event_parents5: *sigh*...$s#$b#Maybe you're right... Humans are selfish creatures. I don't know. $s#$b#I probably shouldn't dwell on it. We all have to make hard choices from time to time.$s
Entries.summer_1: You can tell it's summer by the sweet smell of nectar wafting through the air!$h
Entries.summer_Mon: I found some wild fruits this morning!#$e#Sorry, I don't have any left.$s#$e#Keep looking, I'm sure you'll find something.
Entries.summer_Tue: The sound of farm animals is great, isn't it?
Entries.summer_Tue4: The simple things in life are best: a soft summer breeze, majestic clouds, and a goblet full of Stardew Valley red.
Entries.summer_Thu6: I have a good eye for wild fruit. Some day I'll make you a nice fruit salad.$h
Entries.summer_Fri: You can use a tapper to harvest syrups and other useful liquids directly from trees.#$e#It's a slow process, but the result can be quite valuable.
Entries.summer_Fri2: I hate to be blunt, but if we don't treat nature with respect, our grandchildren will be doomed.#$e#Don't you think so?
Entries.summer_Fri6: Hello, @. Do you ever get lonely on that big farm?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.summer_Sat: The flowing water keeps my house a little bit cooler in summer.#$e#I can't tolerate heat very well.
Entries.summer_Sun: What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$e#Any ideas?
Entries.fall_1: How quickly the seasons change!#$e#It's shocking.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$c .5#I found some wild mushrooms over the weekend!#$e#I had a huge plate of wild mushrooms and eggs for breakfast today... I'm still full.#$e#Keep your nose to the ground and you'll find some mushrooms yourself... I'm sure of it.
Entries.fall_Tue: I wonder if I could make a collage out of dried leaves?#$e#They're just so colorful... I can't help but think of the potential for art projects.$h
Entries.fall_Tue4: Everyone has a unique and interesting perspective, whether they believe it or not. Don't you think so?#$e#Although, some people have opinions that I just can't respect.
Entries.fall_Wed: It's so nice to live by the river.#$e#I fall asleep to the soothing sound of water every night.
Entries.fall_Thu6: One of these days I'll have to make you a wild mushroom stir-fry.$h
Entries.fall_Fri: Do you have a kitchen in your house?#$e#If you have a kitchen, you can cook all kinds of delicious meals.$h
Entries.fall_Fri6: Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.fall_Sat: Decorations accentuate the feeling of the season. I think it's a worthwhile tradition.
Entries.fall_Sun: There's a lot of good places to walk around here.#$e#It feels good to stretch your legs.
Entries.winter_Mon: I love the way everything looks when it's covered with fresh snow.
Entries.winter_Tue: It gets pretty cold in my little cabin.$s#$e#I just snuggle up under a huge blanket, and I'm okay.$h
Entries.winter_Wed: I saw a snow rabbit early this morning! They're rare, aren't they?
Entries.winter_Thu: I'm having a hard time finding fresh food to eat.#$e#I've been eating a lot of bread.$s
Entries.winter_Thu6: *Sigh*... It's hard to get fresh food in the winter.#$e#I bet your farm is pretty well stocked with food, huh?
Entries.winter_Fri: Time seems to move slower here.#$e#When I lived in the city, the year went by so fast.
Entries.winter_Fri6: Do you ever get cold in that farmhouse of yours?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you want to huddle under one of my quilts and drink cider.$h
Entries.winter_Sat2: Hello, @. Is there something you wanted to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun: Do you ever take a whole day off?#$e#It's a refreshing break.
