Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I feel inspired today... I think I'll do some writing.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: The sound of rain, in some tiny way, reminds me of my cabin by the beach.#$e#The farm is wonderful, but I do miss the sound of the ocean.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: I got up early and made coffee.[395]#$e#I find that a cup of this exquisite brew makes the early morning a lot more pleasant.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I think I'll remain indoors today, my dear. The rain causes my hair to go limp.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: My inspiration for writing is like the weather... it comes and goes at random. Today I feel entirely dull.$s#$e#Perhaps I'll read one of the classics to get my creative juices flowing.
Entries.patio_Elliott: Ah, what a lovely day to read a book... don't you think, my dear?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, @?^Good evening. Did you have a productive day, my dear?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: You're ice cold! Let me keep you warm.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't find the way to properly describe your allure.$l^My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't find the way to properly describe your beauty.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: What did I do today? I'll just say this... it takes a lot of work to maintain this rugged physique!
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I spent the afternoon daydreaming about the ocean. So I decided to cook some seafood. [198 202 727 728]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The bachelor life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made us a pot of coffee.[395]#$e#I find myself craving this robust flavor nearly every morning.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: If you find a spider in the house, don't squash it! Just let me know and I'll take the poor thing outside.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Today is going to be a fantastic day... I can feel it!$h#$e#I get this special feeling in my nose...
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I've had this recurring nightmare that you gave me a buzz cut... You wouldn't ever do that to me, would you?$s#$e#I trust you.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to my wonderful man.$l^From the brightest winter star, to the fragrant fairy rose... nothing can compare with your captivating beauty.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: A crackling fire adds wonderful ambience to the house... every piece of wood burns in a unique way.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I never had much success growing plant in my old beach house. Hopefully I can pick up a thing or two by watching you.#$e#In this respect, you are the master and I only a humble apprentice.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: When I behold thy wondrous face, a precious jewel of form and grace, my heart... torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.#$e#Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my feelings for you.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: My love... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.#$e#Nor 1000...#$e#Not even 10,000 bars, no.$7#$e#...$7#$e#No, not even 100,000 bars!$a#$e#...$s#$e#Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this...$8
Entries.Outdoor_0: My wildest dreams have come true... just look at this incredible landscape!
Entries.Outdoor_1: Fertile soil beneath my feet, fresh air to fill my lungs, and the sun's warmth to delight my skin... Life is going well.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I might stay here and write some poetry. I'm feeling a sudden surge of creativity! You go on ahead and take care of business.
Entries.Outdoor_3: If I stay perfectly still, perhaps a resplendent butterfly will bless my nose with a landing.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I drank too much coffee... my mouth feels about as dry as the Calico Desert.$s#$e#Oh... sorry about the coffee breath.$7
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you had any time to entertain little %kid1 today? Maybe a second child will make things easier for both of us.
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have the perfect childhood here. There's so much to explore.
Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good father.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They eat a lot for such small creatures!
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Da...da".$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: I'm going to teach %kid1 to read as soon as possible! That's a great way for children to learn about the world.
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've done well, @. The farm is doing excellent and our healthy children are a great joy. I couldn't be happier.
Entries.Good_0: @... I'm so proud of all your hard work. I'm very lucky to have you.$l
Entries.Good_1: I made a whole secret book of poems expressing my love for you.$l
Entries.Good_2: I came to the valley to find the ivory tower from which my talents could reign supreme. But what I really found was a dungeon of loneliness. You saved me from that.$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave? Your jawline is perfect.$l^Your feminine allure is irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you.$l
Entries.Good_4: I feel burnt out in your absence. But when I hear that sound of muddy boots on wood, my heart rises from the ash.
Entries.Good_5: I'm doing a walking meditation. It's good for creativity.
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! I do worry about you sometimes. There are people in the world who would take advantage of you.
Entries.funLeave_Elliott: I think I'll walk down to the beach today. It's always nice to see the ocean again.
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: I had a nice time at the beach by myself. I watched the waves come and go, just like old times.
Entries.spring_1: My new year's resolution is to write, write, and write! I can never stop improving my skills.
Entries.spring_12: It's strange, but I often have cravings for pomegranate in the spring.
Entries.spring_23: I look forward to dancing with you tomorrow, my dear.
Entries.summer_1: It's hard to be in a foul mood when the sun is beaming and the butterflies are dancing on a spice-berry breeze.$h
Entries.summer_10: I was going to grab an extra bottle of ink from my cabin today, but then I remembered the Luau is tomorrow. I'll just do it then.
Entries.summer_27: All good things must come to an end, including the joyful days of summer. The key to happiness is to accept change without judgement.
Entries.fall_1: The splendor of fall... a verdant banquet for all the senses to enjoy... has inspired some of the greatest poetry of all time.
Entries.fall_15: I might set my pride aside and sink my eager teeth into a sloppy, saucy barbecue sandwich tomorrow.
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a man has primitive urges...
Entries.winter_1: Winter is a great time to read books and play the piano. Remember to pause and enjoy a quiet moment or two.
Entries.winter_7: I'm a little out of practice, but I plan on entering the fishing contest tomorrow! You've got some stiff competition, dear.
Entries.winter_28: Happy new year's eve, my dear. Please accept this to celebrate. [348]

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I never told you this... but when you first moved here I had a dream about you. I knew right then that our life-paths would intertwine.$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Every moment has a unique and precious beauty... do you notice? It can be easy to forget, sometimes.
Entries.patio_Emily: This is my favorite spot for a morning meditation.#$e#I visualize the energy from this crystal garden flowing through my body.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I can hear the plants talking to each other... they're so happy after today's rain!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: How was your day, @? You look a little soggy.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: My day was very peaceful. How was yours?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Want some dessert? It's my special raw, gluten-free version, sweetened only with cactus syrup.[232 234 223 220]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Does the sound of rain ever put you in a trance?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Another beautiful day on %farm farm... I have faith that something good will happen today!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Here, take this. It's for you. [428 440 444 338 207 395 749]

Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Ughh... *gurgle*... I ate too many bran muffins for breakfast.$s
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Is that a new hole I see in your shirt? I can sew that up for you, no problem.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Welcome home, @. I hope you had a wonderful day.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Is it bed time already? My, the day just floated away from me again.$u
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Ah, that aroma! It can only be you.$h#$e#It's a good smell.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's a myth that rainy weather causes the flu. However, take care that you don't slip on the mud!#$e#I often worry about you.

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.#$e#For me, moving here was exactly what my body needed to find that balance.$l
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made you a nutritious breakfast.[201]#$e#Eggs are a good source of essential nutrients, so eat up.

Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm going to listen to some jazz music and finalize my medical reports today. What do you have planned?
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I was afraid of you when we first met. It's funny to think about now that we've come so far.$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Good evening... did you finish everything you needed to do today?#$e#Don't worry about me. I'm very self-sufficient. If you have more work to do go right ahead.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It's stressful to be a doctor, so it's really great to live somewhere as relaxing as %farm Farm.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Oh! I was just daydreaming about the circulatory system and forgot what I was trying to do. It's a classic doctor's problem.

Entries.TwoKids_2: Maybe %kid2 will grow up to become a pilot, like I never could?
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a bachelor forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.Good_1: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you.$l
Entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here... $l^I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Oh, my... you look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! I have nightmares about your limp body being wheeled into the emergency room.$7
Entries.funLeave_Harvey: I think I'll take a little walk today. I need to unwind.
Entries.funReturn_Harvey: I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, honey?
Entries.spring_1: It's wonderful to see all the plants return to life. The greenery is refreshing after a monochrome winter.
Entries.spring_12: Oh, it's a festival tomorrow, isn't it? Large crowds, activities... *gulp*$s
Entries.spring_23: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?$7#$e#It's always a little embarrassing.$7
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your husband and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!
Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I would put an item of high value and quality. We all want to leave a great impression on the governor!
Entries.summer_27: As summer draws to a close, and the colder season begins, my workload tends to increase. Sorry in advance if I'm a little moody...
Entries.fall_1: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, my dear.#$e#Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?
Entries.fall_15: Tomorrow's the fair. The food is very rich and salty, but I'm fine with splurging once in a while.$h
Entries.fall_26: I'll admit, the spirit's eve festival usually gives me intestinal pain... but I'll do my best to be brave.
Entries.winter_1: The air is very dry during winter. That's why our skin tends to become irritated.#$e#Don't worry, I'll rub a little truffle oil onto your back every night.$l
Entries.winter_7: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? I do enjoy the igloos...
Entries.winter_28: Well, here's to a fantastic year. I have complete confidence that next year will be even better!$h

Rainy_Day_0.0: It's a myth that rainy weather causes the flu. However, take care that you don't slip on the mud!#$e#I often worry about you.

Rainy_Day_1.0: It was so incredibly lonely living above the clinic by myself... I'm much happier now.$h

Rainy_Day_2.0: I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You looked so peaceful.

Rainy_Day_3.0: I don't mind the rain. Sure, I can't watch the planes go by, but I can still listen to the radio chatter.#$e#It makes the whole thing a little more mysterious.

Rainy_Day_4.0: I have a backlog of house chores I want to complete today. I've got plenty to keep me busy!

Rainy_Night_0.0: How was your day, honey? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in the latest issue of "Knee Surgery Enthusiast".

patio_Harvey.0: Kau tau, buku 'journal of tendon dynamics' sangat menyenangkan jika dibaca diluar.

Rainy_Night_1.0: If you're enjoying life, who cares if it's a little repetitive? That's what I say.

Rainy_Night_2.0: You look a little soggy, hun. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?^You look a little soggy, dear. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?

Rainy_Night_3.0: The sound of rain gives our minds something to focus on, so we're not distracted by random thoughts.#$e#That's my theory for why it's so soothing...

Rainy_Night_4.0: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#Just make sure to eat a reasonable portion, dear.

Indoor_Day_0.0: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.#$e#For me, moving here was exactly what my body needed to find that balance.$l

Indoor_Day_1.0: Good morning, @! I made you a nutritious breakfast.[201]#$e#Eggs are a good source of essential nutrients, so eat up.

Indoor_Day_2.0: I'm going to study the medical literature today. It's important for me to keep up-to-date so I can give my patients the best care possible!

Indoor_Day_3.0: I'm going to listen to some jazz music and finalize my medical reports today. What do you have planned?

Indoor_Day_4.0: I was afraid of you when we first met. It's funny to think about now that we've come so far.$h

Indoor_Night_0.0: You look exhausted, dear. Let me give you a massage tonight. I promise it will reduce the inflammation in your muscle tissue!$l

Indoor_Night_1.0: I took it easy today... spent some time reading books, fiddled with my radio, and worked on a model airplane.#$e#It's important to take a day off now and then to relax... stress is unhealthy.

Indoor_Night_2.0: Good evening... did you finish everything you needed to do today?#$e#Don't worry about me. I'm very self-sufficient. If you have more work to do go right ahead.

Indoor_Night_3.0: It's stressful to be a doctor, so it's really great to live somewhere as relaxing as %farm Farm.

Indoor_Night_4.0: Oh! I was just daydreaming about the circulatory system and forgot what I was trying to do. It's a classic doctor's problem.

Outdoor_0.0: This is a very safe spot. You go on ahead and take care of business, don't worry about me.

Outdoor_1.0: I believe this must be the ideal place to raise children, scientifically. What do you think?

Outdoor_2.0: I may not be the most exciting guy, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l

Outdoor_3.0: @... you... you mean the world to me.$l

Outdoor_4.0: As a scientist I'm fascinated by the delicate interplay of insect and plant life.

OneKid_0.0: You and %kid1 are the most important parts of my life.

OneKid_1.0: Little %kid1 is going to have the perfect childhood here. We're really fortunate to have this opportunity.

OneKid_3.0: So far, I really like being a father!$h

TwoKids_0.0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfasts. I'm trying to teach them to enjoy healthy food!

TwoKids_1.0: I believe a child should be allowed to play and explore to their heart's content. You're only a kid once.

TwoKids_2.0: Maybe %kid2 will grow up to become a pilot, like I never could?

TwoKids_3.0: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a bachelor forever.... I love you so much.$l

Good_1.0: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you.$l

Good_2.0: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here... $l^I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l

Good_3.0: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Oh, my... you look beautiful today.$l

Good_6.0: Be careful out there! I have nightmares about your limp body being wheeled into the emergency room.$7

funLeave_Harvey.0: I think I'll take a little walk today. I need to unwind.

funReturn_Harvey.0: I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, honey?

spring_1.0: It's wonderful to see all the plants return to life. The greenery is refreshing after a monochrome winter.

spring_12.0: Oh, it's a festival tomorrow, isn't it? Large crowds, activities... *gulp*$s

spring_23.0: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?$7#$e#It's always a little embarrassing.$7

summer_1.0: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your husband and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

summer_10.0: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I would put an item of high value and quality. We all want to leave a great impression on the governor!

summer_27.0: As summer draws to a close, and the colder season begins, my workload tends to increase. Sorry in advance if I'm a little moody...

fall_1.0: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, my dear.#$e#Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?

fall_15.0: Tomorrow's the fair. The food is very rich and salty, but I'm fine with splurging once in a while.$h

fall_26.0: I'll admit, the spirit's eve festival usually gives me intestinal pain... but I'll do my best to be brave.

winter_1.0: The air is very dry during winter. That's why our skin tends to become irritated.#$e#Don't worry, I'll rub a little truffle oil onto your back every night.$l

winter_7.0: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? I do enjoy the igloos...

winter_28.0: Well, here's to a fantastic year. I have complete confidence that next year will be even better!$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I sometimes find inspiration in the most unlikely of places.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I used to find rain depressing when I lived in the city. But here in Stardew Valley it's beautiful.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I got up early and did some mushroom hunting. Here, take one.[281 404 420 257]#$e#Searching for mushrooms is like going on a treasure hunt. It's a lot of fun.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: It's days like this I'm really happy about my heavy-duty boots.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: The trees have been begging for this rain... I'm happy for them.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day? Did you see any animals out there?
Entries.patio_Leah: Don't look too close, it's a work in progress.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I usually go for salad... but a wet night like this gives me cravings for hot soup.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: It's going to be relaxing to fall asleep on a night like this...$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I made a little wood sculpture today, but it was so ugly I threw it into the fire.$u#$e#I think to become a great artist, you have to be critical of your own work.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and stay warm.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Leah: How was your day today, dear? Muddy?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: This house is a lot nicer than my old cabin! I don't miss it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @. I've planted these in a little pot out back... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#I grew that with great love and attention. Enjoy it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Always remember to keep your eyes peeled for wild food! There's lots out there.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I was thinking... life's too short to eat bad food. Luckily, we live in one of the best regions for fresh greens and vegetables!#$e#Here, I made you a healthy salad. [196]#$e#I'm surprised you aren't sick of my salad yet!
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, @! I made us some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of coffee.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Something about this time of night makes me thirsty.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: The flow of time is so delicate... even the tiniest decision changes the future forever.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's so much lovelier here at night than the garish glow of the city.#$e#Everything worked out perfectly for me. I'm very lucky.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I never thought I'd receive a mermaid's pendant so soon after moving here! I'm happy about it, though.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I saw a wild rabbit today. I just wish I could pet one someday. They look so soft...
Entries.Outdoor_0: The cool breeze feels nice. It reminds me of living by the river.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm... I'm going to do some maintenance over here. I just get the urge to do some hammering now and then.
Entries.Outdoor_2: It's going to be a special day, I can sense it.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Ah... that smell of fresh dirt. There's nothing quite like it.$h#$e#You can just tell the air is clean here... it feels good in the lungs.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.funLeave_Leah: I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house.
Entries.funReturn_Leah: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?
Entries.OneKid_3: It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for the outdoors.
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?
Entries.Good_0: Living here, I feel like I'm on the summit of a great mountain.
Entries.Good_1: Did I ever tell you... when you first moved here I had a dream that we'd be together someday.
Entries.Good_2: Sometimes it's hard not to believe in destiny... the fact that I decided to move here, and that we found each other.#$b#It could've gone entirely differently at any point.
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... I'll cherish this treasure for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Entries.Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l
Entries.Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.
Entries.Neutral_1: I wonder who lived here before us?
Entries.Neutral_2: Don't you have anything to do today?
Entries.Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_4: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money, @?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?s
Entries.Bad_3: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Entries.Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a
Entries.Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s
Entries.Bad_7: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Entries.Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better.$s
Entries.spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
Entries.spring_1: That was some way to ring in the new year last night...$l
Entries.spring_15: *sigh*... I guess it's time for the 'spring cleaning' again.$s
Entries.summer_1: Ah, summer... I can smell the spice berries already.$h
Entries.summer_9: Sorry if I'm wet to the touch... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.summer_2: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
Entries.fall_1: I love fall for the mushroom hunting opportunities. It comes and goes pretty fast.
Entries.fall_20: Have you planned for winter at all? It's good to have a stockpile of hay.
Entries.fall_2: I know harvest season is a busy time for you. I'll try and help out as much as I can.
Entries.winter_1: Winter's here, and that means crystal fruit is in season. It has such a unique flavor, don't you think?
Entries.winter_7: I'm looking forward to carving ice sculptures tomorrow. I only get to do it once a year, but it's a lot of fun!
Entries.winter_28: Hey, here's to another great year at %farm farm! Let's have some fun tonight! [348]$h#$e#Next year is going to be great, I can feel it.

Rainy_Day_0.0: Kadang aku menemukan isnpirasi saat cuaca seperti ini.

Rainy_Day_1.0: Saat cuaca hujan dikota aku merasa depresi. Tapi di Stardew Valley sangat indah.

Rainy_Day_2.0: Salamat pagi! Aku bangun lebih awal dan memasak jamur. Ini, pilih satu.[281 404 420 257]#$e#Mencari jamur sama seperti mencari harta karun. Sangat menyenangkan.$h

Rainy_Day_3.0: Hari ini aku suka mengginakan sepatu heavy-duty bootsku.$h

Rainy_Day_4.0: Pepohonan sangat mengharapkan hujan... Aku sangat suka mendengarnya.

Rainy_Night_0.0: Bagaimana harimu? Apa kau meihat ada binatang di luar sana?

patio_Leah.0: Jangan lihat terlalu dekat, itu masih dalam tahap pengerjaan.

Rainy_Night_1.0: Aku biasanya membuat salad... tapi malam seperti ini paling enak membuat sup.$h

Rainy_Night_2.0: Dengan cuaca seperti paling enak beristirahat sambil tidur...$l

Rainy_Night_3.0: Aku tadi memahat kayu tapi karena hasilnya jelek jadi aku membuangnya.$u#$e#Aku pikir aku akan jadi seniman yang hebat, kau juga harus bekerja lebih keras.

Rainy_Night_4.0: Aku suka kau di rumah... Ini malam yang bagus untuk tidur di balik selimut.

Indoor_Day_0.0: Rumah ini jauh lebih baik daripada rumahku!.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Selamat pagi, @. Silahkan ambil... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#Aku menumbuhkannya dengan cinta dan perhatian. Aku harap kau menikmatinya.

Indoor_Day_2.0: Selalu buka matamu saat mencari bahan makanan! Sangat banyak diluar sana.

Indoor_Day_3.0: Aku berpikir... hidup terlalu singkat jika hanya makan makananan yang buruk. Untungkya kita hidup di lingkungan yang hijau dan banyak tanaman!#$e#Ini, aku membuatkanmu salad. [196]#$e#Aku kaget kau tidak sakit perut makan saladku!

Indoor_Day_4.0: Selamat pagi, @! Aku membuatkanmu kopi.[395]$h#$e#Pagi hari kurang lengkap jika tidak ada secangkir kopi.

Indoor_Night_0.0: Kadang aku suka haus saat malam hari.

Indoor_Night_1.0: Waktu adalah hal yang sensitif... Bahkan keputusan sekecil apapun dapat merubah masa depan.

Indoor_Night_2.0: Aku lebih suka disini daripada gemerlap kota.#$e#Semua bekerja keras untukku. Aku sangat beruntung.

Indoor_Night_3.0: Aku tidak percaya mendapat kalung setelah aku pindah kesini! Aku sangat senang.$l

Indoor_Night_4.0: Aku melihat kelinci liar tadi. Aku ingin hewan peliharaan. Mereka begitu lucu...

Outdoor_0.0: Udara yang sejuk sangat nikmat. Mengingatkan ku dengan rumah lamaku.

Outdoor_1.0: Hmm... Aku akan melakukan perbaikan hari ini. Aku butuh palu dan beberapa peralatan lainnya.

Outdoor_2.0: Ini akan jadi hari yang spesial, Aku bisa merasakannya.

Outdoor_3.0: Ah... bau udara kotor. Tidak ada yang seperti itu.$h#$e#Kau haru tau disini udaranya bersih... itu bagus untuk paru-paru.

Outdoor_4.0: Jangan terlalu bekerja keras, sayang.#$e#Pastikan kau istirahat sekali-kali atau makan makanan bergizi.$h

funLeave_Leah.0: Aku akan jalan-jalan hari ini. Aku butuh udara segar.

OneKid_3.0: Menyenangkan jadi orang tua. Aku pastikan %kid1 suka dengan lingkungan luar.

TwoKids_3.0: Kita punya kebun yang menakjubkan dan keluarga yang tentram. Kehidupan baru kita baru saja dimuluai, benar kan?

Good_0.0: Tinggal disini, serasa berada di puncak gunung.

Good_1.0: Apa aku pernah menceritaknmu... bahwa setelah aku pindah dari kota akun akan bersamamu suatu hari nanti.

Good_2.0: Kadang tidak sulit menjalani takdir... faktanya aku pindah kesini dan tinggal bersamamu.#$b#Itu bukan bohong belaka.

Good_3.0: Wow, kau terlihat ganteng hari ini!$l^Kau terlihat cantik.$l

Good_5.0: Aku menghargai cincin pernikahan kita... Ini adalah harta karun dalam hidupku.$l

Good_6.0: Hati-hati duluar sana! Kadang aku menghawatirkanmu.

Good_7.0: @? Aku menghargai kerja kerasmu sebagai kepala rumah tangga.$h

Good_8.0: Jangan mencemaskanku... Aku tau kau punya kepentingan diluar sana. Aku baik-baik saja sendirian!$l

Good_9.0: Oh, Aku bosan... Aku hanya menikmati tinggal disini.#$e#Ini kehudpan yang simpel, tapi aku menyukainya.$h

Neutral_0.0: Aku harap kau masih mencintaiku saat aku tua nanti.

Neutral_1.0: Aku penasaran siapa yang tinggal di sini sebelum kita?

Neutral_2.0: Kau tidak punya kegiatan hari ini?

Neutral_3.0: Jika kau pergi ke kota, salamkan salam ku ke semua orang.

Neutral_4.0: Aku akan mencuci baju sebelum kau bangun... kau kan tidak punya banyak waktu.

Neutral_6.0: Aku penasaran apa yang orang lakukan saat ini?

Neutral_7.0: Aku tidak ingin melakukan apapun saat ini.

Neutral_8.0: Seberapapun aku membersihkannya, rumah ini kotor lagi.#$e#Aku kira kebun mudah sekali kotor.

Neutral_9.0: Apa kau pikir kita akan selamanya di sini?

Bad_3.0: Apa aku melakukan kesalahan? Akhir-akhir ini kau bersikap berbeda.$s

Bad_4.0: Apa kau pikir kita akan berpisah?$s

Bad_5.0: Kau biasanya romantis... apa yang terjadi?$s#$e#Aku tau aku masih terlalu muda... apa itu alasan kau menikahiku?$a

Bad_6.0: Kita hanya punya kehidupan yang singkat... apa ini yang terbaik?$s

Bad_7.0: AKu berusa menjadi yang terbaik... tapi kau melakukan sebaliknya.$s

summer_1.0: Ah, musim panas... Aku bisa mencium bau beri.$h

summer_9.0: Maaf jika aku berkeringat... Aku kemaren kepanasan.

summer_2.0: Sakarang musim panas... itu artinya akan ada banyak serangga.#$e#Jangan cemas, biar aku yang mengurusnya.

fall_1.0: Aku suka mencari jamu saat musim gugur. Aku bisa mencari dengan cepat.

fall_20.0: Apa yang kau rencanakan untuk musim dingin? Waktu yang bagus untuk menyiapkan kebutuhan.

fall_2.0: Aku tau musim ini kau sangat sibuk. Aku berusaha membantu semampuku.

winter_1.0: Sekarang musim dingin, itu artinya ada crystal fruit di musim ini. Rasanya unik sekali, iyakan?

winter_7.0: AKu ingin memahat es. Aku melakukannya sekali dalam setahun, tapi itu sangat menyenangkan!

winter_28.0: Hey, bagaimana keadaan kebun %farm! Ayo kita bersenang-senang nanti malam! [348]$h#$e#Tahun depan akan sangat indah, aku bisa merasakannya.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I wonder how Penny is doing? Maybe I'll give her a call later today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I was just daydreaming... do you think MARILDA is okay? I hope she finds some place where she truly belongs...
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hey! I had trouble sleeping last night so I fiddled around in my workshop for a bit. Here, I made this for you. [688 369 338 325 287]#$e#I hope you can find some use for it.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: The only thing I dislike about rain is the fact that I can't do any stargazing!
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Do I hear a leak in the roof? I'll have to check it out. I know a thing or two about carpentry from watching my mother.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Make sure you don't leave your tools out in the rain! You wouldn't want them to get all rusty.
Entries.patio_Maru: I'm not sure what this is, yet... but it's fun to turn the old wrench now and then.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Hi @. How was your day... soggy?#$e#This weather gives me gadget ideas... maybe if I funnel the rainwater it could power a mill?
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Dad's been tracking the weather patterns for the last twenty years.#$e#It's a little too early to tell, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Can we have spaghetti in bed tonight?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made some dessert! Make sure to brush your teeth before bed, though. [232 234 223 220]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: My day wasn't all that exciting... I stayed inside because of the weather.#$e#It was relaxing, though. I kicked back with the latest 'Schematics Weekly'.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Hmm? Sorry, sometimes I get so lost in thought that I don't even realize what I'm doing.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I found this in my scrap pile. Think you could find a use for it? [286 287 205 732]
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Finally, you're up! I was getting so hungry... *rumble*$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: One of the best things about living on the farm is waking up to a chorus of songbirds.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: How do you keep your hands so soft with all that farmwork?
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Did you see the moon tonight? It always looks spectacular on the horizon.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I saw a shooting star earlier. I like to pretend it's MARILDA stopping by to check on us.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I can't decide if I'm craving chocolate cake or ripe strawberries. Or maybe both...?#$e#Be honest... am I gaining weight?$s
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: You did good work today! You deserve to relax the rest of the evening.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I'm really starting to love this old house. It's so cozy at night.#$e#Mom's done a great job improving the place.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: Ahh... the farm smells great, it reminds me of the mountains near my parent's house.
Entries.Outdoor_1: With a little planning, we could automate most of the farm work and just relax!
Entries.Outdoor_2: It's going to be clear tonight... I wonder if the %noun constellation will be visible?
Entries.Outdoor_3: Don't worry, I won't mind if you track mud into the house. It's fun to get a little dirty now and then.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I never realized the amount of care and planning necessary to run a farm! It's a lot like working in the laboratory.
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today? Kids need playtime in order reach their full potential.
Entries.OneKid_1: What do you think... will %kid1 grow up to be a farmer? Or an engineer?
Entries.OneKid_3: I have high hopes for our child. I've been reading all the scientific data on the best ways to raise children.
Entries.TwoKids_3: My own workshop, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. Life is pretty good.
Entries.Good_1: Now that we live together, it's hard to imagine being alone again.
Entries.Good_3: There's a lot of strategy to planning and running a farm. It's more intellectually stimulating than I thought!
Entries.Good_4: For a while there I was considering building a robotic husband. But you're a lot more fun!$h^For a while there I was considering building a robotic wife. But you're a lot more fun!$h
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. This is a very rare specimen!$l
Entries.Good_6: Last night, I had a dream that I was looking through a gigantic telescope. I saw something moving in the %noun nebula. Kind of spooky.
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'd still like me even if I gained weight.
Entries.funLeave_Maru: I think I'll visit my parents today. I haven't seen them in a while.
Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mom and Dad are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.spring_2: So, what's your strategy for optimizing the farm this year?
Entries.spring_1: It's wonderful to see all the plants and animals come back to life during the spring.
Entries.spring_22: If my brother wasn't such a hermit I'd invite him over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my brother will ever have the courage to ask Abigail out?
Entries.summer_2: I like to catalogue the different insects I see in summer.
Entries.fall_1: With every season, a new section of the night sky becomes prominent. It's fascinating to witness.
Entries.fall_25: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.#$e#Don't worry, dear. I'll take care of it all.
Entries.fall_3: Fall aways reminds me of going out woodcutting with my mom... it might be that smell of freshly cut wood and sap.
Entries.winter_15: The winters have been disturbingly mild lately.
Entries.winter_5: I hope Dad's doing okay... he can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.
Entries.winter_2: So, what are your plans for maintaining our income this winter?#$e#You could do some fishing or foraging...#$e#If you do any mining, promise me you'll be careful.
Entries.spring_Maru: I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!$h
Entries.summer_Maru: The evenings are so warm, it's really the best time of year for stargazing. Who knows what might up there?
Entries.fall_Maru: The farm life is great, but I'm glad I still work at the clinic... It's an important service for the community.
Entries.winter_Maru: I'm really looking forward to having rhubarb pie in the spring. Oh... that tang, that zest!
Entries.spouseRoom_Maru: #$c .5#I got up early to do a little stargazing.#$e#I hope you don't mind if I spend some time on my projects today, honey.

Rainy_Day_0.0: Aku penasaran bagaimana kabar Penny? Mungkin aku akan menelfonnya nanti.

Rainy_Day_1.0: Aku baru saja melamun... apa kau pikir MARILDA baik saja? Kuharap ia menemukan tempat dimana ia seharusnya berada...

Rainy_Day_2.0: Hey! Tidurku bermasalah tadi malam jadi aku iseng bekerja dibengkel semalam. Ini, kubuat ini untukmu. [688 369 338 325 287]#$e#Kuharap kau dapat menggunakannya.

Rainy_Day_3.0: Hal yang tak kusuka dari hujan adalah kau tak bisa melihat bintang dimalam hari!

Rainy_Day_4.0: Apa kau mendengar tetsan air? Aku harus memeriksa rumah. Aku tau sedikit cara memperbaiki rumah dari ibuku.

Rainy_Night_0.0: Pastikan kau tidak meninggalkan peralatanmu ditengah hujan! Kau tak akan ingin mereka karatan.

patio_Maru.0: Aku masih belum tau kegunannya... tapi sangat menyenangkan menggunakan kunci tua kedepannya.

Rainy_Night_1.0: Hai @. Bagaimana harimu... basah?#$e#Cuaca seperti ini memberiku ide baru... mungkin jika aku menyalurkan air hujan, aku bisa membuat pembangkit listrik?

Rainy_Night_2.0: Ayah telah mempelajari curah hujan selama dua puluh tahun.#$e#Mungkin terlalu cepat menarik kesimpulan, tapi hasilnya menunjukan kebiasaan yang aneh.

Rainy_Night_3.0: Bisakah kita makan spaghetti malam ini?

Rainy_Night_4.0: Aku membuat pencuci mulut! Tapi jangan lupa sikat gigi sebelum tidur. [232 234 223 220]$h

Rainy_Night_5.0: Hariku tak begitu menyenangkan... Aku diam didalam karena cuacanya.#$e#Tapi itu sedikit membuatku relaks. Aku membaca majalah terakhir 'Schematics Weekly'.

Indoor_Day_0.0: Hmm? Maaf, kadang aku melamun dan lupa apa yang sedang aku kerjakan.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Aku menemukan ini dari barang rongsokan ku. Apa kau bisa menemukan apa kegunaanya? [286 287 205 732]

Indoor_Day_2.0: Akhirnya kau bangun! Aku sudah sangat lapar... *kruyukk~*$h

Indoor_Day_3.0: Satu hal yang bagus tinggal diperkebunan adalah terbangun dan mendengar kicauan burung.

Indoor_Day_4.0: Bagaimana caramu menjaga tanganmu tetap lembut dengan semua pekerjaan kebun itu?

Indoor_Night_0.0: Kau lihat bulan malam ini? Itu sungguh luar biasa.

Indoor_Night_1.0: Baru saja kulihat bintang jatuh. Aku anggap itu MARILDA singgah untuk menyapa kita.$h

Indoor_Night_2.0: Chocolate Cake? Strawberry segar? Atau keduanya...?#$e#Jujurlah... Aku aku tambah gemuk?$s

Indoor_Night_3.0: Kerja bagus hari ini! Kau berhak untuk relaks dan beristirahat.

Indoor_Night_4.0: Aku mulai suka pada rumah ini. Sangat tenang saat malam.#$e#Ibu melakukan kerja bagus dalam memperbesar rumah ini.$h

Outdoor_0.0: Ahh... udara kebun sangat bagus, mengingatkanku pada pegunungan dekat rumah orangtua ku.

Outdoor_1.0: Dengan sedikit perencanaan, kita bisa membuat otomatis pekerjaan kebun!

Outdoor_2.0: Malam ini langit akan cerah... Aku penasaran apa %noun constellation akan kelihatan?

Outdoor_3.0: Jangan khawatir, apabila kakimu kotor aku akan membersihkan rumah.

Outdoor_4.0: Aku tak menyangka kalau berkebun butuh perencanaan! Itu seperti bekerja di laboratorium.

OneKid_0.0: Apa kau sudah menghabiskan waktu dengan %kid1 ? Anak harus bermain dengan orang tuanya agar jadi pintar.

OneKid_1.0: Menurutmu... apa %kid1 akan menjadi petani? Atau professor?

OneKid_3.0: Aku menaruh harapan pada anak kita. Aku telah mempelajari semua cara untuk membesarkan anak.

TwoKids_3.0: Tempat kerjaku sendiri, dua anak yang lucu, dan kebun yang indah. Hidup yang sempurna.

Good_1.0: Sekarang kita hidup bersama, sulit membayangkan hidup sendiri lagi.

Good_3.0: Ada banyak strategi untuk merawat kebun. Ternyata lebih sulit dari yang kuduga!

Good_4.0: Dulu kupikir aku akan membuat robot suami. Tapi kau jauh lebih baik!$h^Dulu kupikir aku akan membuat robot istri. Tapi kau jauh lebih baik!$h

Good_5.0: Aku sangat menyukai hadiah pernikahanku... Cangkangnya sungguh indah. Ini adalah spesies langka!$l

Good_6.0: Semalam, Aku bermimpi melihat lewat teropong raksasa. Aku melihat sesuatu bergerak di %noun nebula. Agak menyeramkan.

Neutral_0.0: Kuharap kau tetap sayang padaku walaupun aku jadi gendut.

Neutral_8.0: Aku merasa tak enak hari ini.$s

funLeave_Maru.0: Aku akan mengunjungi orang tuaku. Sudah lama aku tak bertemu mereka.

funReturn_Maru.0: Mereka baik-baik saja. Rutinitas mereka sama bahkan setelah aku pergi. Bagaimana harimu?

spring_2.0: Jadi, apa strategi berkebunmu tahun ini?

spring_1.0: Sangat menyenangkan melihat hewan dan tanaman kembali ceria dimusim semi.

spring_22.0: Kalau saudaraku tidak begitu mengesalkan, aku akan mengundangnya kesini.

summer_20.0: Aku penasaran apakah saudaraku sudah jadian dengan Abigail?

summer_2.0: Aku suka mencatat jenis-jenis serangga saat musim panas.

fall_1.0: Langit malam berubah-ubah setiap musim dan itu luar biasa!

fall_25.0: Musim dingin sudah dekat. Kita harus cek ulang penghangat dan perapian.#$e#Jangan khawatir sayang. Aku akan urus semuanya.

fall_3.0: Musim gugur mengingatkanku memotong kayu dengan ibu... aku rindu dengan bau kayu dan getahnya.

winter_15.0: Akhir-akhir ini musim dingin menjadi lebih dingin.

winter_5.0: Kuharap ayah baik saja... dia bisa depresi karena tak bisa riset lapangan pada musim dingin.

winter_2.0: Jadi, apa rencanamu menjaga pemasukan kita?#$e#Kau bisa memancing atau mencari hasil hutan...#$e#Kalau kau menambang, berhati-hatilah.

spring_Maru.0: Aku sangat tertarik dengan perkebunan musim semi, @!$h

summer_Maru.0: Malam hari sangatlah hangat, ini adalah waktu yang tepat untuk melihat bintang-bintang!

fall_Maru.0: Kehidupan berkebun sangatlah bagus, tapi aku senang masih bekerja di klinik... Itu sangat membantu orang-orang.

winter_Maru.0: Musim semi akan tiba. aku ingin membuat pie.

spouseRoom_Maru.0: #$c .5#Aku bangun terlalu pagi untuk melihat bintang-bintang.#$e#Aku harap kau tidak masalah jika aku menghabiskan banyak waktu dengan proyekku, sayang.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: On rainy days my thoughts always drift toward cinnamon and cookies.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...#$e#I think Maru will have to make the first move, though.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hi, honey! I did some shopping this morning and got this for you.[186 180 770 535]#$e#I thought you could really use one of the those.$11
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Hmm... maybe I should experiment with a new recipe. You liked the last recipe I made, didn't you, honey?#$e#What was it called... 'Chili de @'?
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: On days like this, I love to curl up with a good book.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day, honey? I spent my afternoon reading a novel.
Entries.patio_Penny: This is a lot more peaceful than my old spot in town. I'm very happy here.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I'm sure Mom's at the saloon right now... But I don't feel so bad about it anymore. It's out of my hands.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I was just thinking about that night we met in the bathhouse.$l#$e#I'll never forget that night...$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The sound of rain used to bother me, when I lived in that old metal trailer. But it's quite soothing here.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I felt like making a nice dinner. I hope you like it. [212 214 225 209 200]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#It's important to me that you leave here with a full belly.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: You know, I think I'll read a book today. I picked up something new from the library last time I was there.#$e#Gunther asked me to say hi.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I love to hear about all the artifacts you've found. Archaeology is fascinating!#$e#To think... there may have been farmers at this very spot 10,000 years ago.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Was I shy when we first met? It's funny to think about, now that we've come so far.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Good evening, honey. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today?#$e#If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hmm... skirt or pants tomorrow? Oh, who am I kidding... I always go with the skirt.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: We have it good here. We should always try and remember those less fortunate than us.#$e#I'm just very grateful for what we have.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Mom's probably pretty lonely now that I'm gone. I just hope she doesn't visit the saloon more to make up for it.#$e#You shouldn't feel bad! Mom has to solve her own problems.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to tuck in? I made the bed and everything...$11
Entries.Outdoor_0: I only ever dreamed of living in such a beautiful place, and now it's come true.#$e#I was so miserable back home.$s
Entries.Outdoor_1: Isn't this a perfect place to raise children?#$e#I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: I just saw a songbird flying due west. In Stardew Valley that's a very good omen.$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: Ahh... It feels great to be outside. I could spend all day right here, observing every little thing.
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you had any time to play with %kid1 today? Maybe a second child will make things better.
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have such a great childhood here.
Entries.OneKid_3: I feel a lot older now that we have a child. Maybe it's just this new responsibility weighing on me.#$e#It's not bad! I've wanted this for a long time.$11
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They're such hungry children!
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I've had this dream that %kid2 grew wings and flew into the night sky. What does it mean?
Entries.TwoKids_3: A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. We're so very fortunate.
Entries.Good_1: I had dreams of marrying you for such a long time.$l
Entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Wow, you look beautiful today. Did you do something different with your hair?$l
Entries.Good_4: This place is really starting to feel like home.$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry that you aren't eating enough wholesome food.
Entries.funLeave_Penny: I'm going to head into town today, just for fun. I'll be back in a while!
Entries.funReturn_Penny: I had a nice time... It's good to stay in contact with everyone. Tell me about your day.
Entries.spring_8: Spring is probably my favorite season. There's a certain freshness in the air that fills me with hope.
Entries.spring_1: We've got a long, warm year to look forward to. Let's make it a productive one.
Entries.spring_15: Ah, the 'spring cleaning'... I'm actually going to enjoy this.
Entries.summer_16: *phew*... I need to eat more melon to combat this heat!
Entries.summer_1: Summer may be searing hot, but the humidity feels great on the skin.
Entries.summer_2: In summer, the ants become very active. I could watch them for hours... they have a pretty complex civilization from the looks of it!
Entries.fall_5: The smell of fall reminds me of the smell of books... weird, isn't it?
Entries.fall_1: Fall... It makes me think of colored paper and glue. Maybe I'm spending too much time with the children.$h
Entries.fall_2: Will you grow any giant pumpkins this year?$11
Entries.winter_1: Winter's a good time to unwind a bit. You deserve it after the long year!
Entries.winter_6: The falling snow reminds me of grandma, rocking by the fire. I have this vivid memory of her shadow, flickering against the orange wood... That was long ago.
Entries.winter_3: How will we stay afloat this winter? Oh, you don't have to tell me... I trust you to make the right decisions.

Rainy_Day_0.0: Hari yang hujan membuatku ingin membuat cinnamon dan kue.

Rainy_Day_1.0: Pa kau pikir jika Maru dan Dr. Harvey akan bersama selamanya? Aku yakin Harvey menyukainya...#$e3#Aku pikir Maru akan ke lain hati.$h

Rainy_Day_2.0: Hai, sayang! Aku tadi berbelanja, ini aku kasih kau.[186 180 770 535]#$e#Mungkin itu akan berguna.

Rainy_Day_3.0: Hmm... mungkin aku harus mencoba resep baru. Kau suka resepku waktu itu, iyakan, sayang?#$e#Kau menyebutnya... 'Chili de @'?

Rainy_Day_4.0: Hari seperti ini, paling enak membaca buku.

Rainy_Night_0.0: Bagaimana harimu, sayang? Aku menghabiskan waktuku dengan membaca novel.

patio_Penny.0: Disini lebih tenang daripada tempat lamaku di kota. Aku sangat bahagia disini.

Rainy_Night_1.0: Aku yakin ibuku di bar sekarang... Tapi aku tidak memikirkannya. Itu bukan tanggung jawabku lagi.

Rainy_Night_2.0: Aku masih berpikir saat kita bertemu di bathhouse.$l#$e#Aku tidak akan lupa malam itu...$l

Rainy_Night_3.0: Ketika aku masih tinggal di trailer, suara hujan sangat menggangu. Tapi di sini sangat tenang.

Rainy_Night_4.0: Aku akan membuat makan malam. Aku harap kau menyukainya. [212 214 225 209 200]$h

Indoor_Day_0.0: Sangat damai disini. Aku biasanya mimpi buruk, tapi sekarang aku tidur seperti bayi.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Selamat pagi, @! Aku membuatkan asarapan untukmu.[195 210 211]#$e#Sangat penting untukmu sebelum kau bekerja di luar.$h

Indoor_Day_2.0: Kau tau, Aku akan emmbaca buku. Aku mengambil beberapa buku baru dari perpustakaan sebelum aku kesini.#$e#Gunther titip salam kepadaku.

Indoor_Day_3.0: Aku suka semua artifak yang telah kau temukan. Archaeology sangat fantastis!#$e#Aku pikir... ada petani yang sudah ada sejak 10,000 tahun lalu.

Indoor_Day_4.0: Apa aku terlihat pemalu saat kita pertama kali bertemu? Sangat lucu jika mengingatnya, Sekarang kita sudah sejauh ini.$h

Indoor_Night_0.0: Selamat malam, sayang. Apa yang kau inginkan sudah kau dapatkan hari ini?#$e#Jika tidak, tidak apa-apa. Kau akan mendapatkannya lain waktu!

Indoor_Night_1.0: Hmm... besok pakai rok atau celana? Oh, aku hanya bercanda... Aku biasanya pakai rok.

Indoor_Night_2.0: Kita sudah berkecukupan, namun harus selalu ingat orang-orang yang kurang beruntung dari kita.#$e#Aku sangat bersyukur dengan apa yang kita punya.

Indoor_Night_3.0: Ibu mungkin kesepian saat aku tidak ada. Aku hanya ingin dia tidak terlalau sering mengunjungi bar.#$e#Kau seharusnya tidak mencemaskannya! Ibuku bisa mengatasi masalahnya sendiri.

Indoor_Night_4.0: Siap untuk tidur? Aku sudah menyiapkan kasur dan lainnya...

Outdoor_0.0: Aku pernah bermimpi aku tinggal di tempat yang indah, dan sekarang jadi kenyataan.#$e#Aku akan merindukan rumah lama ku.$s

Outdoor_1.0: Ini tempat yang bagus untuk mempunyai anak, kan?#$e#Aku senang tinggal di sini.

Outdoor_2.0: Hai, sayang! Jika aku tau cara berkebun aku akan membantumu. Maaf!#$e#Aku selalu memikirkanmu.$h

Outdoor_3.0: Aku baru saja melihat burung penyanyi terbang ke arah barat. Di Stardew Valley itu merupakan pertanda baik.$h

Outdoor_4.0: Ahh... enak sekali diuar sini. Aku mungkin akan diluar sini, sedikit jalan-jalan mungkin membantuku.

OneKid_0.0: Kau punya waktu bermain dengan %kid1 hari ini? Mungkin dua anak akan lebih baik.

OneKid_1.0: Si kecil %kid1 akan punya kenangan mais disini.

OneKid_3.0: Aku rasa kita cukup umur untuk punya anak. Maybe it's just this new responsibility weighing on me.#$e#Itu tidak buruk! Aku sudah lama menantikannya.

TwoKids_0.0: Aku sudah memberi makan %kid1 dan %kid2 . Mereka cepat sekali lapar!

TwoKids_1.0: Kita sudah memberikan banyak %kid1 perhatian sekarang kita punya %kid2. Kita tidak boleh membuat mereka iri.

TwoKids_2.0: Aku bermimpi %kid2 pnya sayap dan terbang ke angkas. Apa artinya itu?

TwoKids_3.0: Rumah bagus, dua anak yang baik, dan kebun yang indah. Kita sangat beruntung.

Good_1.0: Aku punya mimpi menikah denganmu sampai akhir hidupku.$l

Good_2.0: Aku tau kau punya alasan tinggal disini...$l

Good_3.0: Wow, kau terlihat ganteng hari ini! Apa kau bercukur?$l^Wow, kau terlihat canik hari ini. Kau melakukan sesuatu dengan rambutmu?$l

Good_6.0: Hati-hati diuluar sana! Kadang aku cemas kau makan makanan yang tidak sehat.

funLeave_Penny.0: Aku akan jalan-jalan ke kota, hanya bersenang-senang. Aku akan kembali sebentar!

funReturn_Penny.0: Aku senang sekali... Senang bisa bertemu orang-otang. Ceritakan tentang harimu.

spring_8.0: Musim semi adalah musim favoritku. Udaranya di musim ini sangat segar sekali.

spring_1.0: Kita sudah melewati musim dingin. Ayo kita mulai bercocok tanam lagi.

spring_15.0: Ah, udara musim semi... Aku benar-benar menikmatinya.

summer_16.0: *phew*... Aku butuh melon untuk melawan panasnya!

summer_1.0: Musim panas memang panas, tapi sinar matahri sangat baik untuk kulit.

summer_2.0: Saat musim panas, semut akan sangat aktif. Aku haru memperhatikannya... mereka punya kerumunan yang sangat kompleks!

fall_5.0: Bau musim gugur mengingatkanku akan bau buku... aneh, bukan?

fall_1.0: Musim gugur... Aku berpikir akan mewarnai kertas lalu menempelkannya sebagai dekorasi. Mungkin aku harus meluangkan waktu untuk anak-anak.$h

winter_1.0: Musim ini adalah waktu yang pas untuk bersantau. Kau harus beristirahat setelah kerja sepanjang tahun!

winter_6.0: Salju yang turun mengingatkanku pada nenek, dia sering duduk di dekat perapian. Yang paling kuingat adalah bayangannya yang bercampur dengan sinar perapian yang hangat. Itu sudah lama sekali.

winter_3.0: Bagaimana kita bertahan di musim dingin ini? Oh, tidak perlu beritau aku... Aku percaya dengan keputusanmu.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Might be a good day to sit back and jam on the guitar...#$e#Hey, you can relax too if you want.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sebastian and Abigail will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hey, I found one of these rolling around in the back of a drawer. [90 88 86 535]#$e#I thought you might be able to use it.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Aw, man. These cloudy days are kind of a drag...$7
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: How'd you sleep? The sound of rain really makes me zonk.
Entries.patio_Sam: *Sigh*... I'm never gonna land this trick...$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hey, how was your day? I just layed around and read comics most of the day... it was great.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: It was a pretty low-key day for me... colas, frozen pizza, a few hours noodling around on the guitar. I feel relaxed.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.#$b#It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser!$10
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I hope Vincent's not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little guy.$s#$e#But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them.$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Hey, I tossed a couple frozen pizzas into the oven. Here's yours. [206]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Phew... I'll tell you one thing I don't miss about my old life... working at JojaMart.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, I made you some instant pancakes. Enjoy. [211]$h#$e#What? I never learned to cook... mom always did that.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that I seriously love you...$l
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Do you have big plans for the day?#$e#Oh, not me... I usually decide what to do a few moments beforehand...
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Um... Maybe I'll help out on the farm some other day. I feel lazy today.$s#$e#You're not mad?
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Maybe I'll give you a massage later.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: My day? Oh... I can hardly remember. I didn't really do anything of note. Just relaxed and had a good time.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Hey, sorry I didn't make the bed. You know I'm sloppy... that's why you like me, right?$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: The only thing I miss about living at home is Mom's fish casserole
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to hit the hay? I actually made the bed for once...
Entries.Outdoor_0: Maybe I should get some off-road wheels for my skateboard. Mayor Lewis can't touch me out here.$h
Entries.Outdoor_1: I always keep an eye on the wide blue sky... you never know when a UFO might go by.
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, @! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll try and help you with encouraging thoughts.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Something in the air makes me feel positive... maybe it's the faint whiff of pizza from Gus' ovens.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Wow... you look great today, and the specks of mud just add some extra charm.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'll change %kid1's diaper... don't worry about it. You've got enough on your plate.
Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a father!$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I think we should have another kid. Why stop now?
Entries.TwoKids_0: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.$h#$e#I'm just kidding... I didn't marry you for the money.
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_2: It's fun to see the babies playing with each other. I think they're going to be very close.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become such a family man, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$h
Entries.Good_1: Do you ever think of that night we snuck into my room? I do, often...$l
Entries.Good_2: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd be together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us.$l
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you do something with your hair?$l^Wow, you look stunning today. Did you do something new with your hair?$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! I know you go into the caves sometimes... you could be eaten alive in there!
Entries.Good_4: Baby, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.#$e#I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.
Entries.Good_5: Baby, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.
Entries.funLeave_Sam: I'm gonna visit the family today, okay? I'll be home in the evening.
Entries.funReturn_Sam: Seeing family is nice, but it's also kind of depressing in a weird way. Like... our lives are totally separate now, and everything feels more formal than it used to.$7
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sebastian again.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I thought I could get out of it now that we're married.#$e#Whatever. I guess it's funny in a weird way.
Entries.summer_1: The pollen count is a little lower in summer, so my nose is really happy.$h
Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#It might be funny to put something nasty. You know, to play a prank on the governor!$h#$e#Sorry...
Entries.summer_27: Summer's great, but I'm ready for the fall now.#$e#Should we watch the jellyfish tomorrow night? It's always kind of fun.
Entries.fall_1: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.
Entries.fall_15: Hey, tomorrow's the fair. I need to get my old slingshot wrist back in shape...
Entries.fall_26: I wonder if Mom will let Vincent enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not...$h#$e#Poor kid. He's gonna have to grow up some day...
Entries.winter_1: The cold air makes my hair gel freeze. It's not very pleasant.$s
Entries.winter_7: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? It might be fun to see everyone again...
Entries.winter_28: We had a great year, @... it's kind of sad that it's over.#$e#We'll just have to make next year even better!$h

Rainy_Day_0.0: Hari yang bagus untuk memainkan gitar...#$e#Hey, kau bisa santai jika kau mau juga.

Rainy_Day_1.0: Apa kau pikir Sebastian dan Abigail akan benar-benar jadian?#$e#Heh... aku sudah menikah, aku mencoba agar orang lain bisa menikah juga.

Rainy_Day_2.0: Hey, aku menemukan ini dibelakang meja. [90 88 86 535]#$e#Mungkin kau bisa menggunakannya.

Rainy_Day_3.0: Ah sial. Cuaca seperti ini menjengkelkan...$7

Rainy_Day_4.0: Bagaimana kalau tidur? Suara hujan membuatku mengantuk.

patio_Sam.0: *Hah~*... Aku tak akan bisa menguasai trik ini...$s

Rainy_Night_0.0: Hey, bagaimana harimu? Aku hanya membaca komik seharian... itu mengasyikkan.$h

Rainy_Night_1.0: Ini hari bermalas-malasan... Cola, Pizza beku, main gitar. Aku merasa rileks.

Rainy_Night_2.0: Baru saja aku memainkan lagu yang kita bawakan bersama. Ingat? Haha agak memalukan.#$b#Sejujurnya saat itu aku sangat canggung didepanmu dan tak mau merusak permainan kita!$l

Rainy_Night_3.0: Kuharap Vincent tidak kesepian sejak aku pergi... Aku merasa sedikit bersalah.$s#$e#Tapi, hidup itu perubahan... benar? Ia harus belajar tentang itu, atau kenyataan yang akan mengajarnya.$7

Rainy_Night_4.0: Hey, Aku memanaskan beberapa Pizza. Ini untukmu. [206]$h

Indoor_Day_0.0: Wew... Satu-satunya hal yang tak kurindukan dari kehidupan lamaku... Bekerja di JojaMart.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Hey, Aku membuatkanmu pancake instan. Nikmatilah. [211]$h#$e#What? Aku tak tau cara masak... Ibuku yang tau.

Indoor_Day_2.0: Hey. Aku tau aku suka bercanda, tapi kau harus tau kalau aku benar-benar mencintaimu...$l

Indoor_Day_3.0: Apa kau punya rencana hari ini?#$e#Oh, aku..? Aku selalu memikirkannya nanti...

Indoor_Day_4.0: Um... Mungkin aku akan membantumu nanti. Aku malas hari ini.$s#$e#Kau tak marah kan?

Indoor_Night_0.0: Hey, kau terlihat capek. Aku akan membuatmu nyaman ok? Mungkin aku akan memijatmu nanti.

Indoor_Night_1.0: Hariku? Oh... Aku tak ingat. Aku tak melakukan apa-apa. Hanya bermalas-malasan.

Indoor_Night_2.0: Hey, maaf aku tak membersihkan tempat tidur. Kau tau aku pelupa... itulah kenapa kau menyukaiku kan?$h

Indoor_Night_3.0: Satu-satunya hal yang kurindu dari rumah adalah fish casserole buatan Ibu

Indoor_Night_4.0: Sudah siap untuk tidur? Aku sebenarnya pernah membersihkan tempat tidur...

Outdoor_0.0: Mungkin aku akan memainkan skate disini. Mayor Lewis tidak dapat melarangku disini.$h

Outdoor_1.0: Aku selalu menatap langit... siapa tau ada UFO lewat.

Outdoor_2.0: Hai, @! kalau aku tau sedikit tentang kebun aku akan membantumu. Maaf!#$e#Aku akan membantu menyemangatimu.$h

Outdoor_3.0: Sesuatu diudara membuatku bersemangat... mungkin ini aroma Pizza dari oven Gus.

Outdoor_4.0: Wow... kau terlihat cantik hari ini, dan lumpur dibajumu menambah kecantikanmu.$l

OneKid_0.0: Aku akan mengganti popok %kid1's ... Jangan khawatir, kau sudah cukup sibuk.

OneKid_1.0: Ini aneh, tapi menjadi ayah sangat menyenangkan!$h

OneKid_3.0: Kurasa sebaiknya kita memiliki dua anak. Kenapa hanya satu?

TwoKids_0.0: Aku bangun subuh hari, Mengganti popok dan memberi makan pada anak-anak! Semua beres. Kau cukup fokus mencari uang.$h#$e#Bercanda, aku menikahimu bukan karena uang.

TwoKids_1.0: Kita harus memberi perhatian %kid1 sebanyak perhatian pada %kid2. Jangan sampai mereka saling cemburu.

TwoKids_2.0: Menyenangkan melihat anak-anak bermain bersama. Hubungan mereka akan sangat dekat.

TwoKids_3.0: Aku tak menyangka aku menjadi ayah, aku sangat cinta dengan keluarga kecil kita. Hidup yang sempurna.$l

Good_1.0: Kau ingat saat kita diam-diam kekamarku? Aku selalu mengingatnya...$l

Good_2.0: Kau tau, Aku sudah merasa kalau kita akan bersama saat bertemu denganmu. Ada sesuatu yang spesial diantara kita.$l

Good_3.0: Wow, kau sangat ganteng hari ini! Apa kau mengatur rambutmu?$l^Wow, kau sangat cantik hari ini. Apa kau mengatur rambutmu?$l

Good_6.0: Berhati-hatilah! Aku tau kadang kau pergi ke gua... kau bisa dimakan hidup-hidup disana!

Good_4.0: Sayang, Aku baru saja ingin menulis lagu. Tapi sekarang kau disini dan aku menjadi rileks.#$e#Aku bermain gitar saat aku merasa kesepian.

Good_5.0: Sayang, ceritalah padaku! Aku selalu senang mendengar harimu.

funLeave_Sam.0: Aku akan mengunjungi keluargaku hari ini, ok? Aku akan pulang saat malam.

funReturn_Sam.0: Mengunjungi mereka sangat menyenangkan, tapi itu juga agak menyedihkan. Maksudku... kita sudah berpisah sekarang dan mereka menjadi seperti orang lain.$7

spring_12.0: Apa kau semangat untuk festival besok? Aku ingin melihat sebastian lagi.

spring_23.0: Oh... besok festival flower dance, kan? Sepertinya aku tak boleh memilih wanita lain karena kita menikah.#$e#Terserahlah. Kurasa itu menyenangkan.

summer_1.0: Serbuk sari agak menurun di musim panas, jadi hidungku bisa tenang.$h

summer_10.0: Apa kau sudah memikirkan apa yang ingin kau taruh di sup luau?#$e#Mungkin seru kalau memasukan sesuatu yang aneh, kita jahili governor!$h#$e#Maaf...

summer_27.0: Musim panas sangat menyenangkan, tapi aku siap untuk musim gugur.#$e#Haruskah kita menonton ubur-ubur besok? Itu menyenangkan.

fall_1.0: Kelihatannya seluruh desa berubah dalam satu malam... Akhirnya musim gugur datang.

fall_15.0: Hey, besok hari pameran. Aku harus memperbaiki katapel tuaku...

fall_26.0: Aku penasaran apa ibu membolehkan Vincent masuk labirin tahun ini. Mungkin tidak...$h#$e#Bocah malang. Dia akan memasukinya suatu hari nanti...

winter_1.0: Udara dingin membuat gel rambutku membeku. Itu sangat merepotkan.$s

winter_7.0: Apa kita akan ikut festival es besok? Sangat menyenangkan melihat semua orang lagi...

winter_28.0: Tahun yang menyenangkan, @... sungguh sedih ini akan berakhir.#$e#Kita harus membuat tahun depan lebih menyenangkan!$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Finally... some heavy rain. I get bored of sunny weather easily.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey. I was just thinking about my old room in the basement. I felt comfortable there, but this is a lot more interesting. And I don't miss the smell...#$e#I felt kind of embarrassed living in my mom's house for so long.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hey. I couldn't sleep last night so I took a walk to the caves. I found this... want it?[575 769 767 84 66 78]#$e#I just have trouble sleeping sometimes, it has nothing to do with you. I love you.$7
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Seems like a pretty good day to just lay around, maybe read a book or something... what do you think?
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Hey, another rainy day... perfect.#$e#You look cold... here, come closer.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I'm trying my best to quit smoking now that we're married... I don't wanna die on you. It's a bad habit.#$e#I want to have a future together.$l
Entries.patio_Sebastian: Need something? I'll just be over here working on my bike for a while.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I did some work on the laptop today. I was actually brainstorming some ideas for a game I want to make.#$e#With your farming income, I can afford to do what I want with my life. It's pretty amazing. Thank you.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Sorry, I didn't make any dinner. We might have a frozen pizza in the fridge or something.#$e#I dunno, my mind was elsewhere. It's hard to remember to do chores...
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: How was your day? Did you slay any monsters?$h#$e#It feels good to take out your aggression now and then, doesn't it?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Maybe a witch will visit us tonight? Hah.. if only life was that interesting...
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: The older I get, the less I'm drawn to the city. It had a certain mystique to it, once. But it turns out that was just a romantic fantasy.#$e#The city's so busy, so full of people... I don't belong there. I'm a loner.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey... want some coffee?[395]$7#$e#I needed some... woke up early from a nightmare and I just couldn't fall back asleep.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I couldn't sleep last night so I went for a night ride on the motorcycle.#$e#I need to stay independent, even though we're married. That's just how I am. I still love you, though.$7
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Hey. How'd you sleep last night? I heard you mumbling.#$e#You seemed scared, but I have to admit... it was kind of cute.$l
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Living here with you is teaching me to come out of my shell a little bit. I think it's good for me.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey. I just hung out around the house, today. Nothing interesting...#$e#...#$e#The view from our house is perfect. You can see the sun setting over Pelican Town from the front porch.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Maybe I drank too much coffee... I don't feel very tired.#$e#I'm still trying to adjust to the farm schedule. I used to stay up until 5am and sleep in until 2pm, sometimes.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's really cool to have our own place. I can do whatever I feel like and not have people nagging at me all the time.#$e#I'm sure Maru's happy that I'm gone.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I spotted a bat out the window earlier. It's kind of hard to see, but if you stay focused you can often catch them flittering about. They're out there.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I often felt unappreciated back home... but here I feel like I really belong. Thanks for making me feel welcome, @.$l
Entries.Outdoor_0: I feel like I want to do something today... but I'm not sure what. Do you ever have that problem, @?
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm... sometimes I have to force myself to stay outside for health.#$e#I dunno what it is, but I like being indoors. Maybe I'm just so used to my dark basement.
Entries.Outdoor_2: I'll just watch you from here.$h#$e#I enjoy watching you.
Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want to get soft now that I'm a married guy. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: We should raise more slimes... In big quantities they can be pretty profitable. And they're so easy to raise.#$e#Also, different colored slimes produce different items. I dunno, I think it'd be kind of a fun hobby for us.
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a father. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.OneKid_1: Maybe when %kid1 is a little older, I'll get a sidecar for the bike and we can all go for a ride.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: Have you smelled %kid1? Maybe it's time for a bath...
Entries.TwoKids_0: Don't worry, I already fed the kids... %kid2 spilled the chocolate milk all over my shirt again.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I hope %kid1 and %kid2 are nice to each other. Maru and I always fought as kids.#$e#If I think back on it, it was mostly my fault...
Entries.TwoKids_2: I've had this recurring dream that %kid2 is wearing a shadow shaman costume and sitting on a glowing pumpkin. Weird, huh?
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've come a long way, @. Look at our family. To be honest, I never really thought I'd end up in this situation.#$e#Now that I'm here, I like it...$l
Entries.Good_0: Hey. Look at me. Never forget that I love you... you're everything to me.$l#$b#Now go make us some money.$h
Entries.Good_1: Hey... come here. You look great today.$l
Entries.Good_2: You always look great, even after slopping around in the yard all day.$l
Entries.Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your husband. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Entries.Good_4: You don't ever have to worry about me. I like to spend a lot of time alone.
Entries.Good_5: Sometimes I feel so angry... but when you show up I always start to calm down.$7#$e#Maybe I'll mellow out with age.
Entries.Good_6: I know you're tough, but I still worry about you, sometimes. Don't ever go monster hunting without a life elixir and some sturdy boots, okay?
Entries.Good_8: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.
Entries.Good_9: I don't really need friends. You're the only person I need in my life. Is that weird?#$e#I guess I'm not like most people.
Entries.Neutral_0: When I take walks I do my best to avoid everyone. I hate being pressured into small talk.
Entries.Neutral_2: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...
Entries.Neutral_3: Are you going into town today? Why, what are you up to?
Entries.Neutral_4: I guess I can do the laundry today... You probably have your hands full with running the farm.
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to sell my laptop...
Entries.Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I like being alone, anyways.
Entries.Neutral_8: House-cleaning isn't fun, but when I listen to music and it goes by pretty fast.
Entries.Bad_5: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?
Entries.Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like my step-dad. Go away.$a
Entries.Bad_7: This place is starting to feel like a tomb.$s
Entries.Bad_8: I started smoking again... I've just been really stressed out lately.$s
Entries.funLeave_Sebastian: I'm going to take a walk today. I need some time to myself. I'll see you in the evening.
Entries.funReturn_Sebastian: My day was fine, nothing much to tell you about. Why don't you tell me about yours?
Entries.spring_1: Oohh... my head. Happy new year...$h
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be good to see Sam again.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous tight jumpsuit. Why does Lewis make us do this?$s
Entries.summer_1: Summer's here... I need to start slathering the sunscreen pretty thick if I want to maintain my pale complexion...
Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I have no idea what's good... you're the chef!$7
Entries.summer_27: The weather's starting to cool off. It feels great.#$e#Should we go to the festival tomorrow night? It's actually a tradition I kind of enjoy.$7
Entries.fall_1: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.
Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out with Sam. It'll be good to catch up with him.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7
Entries.fall_26: I'm excited for the Spirit's Eve tomorrow. I wonder what horrors we'll find there.$h
Entries.winter_1: What are your plans this winter? I know it's more of a laid-back time for you.
Entries.winter_7: Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?
Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. We should celebrate a little. [346]$h#$e#I'm sure next year will be even better.$7

Rainy_Day_0.0: Akhirnya... hujan yang deras. Aku bosan dengan hari yang terik.

Rainy_Day_1.0: Hey. Aku memikirkan kamar basement lamaku. Aku merasa nyaman disana, tapi disini lebih menarik. Dan kamarku bau...#$e#Aku malu tinggal dirumah ibuku untuk waktu yang lama.

Rainy_Day_2.0: Hey. Aku tak bisa tidur semalam jadi aku jalan-jalan ke gua. Kutemukan ini... Mau?[575 769 767 84 66 78]#$e#Aku kadang tak bisa tidur, itu bukan salahmu. I love you.$7

Rainy_Day_3.0: Sepertinya hari yang bagus untuk baringan, membaca buku atau sebagainya... bagaimana menurutmu?

Rainy_Day_4.0: Hey, hujan lagi... sempurna.#$e#Kau terlihat kedinginan... sini, mendekatlah.$l

Rainy_Night_0.0: Aku mencoba untuk berhenti merokok sejak kita menikah... Aku tak mau meninggalkanmu. Dan itu kebiasaan buruk.#$e#Aku ingin melihat masa depan bersama.$l

patio_Sebastian.0: Butuh sesuatu? Aku akan ada disini dengan sepeda motorku.

Rainy_Night_1.0: Aku mengerjakan sesuatu dilaptop hari ini. Sebenarnya aku ingin membuat game.#$e#Dengan pemasukan dari kebun, akhirnya aku bisa menggapai mimpku. Terima kasih.$h

Rainy_Night_2.0: Maaf, Aku tak membuatkan makan malam. Mungkin ada makanan instan dikulkas.#$e#Aku tak tau, aku sedang tidak fokus. Aku jadi lupa untuk bersih-bersih rumah...

Rainy_Night_3.0: Bagaimana harimu? Apa kau membunuh beberapa monster?$h#$e#Itu bagus menyalurkan emosimu pada mereka, benarkan?

Rainy_Night_4.0: Mungkin ada penyihir yang mengunjungi kita pada malam hari? Hah.. kalau saja hidup semenarik itu...

Indoor_Day_0.0: Semakin tua aku, aku semakin tak tertarik pada kota besar. Aku pernah bermimpi tinggal disana. Tapi ternyata kehidupan disana tak seperti yang kuduga.#$e#Kota besar sangat sibuk dan dipenuhi orang-orang, tak cocok untuk pendiam sepertiku.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Hey... mau sedikit kopi?[395]$7#$e#Semalam aku bermimpi buruk dan tak bisa kembali tidur.

Indoor_Day_2.0: Aku tidak bisa tidur semalam jadi aku jalan-jalan naik motor.#$e#Aku harus merasa bebas walaupun sudah menikah. Itulah diriku. Tapi aku tetap mencintaimu.$7

Indoor_Day_3.0: Hey. Bagaimana tidurmu semalam? Kudengar kau mengigau.#$e#Kau terlihat ketakutan, tapi ku akui... wajahmu sangat manis saat itu.$l

Indoor_Day_4.0: Hidup denganmu disini mengajariku hal yang baru. Kurasa itu bagus untuk ku.$7

Indoor_Night_0.0: Hey. Aku hanya berjalan-jalan disekitar rumah hari ini. Tak ada yang menarik...#$e#...#$e#Pemandangan dari rumah kita sangat indah. Kau bisa melihat Sun Set darisini.

Indoor_Night_1.0: Mungkin aku meminum terlalu banyak kopi... Aku tak merasa ngantuk.#$e#Aku masih berusaha menyesuaikan diri hidup sehat. Dulu aku sering begadang sampai jam lima pagi.$h

Indoor_Night_2.0: Sangat keren mempunyai rumah sendiri. Aku bisa melakukan apapun yang kusuka dan tak ada orang yang melarang.#$e#Kuyakin Maru bahagia sejak aku pergi.

Indoor_Night_3.0: Aku melihat kalelawar dijendela tadi. Agak susah melihatnya, tapi kalau kau fokus kau bisa melihatnya.
