Indoor_Night_4.0: Aku kadang tak dihargai dirumah... tapi aku merasa disini adalah tempatku. Terima kasih telah memberiku hidup yang sebenarnya, @.$l

Outdoor_0.0: Aku ingin melakukan sesuatu hari ini... tapi aku tak tau apa. Apa kau pernah merasa seperti itu, @?

Outdoor_1.0: Hmm... kadang aku memaksa diriku keluar untuk kesehatanku.#$e#Aku tak tau kenapa, tapi aku lebih senang tinggal dirumah. Mungkin kebiasaan lamaku.

Outdoor_2.0: Aku akan melihatmu darisini.$h#$e#Aku senang melihatmu darisini.

Outdoor_3.0: Karena kita sudah menikah, aku tak ingin jadi pria lembek. Mungkin aku harus mulai latihan?#$e#Itu cuma ide...$h

Outdoor_4.0: Kita harus ternak lebih banyak Slime... Dalam jumlah banyak, mereka dapat menghasilkan uang. Dan mereka sangat mudah diternak.#$e#Dan setiap warna slime dapat menghasilkan item yang berbeda.

OneKid_0.0: Aku masih berusaha menjadi ayah. Jangan khawatir, Aku akan merawat dengan baik %kid1! Hanya saja, ini sesuatu yang baru.

OneKid_1.0: Mungkin ketika %kid1 agak besar, aku akan memasang kursi samping pada motor dan kita bisa berkendara bareng.$h

OneKid_3.0: Kau mencium bau %kid1? Saatnya dia untuk mandi...

TwoKids_0.0: Jangan khawatir, Aku sudah memberi makan anak-anak... %kid2 menumpahkan susu coklat dibajuku lagi.

TwoKids_1.0: Kuharap %kid1 dan %kid2 baik satu sama lain. Maru dan aku suka berantem saat kecil.#$e#Kalau kuingat lagi, itu semua salahku...

TwoKids_2.0: Aku memimpikan %kid2 menggunakan kostum shadow shaman dan duduk diatas labu yang bersinar. Aneh ya?

TwoKids_3.0: Kita sudah sejauh ini, @. Lihat keluarga kita. Jujur, aku tak pernah berfikir akan seperti ini.#$e#Sekarang aku benar-benar bahagia...$l

Good_0.0: Hey. Lihat aku. Jangan pernah lupa kalau aku mencintaimu... kau segalanya untukku.$l#$b#Sekarang pergilah mencari uang.$h

Good_1.0: Hey... kesinilah. Kau terlihat cantik hari ini.$l

Good_2.0: Kau selalu terlihat imut, bahkan setelah bertindak ceroboh dikebun.$l

Good_3.0: Aku tak pernah menunjukkannya, tapi aku bahagia menjadi suami mu. Menikahimu adalah keputusan terbaik dalam hidupku.$l

Good_4.0: Kau tak perlu mengkhawatirkan ku. Aku suka menghabiskan waktu sendirian.

Good_5.0: Kadang aku merasa marah... tapi ketika kau muncul, aku mulai tenang.$7#$e#Mungkin itu akan memperlambat penuaan ku.

Good_6.0: Aku tau kau tangguh, tapi aku masih khawatir. Jangan berburu monster tanpa Elixir dan perlengkapan yang bagus, ok?

Good_8.0: Aku tak ingin kerja hari ini. Mungkin akan menonton TV.

Good_9.0: Aku tak butuh teman. Kau satu-satunya orang yang kubuthkan dihidupku. Apa itu aneh?#$e#Kurasa aku berbeda dari oranglain.

Neutral_0.0: Ketika aku jalan-jalan, aku menghindari masyarakat. Aku benci bila sudah ikut bergosip.

Neutral_2.0: Kenapa tak kau ceritakan harimu nanti malam? Aku agak sibuk sekarang...

Neutral_3.0: Apa kau akan kekota hari ini? Kenapa, ada perlu apa?

Neutral_4.0: Kurasa aku akan mencuci baju hari ini... Soalnya kau sibuk dengan urusan kebun.

Neutral_5.0: Apa keuangan kita baik-baik saja? Aku tak mau menjual laptopku...

Neutral_6.0: Kalau kau ingin bertemu dengan temanmu dikota silahkan. Lagipula aku suka sendirian.

Neutral_8.0: Membersihkan rumah tak menyenangkan, tapi itu berbeda jika kau sambil mendengarkan musik.

Bad_5.0: Aku ingin sendirian. Lebih baik kau urus urusanmu sendiri dulu?

Bad_6.0: Apa mau mu? Kau sudah seperti ayah tiri ku. Pergilah.$a

Bad_7.0: Tempat ini mulai terasa seperti kuburan.$s

Bad_8.0: Aku mulai merokok lagi... Akhir-akhir ini aku sangat stress.$s

funLeave_Sebastian.0: Aku mau jalan-jalan. Butuh waktu sendirian. Sampai jumpa nanti malam.

funReturn_Sebastian.0: Hariku baik-baik saja, tak ada yang harus kuceritakan. Kenapa tak kau ceritakan harimu?

spring_12.0: Apa kau semangat untuk festival besok? Aku tak sabar bertemu Sam lagi.

spring_23.0: Oh... besok event flower dance, kan? Apa kita harus pergi?#$e#Aku benci memakai kostum ketat itu. Kenapa Lewis membuat kita melakukannya?$s

summer_1.0: Musim panas tiba... Aku harus mulai menggunakan lotion untuk menjaga kulitku...

summer_10.0: Sudah ada rencana untuk sup luau besok?#$e#Aku tak tau apa yang bagus... kau kokinya!$7

summer_27.0: Cuaca sudah mulai sejuk. Rasanya sungguh nyaman.#$e#Haruskan kita pergi ke festival besok malam? Sebenarnya aku menyukai festival itu.$7

fall_1.0: Kelihatannya kota sudah berubah dalam semalam... Kurasa musim gugur akhirnya tiba.

fall_15.0: Pameran Stardew Valley agak penuh orang... aku hanya akan bertemu dengan Sam. Akan menyenangkan jika nongkrong dengannya.#$e#Nikmati saja festivalnya, jangan pedulikan aku.$7

fall_26.0: Besok adalah Spirit's Eve, aku sangat bersemangat. Aku penasaran hantu apa yang akan ada disana.$h

winter_1.0: Apa rencanamu musim dingin ini? Aku tau kalau waktu luangmu semakin banyak.

winter_7.0: Apa kau akan ikut kontes memancing besok?

winter_28.0: Tahun yang bagus, @. Kita harus merayakannya sedikit. [346]$h#$e#Kuyakin tahun depan lebih bagus lagi.$7

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I hope Jas and Marnie are doing alright without me.#$e#I'm not too worried... Jas is old enough now to take care of the animals on her own.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: You know what? I think I've lost some weight since moving in with you.$6
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Here... take this.[346 174 303 305 215]#$e#I bought some of those a while ago and they're almost expired...
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Buhh... I don't feel like being productive today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: @, should I do something useful today?... or just nap forever?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hmm... seems like a good night to microwave a few pizza rolls.#$e#Some people like to cook them in the oven, but it just takes too long for me. Plus I like that squishy texture.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: The tip-tappa-tip of the rain takes me to a different time... a different place.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I guess... if I had some pants I might've gone outside today... but, nah.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I like gloomy weather, but I feel kinda bad for the hens.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Tip-tappa-tip-tappa-tip... I'm starting to feel thirsty.$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Buh... sometimes life feels like a slow, gray blur... know what I mean?
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey. Take this... I put a bit too much in the microwave. [195 215 206]#$e#Sorry if it's squishy.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Do me a favor... when I pass away, use my dust to fertilize some corn for the hens.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: *smooch*... Mmm, it tastes like someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls.$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky guy.$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I'm just gonna have a couple more beers before closing my eyes for the night.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: If... If only... ah, I was just thinking back on the glory days, when I played gridball on the varsity team.$6#$b#Now I'm old and weak, though...
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Ughh... *gurgle*... I feel a little bloated... oof... too much Joja all-purpose dipping sauce.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Buh... I wish I was six inches taller and a whole lot smarter...#$e#You like me for who I am? I still have a hard time understanding that...
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I spent all day watching TV and now my legs feel like soft dough. Guess I'll have to take it easy until tomorrow.
Entries.Outdoor_0: I didn't sleep well last night so I'm hoping this fresh air will get the juices flowing.#$e#What juices, you ask? Heh... you're weird.$h
Entries.Outdoor_1: Sometimes I stop and realize that I'm nothing more than a bag of juicy, squishy flesh.#$e#But hey... that's just fine... what's life, anyway?$h
Entries.Outdoor_2: When I stop and think about it... I'm in a good place. My life is pretty nice.$6
Entries.Outdoor_3: Ooohh... my tongue is swollen from eating too many pepper poppers.$s
Entries.Outdoor_4: Hey, @. You were sleeping like a baby so I slipped out of bed and went for a morning walk around the farm. Everything looks fine.
Entries.OneKid_0: It's weird, when I was younger I swore I'd never have a kid. I wonder what happened to me?$6
Entries.OneKid_1: Let's make sure to give %kid1 lots of eggs... Baby's gotta grow those legs!
Entries.OneKid_3: Papa Shane reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already fed the kids two bowls of pizza puffs cereal. They'll be full for a while.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I'll be honest... two kids is enough for me.
Entries.TwoKids_2: Ugh... %kid2 is being a little brat today. Must've gotten that from me...
Entries.TwoKids_3: *Sigh*... If only we could send the kids off to Joja work-camp for a season...#$e#I'm just kidding.$h
Entries.Good_0: *Sniff*... *sniff*... mmm... what's that wonderful fragrance you're wearing? Eau de pepperoni?$6
Entries.Good_1: You're a lot better-looking than me, you know that?$h
Entries.Good_2: The name 'Shane' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.
Entries.Good_3: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night.$h
Entries.Good_4: Hey, if I ever seem cranky, just ignore it. I get in weird moods sometimes, but it's not about you... okay?
Entries.Good_5: Ah... life on the farm sure beats working at Joja. That place was disgusting.$h#$e#You think it was depressing out front? Kid, you should've seen the back room...
Entries.Good_6: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a guy could need.$h
Entries.Good_8: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.
Entries.Good_9: Huh... You're wondering why I have this goofy grin on my face? You really have a short memory span, don't you? *blush*$h
Entries.Neutral_0: Oh, do you need something from me? Sorry, I'm kind of busy at the moment.
Entries.Neutral_2: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...
Entries.Neutral_3: Working at Joja was a drag, but at least I got to interact with people occasionally.
Entries.Neutral_4: What, you want me to clean the dishes? I'll do it... eventually...
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to go back to work at Joja.
Entries.Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'm happy in the company of the TV and a couple of tall boys.
Entries.Neutral_8: Ugh... clean, clean, clean. Sweep, sweep, sweep. Bathe. Cook. Make the bed... Oh, well. Life's alright.
Entries.Bad_5: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?
Entries.Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like Marnie on one of her bad days. Go away.$a
Entries.Bad_7: Farm-life is actually really boring. What am I doing here?$s
Entries.Bad_8: Yeah... *hic* ... Sure, honey. Whatever you say... *hic*
Entries.funLeave_Shane: I'm going to go out today, alright?
Entries.funReturn_Shane: Sorry if I'm sweaty... That was quite a walk... Buh, I'm out of shape.$6
Entries.spring_1: Ooo... my throbbing head. How many did I have last night?
Entries.spring_12: The egg festival is probably my favorite... you know how I am, I go crazy for anything to do with chickens.$h
Entries.spring_23: Oh, right. It's the flower dance tomorrow. Hey, if it makes you happy, I'm happy.
Entries.summer_1: I like seeing all the tropical plants this time of year. The valley gets so lush.
Entries.summer_10: I might fast until the luau tomorrow. I need the ol' bag to be empty so I can fill it with piping hot soup.$h
Entries.summer_27: What are your plans for the fall? I'm going to try and incorporate more wine into my diet.
Entries.fall_1: Hmm... I might have to buy a few cases of pumpkin ale to celebrate the season...$6
Entries.fall_15: I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.$6
Entries.fall_17: I'm starting to really feel my age... and I'm not comfortable with that at all.
Entries.winter_1: Any big plans this winter? I'll probably end up watching a lot of TV and just hanging out around the house.
Entries.winter_28: Well, another year gone by... I look a little older, but that's about all.$6

Entries.Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm Maru. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
Entries.Resort_Entering: Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: That was fun!
Entries.Resort: I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favorite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!
Entries.Resort_Towel: *gasp*... It's a solar eclipse!$3#$b#Oh... nevermind. It's just your body blocking the sun.
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: We're so far removed from civilization out here.#$b#Imagine the stars you could see at night.#$e#Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Mmmm... Why are tropical fruits so good?
Entries.Resort_Shore: I wonder if Willy would let me bring my telescope here sometime...#The sky is so clear here, I bet I could spot Pelican Town out in the horizon.#Maybe I'd even see you running around %farm Farm!
Entries.divorced: We have nothing to say to each other.$a
Entries.breakUp: Not good enough for you, huh?$a#$b#Fine...$s
Entries.dumped_Girls: You've got some nerve, speaking to me!$a
Entries.secondChance_Girls: You've lost some respect with me, @... but I'm willing to forgive you.$s
Entries.Mon: Whenever I'm struggling with a technical problem, I always take a walk.#$e#It's surprising how much a change of scenery can help.
Entries.Tue: Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter.
Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.#$b#He says he likes having me around in case his medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Thu: I plan on spending a lot of time with my telescope this summer.
Entries.Sat: Do you know my Dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
Entries.Fri: Hey, sorry if I seem cranky... I'm a little sore from work yesterday.#$c .5# I had to carry ten boxes of medical files to the attic!#$e#I had to sort patient records for four hours straight!
Entries.Sun: Hi!#$q 3/4 Sun_01_old#Do you have fun working on the farm?#$r 3 0 Sun_01_01#Yes.#$r 4 0 Sun_01_02#No.
Entries.Sun_01_old: $p 3#Hey, you've made another week of progress on the farm! It seems like things are going well for you.$h|Another tiring week on the farm, huh? It must really be a lot of work...$s
Entries.Sun_01_02: Yikes! I'm sorry. Have you ever thought of doing something different...?$s
Entries.Tue2: Stop by our house when you need to upgrade your buildings.#$e#It's always nice to have visitors.
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Entries.Mon6: Sometimes my head gets so cluttered with nonsense I can hardly think. Does that ever happen to you?#$e#Getting some fresh air usually helps.
Entries.Wed8: I work at Harvey's clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#He's nice, but not really my type...
Entries.Thu10: Oh, @! Is there anything you want to talk to me about?$l
Entries.Event_Hospital_1: Of course he'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Entries.Event_Hospital_2: Okay. I'll blame it on you, then.$u
Entries.Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell him the truth.%fork$u
Entries.Event_Space2: I guess you could see it like that...$s#$b#But it's still incredible, isn't it?
Entries.Event_Cut1: Oh no?$8#$b#Well, that makes me feel a little better, then. Thanks.
Entries.Event_Cut2: Oh no! Aghh... I'm really really sorry.$s
Entries.event_robot1: Thanks. That means a lot to me, @.#$b#I know gadgets aren't really your kind of thing... but I do appreciate that you're showing interest in what I do.#$b#I wish I could return the favor somehow.$l
Entries.event_robot2: What? After she said point-blank that she doesn't want to be a slave? How cold...%fork$a
Entries.event_robot3: Heh...$8#$b#Yeah I guess he did kinda say that, didn't he?$l#$b#...Um...$l
Entries.event_robot_explain1: ...$s#$b#You have a point, I did program her to act human... but her neural net is so complex, I can't be sure conciousness didn't emerge on its own.$8#$b#Furthermore, isn't it a little arrogant to assume that human-like consciousness is the only worthwhile vessel of existence? Computer brains are different than ours, but that doesn't mean we can disregard them.$8
Entries.event_robot_explain2: I see. Well it wasn't a very funny joke.$a
Entries.event_robot_explain3: That's horrible! What's gotten into you, @?$a#$b#I'm just going to forget about this conversation... you aren't acting yourself.$a
Entries.summer_1: This is going to be a great season for stargazing.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hmm... What sort of gadget should I tinker with this summer?
Entries.summer_Mon6: Come to my room if you ever want to tinker with my gadgets.
Entries.summer_Tue: Sebastian is my half-brother, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Sebastian hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if he even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a brother but he doesn't act like one.
Entries.summer_Wed: Are you enjoying the season?#$e#It's been so warm this year.$h
Entries.summer_Thu: Sorry, I was just thinking about some gadgets I'm making.#$q 35/36 Thu_01_old#I've decided I'm going to build a robot someday.#$r 35 30 Thu_0#That should be very easy for you#$r 36 -50 Thu_01_01#You should be more realistic#$r 35 40 Thu_01_02#It sounds challenging
Entries.Thu_0: Really? Are you sure you're not just trying to flatter me?
Entries.Thu_01_01: You don't think I could do it?$s
Entries.Thu_01_02: You're right, but I love a challenge!$h
Entries.summer_Sat: Hey, have any interesting farm stories to tell me?#$e#Guess not.
Entries.summer_Fri: I worked at the clinic yesterday. We didn't have a single patient.#$e#I guess people get sick less during summer.
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.summer_Fri2: Hey, tell me a story about farming.#$e#That's really interesting!
Entries.summer_Wed4: Is it just me or did it suddenly get really hot?#$e#I guess it's just me.
Entries.summer_Sun6: Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor.$u#$e#You're lucky to be friends with me!#$b#...just kidding.
Entries.summer_Thu10: How do your hands stay so soft with all that farm work?
Entries.fall_Mon: Have you explored the mines much? I've heard you can find some useful materials there.
Entries.fall_Thu: In other parts of the world it's spring right now. Imagine that!
Entries.fall_Wed: Bleh... I don't feel like working tomorrow.
Entries.fall_Fri: I bet we'll start seeing more people at the clinic this season.$s#$e#I hope everyone stays healthy.
Entries.fall_Sat: All these falling leaves will provide food for mushrooms and other small organisms.$u#$e#Interesting, isn't it?
Entries.fall_Sun: Hey, here's to another good week! *toast*
Entries.fall_Tue2: @, I just love how the trees look right now!#$e#I know you like them too.
Entries.fall_Wed4: If you have any extra metal laying around, I could always use it for one of my projects.#$e#But only if you don't need it yourself.
Entries.fall_Fri6: I've been feeling especially optimistic lately...$h
Entries.fall_Mon8: You should come visit me at the clinic Tomorrow. I work from 10 a.m.to 4 p.m.$h
Entries.fall_Thu10: You have a leaf in your hair. Let me get it for you.#$e#...$h
Entries.winter_Mon: Did you see the snowman I built?$h
Entries.winter_Tue: My hair gets so frizzy in this dry weather. *sigh*
Entries.winter_Wed: I guess winter is a good time to work on my gadgets.#$e#I wonder if I could make anything useful for farmers?
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my Dad would flip.
Entries.winter_Fri: I hope I don't catch the flu this year.
Entries.winter_Sat: Have you built a furnace yet?#$e#You can use them to turn raw material like ores into more useful products.$u
Entries.winter_Sun: I get so sleepy when it's cold...
Entries.winter_Sat2: Hey, if any of your farming machines need to be fixed, just let me know.$h
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, do you have any ideas for a new gadget I can make?#$e#Mhmm. I trust your opinion.
Entries.winter_Fri6: You look fresh today. I guess it's that crisp winter air.
Entries.winter_Mon8: Hi @!$h#$e#Hey, don't you think my snowman looks kind of like you?
Entries.winter_Thu10: @, come closer. I'm cold.$l#$e#My hands are so dry from the winter air. I'm sorry about that.$l

Introduction.0: Oh! Bukankah kau yang baru saja pindah?#$b#Aku Maru. Aku sangat ingin bertemu denganmu!$h#$e#Kau tau, dengan kota kecil seperti ini, wajah baru dapat mengubah masyarakat yang dinamis. Ini menarik!

Resort_Entering.0: Willy mentioned that you helped fix the boat. Thanks for doing that!

Resort_Leaving.0: That was fun!

Resort.0: I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favorite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!

Resort_Towel.0: *gasp*... It's a solar eclipse!$3#$b#Oh... nevermind. It's just your body blocking the sun.

Resort_Towel_2.0: We're so far removed from civilization out here.#$b#Imagine the stars you could see at night.#$e#Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!$h

Resort_Bar.0: Mmmm... Why are tropical fruits so good?

Resort_Shore.0: I wonder if Willy would let me bring my telescope here sometime...#The sky is so clear here, I bet I could spot Pelican Town out in the horizon.#Maybe I'd even see you running around %farm Farm!

divorced.0: Kita tak memeiliki apapun untuk dibahas lagi.$a

breakUp.0: Not good enough for you, huh?$a#$b#Fine...$s

secondChance_Girls.0: Kau telah kehilangan kepercayaanku, @... tapi aku bersedia memaafkanmu.$s

Mon.0: Setiap kali aku berjuang dengan masalah teknis, aku selalu berjalan-jalan.#$e#Ini mengejutkan berapa banyak pemandangan dapat membantu meredakan suasana.

Tue.0: Kau bertemu ibuku? Dia tukang kayu.

Wed.0: Pada hari Selasa dan Kamis aku bekerja di klinik Harveys.#$b#Ia mengatakan ia suka aku bekerja disana!$h#$e#Menjadi petani mudah sekali, kan?

Thu.0: Aku berencana untuk menghabiskan banyak waktu dengan teleskopku musim panas ini.

Sat.0: Kau kenal ayahku, Demetrius? Dia ilmuwan. Sangat menyenangkan membantu dia keluar di laboratorium.

Fri.0: Hei, maaf jika aku tampak rewel ... aku sedikit sakit dari pekerjaan kemarin.#$c .5# Aku harus membawa sepuluh kotak file medis ke loteng!#$e#Aku harus memilah catatan pasien selama empat jam!

Sun.0: Hi!#$q 3/4 Sun_01_old#Apakah menyenangkan bekerja di kebunm?#$r 3 0 Sun_01_01#Iya.#$r 4 0 Sun_01_02#Tidak.

Sun_01_old.0: $p 3#Hei, Kau telah membuat kemajuan di pertanian! Sepertinya semuanya berjalan dengan baik.$h|Setiap minggu melelahkan, ya? Kau memang banyak pekerjaan...$s

Sun_01_02.0: Astaga! Maafkan saya. Apakah kau pernah berpikir untuk melakukan sesuatu yang berbeda...?$s

Tue2.0: Mampir ke rumah kami jika kau ingin meng-upgrade bangunan.#$e#bagus sekali punya pengunjung.

Fri4.0: Ibu saya adalah seorang tukang kayu dan ayah saya adalah seorang ilmuwan. Aku kira itu masuk akal bahwa aku menjadi gadget bangunan.

Mon6.0: Kadang-kadang kepalaku berantakan dengan omong kosong. Aku hampir tidak bisa berpikir. Apakah itu pernah terjadi ke padamu?#$e#Udara segar kadang membantu.

Wed8.0: Pada hari Selasa dan Kamis aku bekerja di klinik Harveys.#$e#Dia baik, tapi dia bukan tipeku...

Thu10.0: Oh, @! Apakah ada sesuatu yang ingin kau berbicarakan denganku?#l

Event_Hospital_1.0: Tentu saja dia tahu bedanya! Sampel ini benar-benar hancur!%fork$s

Event_Hospital_3.0: Kau benar. Aku seharusnya memberitahukan kebenarannya.%fork$u

Event_Space2.0: Aku kira kau bisa melihatnya seperti itu...$s#$b#Tapi itu masih luar biasa, bukan?

Event_Cut1.0: Oh no?$8#$b#Nah, kau membuatku merasa sedikit lebih baik. Terima kasih.

Event_Cut2.0: Oh no! Aghh... Aku minta maaf.$s

event_robot1.0: Terima kasih. Itu berarti banyak bagiku, @.#$b#Meskipun tidak benar ... tapi aku menghargaimu karena menunjukkan minat pada apa yang aku lakukan.#$b#Aku berharap aku bisa membalas budi.$l

Entries.Mon: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.#$e#Just ask me if you need anything.
Entries.Tue: I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.
Entries.Wed: I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.
Entries.Thu: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.#$e#You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?
Entries.Fri: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.#$e#Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
Entries.Sat: Stop by whenever you wanna relax.
Entries.Sun: Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Mon: There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid. Some day, you might understand.#$b#For now, just keep striving for excellence in everything you do.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Tue: I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.#$b#You see... The mind is a very powerful tool.#$b#In fact, it's the most powerful tool in all of reality... and beyond.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: I'm impressed with your tenacity, kid... it took a lot of walnuts to get this far.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Thu: Wherever you go... I'm always behind the curtain, making sure the show is interesting. Hahaha...#$b#Or... am I?
Entries.QiNutRoom_Fri: Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.#$b#It's always within your power to go one step further than you used to believe.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sat: Some things transcend time and space, kid. It's a unique feeling in the heart... a whisper of things beyond.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sun: On the left, you'll find a board with my special challenges... custom-tailored for you, kid.#$b#On the right, a set of fantastic prizes for those who meet my challenge...#$b#Good luck, kid.

Mon.0: Bekerja keraslah, Nak. Aku pikir kau akan menjadi bintang.#$e#Tinggal tanya jika butuh sesuatu.

Tue.0: Aku tahu kau akan berakhir di sini suatu hari nanti. Tentu saja, aku harus membuat sedikit sulit sehingga kau memiliki impian untuk mencapai kesuksesan.

Wed.0: Aku lahir sebagai anak biasa, tapi aku membuat keputusan bahwa aku akan menjadi luar biasa.

Thu.0: Hei. Jangan memberitahu siapa pun tentang tempat ini, oke? Saya ingin tetap ... eksklusif.#$e#Kau akan menyimpan rahasia untuk temanmu ini, kan?

Fri.0: Jangan pernah berhenti berusaha untuk mencapai kesempurnaan.#$e#Janganlah merasa cepat puas dengan apa yang kau miliki.

Sat.0: Mampir setiap kali kau ingin bersantai.

Sun.0: Tetep bekerja keras, mungkin suatu hari kau bisa jadi sepertiku.

QiNutRoom_Mon.0: Dunia ini tidak sebatas apa yang mata bisa lihat, Nak. Suatu hari, kau akan mengerti.#$b#Untuk sekarang, tingkatkan kerja kerasmu.

QiNutRoom_Tue.0: Ada suatu masa dimana aku menggunakan kekuatan kemauan, Nak.#$b#Kau tau... Pikiran adalah kekuatan yang sangat dahsyat.#$b#Bahkan, pikiran adalah kekuatan yang paling hebat di dunia realitas... dan dunia di atasnya.

QiNutRoom_Wed.0: Aku terkesan dengan kegigihanmu, Nak... Butuh banyak sekali walnut untuk sampai ke tempat ini.

QiNutRoom_Thu.0: Kemanapun kau pergi... Aku ada di balik semua itu, dan memastikan agar pertunjukannya tetap seru. Hahaha...#$b#Or... kau percaya?

QiNutRoom_Fri.0: Lihatlah bintang yang paling jauh, dan jadikan bintang itu menjadi mimpimu.#$b#Kekuatanmu adalah dapat melangkah lebih jauh daripada apa yang kau bayangkan.

QiNutRoom_Sat.0: Ada beberapa hal yang tidak terikat ruang dan waktu, Nak. Salah satunya perasaan unik yang ada di setiap hati manusia... Bisikan untuk meraih mimpi.

QiNutRoom_Sun.0: Di sisi kiri, kau akan lihat papan dengan tantangan-tantangan spesial dariku... Kubuat khusus untukmu, Nak.#$b#Di sisi kanan, adalah hadiah bagi yang berhasil menyelesaikan tantangannya...#$b#Semoga beruntung, Nak.

Entries.Introduction: Hey, kid. The name's Pam.#$e#Don't be a jerk and we'll get along fine.
Entries.Resort_Shore: Looks like there's some unique fish swimmin' around. Next time I'll have to bring my pole!
Entries.Resort: Heh... Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky on the ride over. Delicious!
Entries.Resort_Chair: Now this is comfort! I might even take my shoes off!$h#$e#Better not look too closely at my feet, kid.
Entries.Resort_Bar: It's a special occasion, kid... I'm ordering something unique. Make it a double!$h
Entries.reject_867: Wow, would you look at that... It's like something out of the future.#$b#Hehe, sorry kid... I can't use that. There's more buttons than I have brain cells!$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: I can't believe you bought me a house! Is there any catch?#$e#Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice...$s
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I can't believe someone bought me a house! I wonder if it's some kind of scam?#$e#Sorry, I'm not used to people being so nice...$s
Entries.MovieInvitation: Date night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah!$h^Ladies night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah!$h#$b#Sure thing, kid... I'll see you there.
Entries.cc_Bus: Hey, did you hear about the ol' bus?#$b#Yep... I'm back on the saddle, kid... hehe. Feels nice.$h
Entries.Mon: #$1 PamDrank#urghh... my head...$k#$e#You know, I'd eat healthier food if I could afford it.#$e#Hey, you probably have a lot of tasty grub growin' on your farm, hm?
Entries.Saloon: Nothin' like a sip o' the good stuff to warm these old bones...$h
Entries.Saloon_Entry: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./Gus! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.Trailer_Entry: Penny! Did you make dinner?/Penny! You done your chores?/Penny! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Saloon6: Hey, kid. I'd buy you a drink if I could afford it!
Entries.Saloon_Wed: *Sigh*... Hey, kid. You're too young to be moping around in a place like this.
Entries.Saloon_Thu: *gulp* ... I've been looking forward to this beverage all afternoon. Heh heh.
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Oi, Gus! Gimme another pint of your strongest!
Entries.Saloon_Sun: %Pam seems out of it. Better leave her alone right now.
Entries.Tue: Hey, you! Don't be snoopin' around the trailer when I'm out. Got it?$u#$e#Sorry, but I gotta be cautious with strangers.
Entries.Tue2: I was reading the newspaper this morning but then I got depressed. It's a rotten world, kid.#$e#Keep your head screwed on right and you'll make it through in one piece...#$b#That's what my Pappy always used to say. Heh heh heh.$h
Entries.Wed: $d bus#You don't know how glad I am that the bus is up and running! I feel alive again.|Times have been tough lately. I got laid off of my job as a bus driver. If I got that job back I could drive you to Calico Desert.
Entries.Thu: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. Penny's my baby girl. Be nice to her or leave her alone, got it?
Entries.Thu4: Penny says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.Thu4_inlaw_Penny: It's awful lonely at home all by myself...
Entries.Fri2: You know, I've been thinking... I wish I had a hobby. Something to do other than hanging around at that saloon every night.#$e#You got any ideas?#$e#...Ehh. Maybe I'll play checkers against myself.
Entries.Fri: Each day's just the same as the last...$s#$b#If only I'd been born rich...$s
Entries.Sat: Make sure your boots are clean before you go stompin' around in my house.$u#$e#It's annoying to clean a mess. You should know that by now.
Entries.Sat4: I wish a team of elves would come during the night and tidy up my house. Hahahaha.$h#$e#I could sure go for some parsnips.#$e#If my legs weren't so stiff I'd visit the mountains every now and then.
Entries.Sun: Are you friends with Gus? He's a pretty good guy.#$e#He even gives me free beer on my birthday.
Entries.event_credit1: Hey, watch your mouth! No one tells me what to do!$u
Entries.summer_Tue2: Oh, it's Mr. @.^Oh it's Miss @.#$e#Do you need my help or something?
Entries.summer_Tue6: I had hopes and dreams like you, once... But look at me now.$s#$e#Life doesn't always turn out like you expect.#$e#Ah well. There's no sense dwellin' on what you don't have.
Entries.summer_Wed: Havin' a local farm is good for our town.
Entries.summer_Wed4: Maybe if you do real well on your farm it'll boost the local economy.#$e#Then everyone will have a job and we'll all be happy, right?
Entries.summer_Thu: Oh, hi there, farmer.#$e#I don't often chit-chat with strangers.
Entries.summer_Thu4: I always seem to end up at the saloon at some point.#$e#It's too close to my house. It ain't healthy.
Entries.summer_Fri: ...Yeah?#$e#You're a fine lookin' young man. Why're you wastin' your time talkin' to an old girl like me?^You're a pretty gal. What're you wastin' your time talkin' to someone like me for?
Entries.summer_Sat2: Don't mind that ol' dog next to the house.#$b#He might look at you cross, but he'll never get up from that box in a hunderd years.#$b#The old boy's name? It's Dusty.
Entries.summer_Sat: Someone's been complainin' about my yard... sayin' it's a mess. Was it you?$u#$e#Hmmm...
Entries.fall_Tue: If I knew you better, I'd be more inclined to chat.
Entries.fall_Tue4: I used to be young, once. Hard to believe, huh?#$e#Time sure goes fast when you grow up.$s
Entries.fall_Wed: *Sigh*... I guess I'll be popping a frozen dinner into the microwave tonight.$s
Entries.fall_Thu: Penny's the only one I've got, so you best treat her kindly.
Entries.fall_Fri: Every day is the same old routine...$s#$e#Do you ever have that problem, farmer?
Entries.fall_Sat: Would you do me a kindness and clean up my house?#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.fall_Sun: Don't you have work to do?#$e#You should be thankful that you have a job rather than moping around town all the time.
Entries.fall_Sun4: I miss my old truck driving job. I used to go all around the valley, meetin' people, listenin' to the radio.#$e#Times sure do change.
Entries.winter_Mon: You got any hogs on that farm?
Entries.winter_Tue: Do you want somethin' from me, kid? Best look somewhere else.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope Penny has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny: Hey. You better be treatin' Penny right on that old farm of yours. She's the only one I got!
Entries.winter_Wed: Hey kid. What're you up to?#$e#I'm just passin' time, same as always.
Entries.winter_Thu: It's awful cold. A visit to the saloon should warm me up, don't you think? Heh heh.#$e#Why don't you swing by the saloon later for a taste o' the Oh-Be-Joyful?
Entries.winter_Fri: Penny sure does like old books. I think she's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.
Entries.winter_Sat: I oughta take up fishin', seein' as how close the river is.
Entries.winter_Sun: Blah... my front yard's a mess.$s

Introduction.0: Hai nak, namaku Pam.#$e#Jangan membuat keributan dan semuanya akan baik-baik saja.

Resort_Shore.0: Kelihatannya ada ikan unik yang hidup di perairan sini. Lain kali aku harus bawa pancingan!

Resort.0: Heh... Di perjalanan, Willy memberikan dendeng ikan kepada kami semua. Enak sekali!

Resort_Chair.0: Nah, ini baru santai! Aku mungkin akan melepas sepatuku!$h#$e#Sebaiknya kau tidak melihat kaki ku, nak.

Resort_Bar.0: Karena ini waktu yang spesial... Aku memesan sesuatu yang unik. Beri dua gelas!$h

reject_867.0: Wow, lihat itu... Benda ini seperti datang dari masa depan.#$b#Hehe, maaf nak... Aku tidak bisa pakai benda ini. Lebih banyak tombolnya daripada sel kepalaku!$h

pamHouseUpgrade.0: Aku tak percaya kau membelikanku sebuah rumah! Jangan-jangan kau punya niat lain?#$e#Maaf, aku tidak biasa dengan perlakuan baik dari orang...$s

pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous.0: Aku tak percaya seseorang membelikanku sebuah rumah! Jangan-jangan ini hanya tipuan?#$e#Maaf, aku tidak biasa dengan perlakuan baik dari orang...$s

MovieInvitation.0: Kencan malam dengan Pam tua, huh? Hah!$h^Malam gadis bersama Pam tua, huh? Hah!$h#$b#Tentu, nak... Kutemui kau disana.

cc_Bus.0: Hei, apa kau dengar tentang bus tua itu?#$b#Yep... Aku kembali bekerja, nak... hehe. Ini bagus.$h

Mon.0: #$1 PamDrank#urghh... kepalaku...$k#$e#Kau tahu, aku akan makan makanan sehat jika aku bisa membelinya.#$e#Hei, kau bunya sayuran sehat di kebunmu, kan?

Saloon.0: Tidak ada yang lebih baik selain menghangatkan tubuh yang sudah tua...$h

Saloon_Entry.0: Ah... Akhirnya./Aku butuh minum./Gus! Seperti biasanya./Hey, aku kembali!/Ooh aku haus!/Tenggorokanku kering!

Trailer_Entry.0: Penny! Kau buat makan malam?/Penny! Tugasmu selesai?/Penny! Kau dirumah?/Hey! Aku pulang!

Saloon6.0: Hey, nak. Aku akan membelikanmu minum jika aku bisa membelinya!

Saloon_Wed.0: *Sigh*... Hey, nak.Kau terlalu muda untuk murung di tempat seperti ini.

Saloon_Thu.0: *gulp* ... Aku setiap sore minum disini. Heh heh.

Saloon_Fri.0: Oi, Gus! Berikan minuman lain yang lebih kuat!

Saloon_Sun.0: %Pam tidak mendengarkan. Lebih baik meninggalkannya sendiri.

Tue.0: Hei kau! Jangan menggangu di sekitar trailer ketika aku keluar. Mengerti?$u#$e#Maaf, tapi aku harus berhati-hati dengan orang asing.

Tue2.0: Aku sedang membaca koran pagi ini tapi kemudian aku tertekan. Ini adalah dunia yang busuk, nak.#$e#Jauhkan kekaucan di kepalamu ,nak...#$b#Itulah yang Puppyku selalu katakan. Heh heh heh.$h

Wed.0: $d bus#Kau tidak tahu betapa senangnya aku ketika bus ini berjalan! Saya merasa hidup kembali.|Times have been tough lately. I got laid off of my job as a bus driver. If I got that job back I could drive you to Calico Desert.

Thu.0: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... Aku terlalu banyak minum di Saloon tadi malam... Enyahlah.$k#$e#Rumahku tidak cantik tapi setidaknya dekat sungai.#$e#Hei. Penny adalah bayi perempuanku. Jadilah baik padanya atau meninggalkannya sendirian, oke?

Thu4.0: Penny aku terlalu sering ke saloon...$s

Fri2.0: Kau tahu, aku sudah berpikir ... Aku berharap aku punya hobi. Sesuatu yang harus dilakukan selain berkeliaran di saloon setiap malam.#$e#Kau punya ide?#$e#...Ehh. Mungkin aku akan bermain catur melawan diri sendiri.

Fri.0: Hari yang sama setiap hari...$s#$b#Akan menyenangkan jika terlahir kaya...$s

Sat.0: Pastikan sepatu bersih sebelum masuk ke rumahku!$u#$e#Kau tau, sangat menyebalkan membersihkannya.

Sat4.0: Saya berharap para elf akan datang pada malam hari dan merapikanku. Hahahaha.$h#$e#Aku yakin bisa pergi dengan beberapa lobak.#$e#Jika kakiku tidak begitu kaku, aku akan mengunjungi pegunungan setiap hari.

Sun.0: Apakah Anda berteman dengan Guys? Dia orang yang cukup baik.#$e#Dia sering mentraiktirku minim saat aku ulang tahun.

event_credit1.0: Hei, jaga mulutmu! Tidak ada yang memberitahuku apa yang aku harus dilakukan!$u

summer_Tue2.0: Oh, hai. @.^Oh hai @.#$e#Apa kau butuh sesuatu?

summer_Tue6.0: Aku punya harapan dan impian sepertimu, Tapi... lihat aku sekarang.$s#$e#Hidup tidak sesuai dengan yang kau harapkan.#$e#Ah. Tidak ada gunanya tinggal 'pada apa yang tidak kau memiliki.

summer_Wed.0: Punya kebun sendri bagus untuk kota ini.

summer_Wed4.0: Mungkin jika kau melakukannya dengan sangat baik, itu akan meningkatkan ekonomi kota kita.#$e#Lalu semua orang akan senang, bukan?

summer_Thu.0: Oh, hai petani.#$e#Aku tidak bisa mengobrol dengan orang asing.

summer_Thu4.0: Aku selalu kelihatan di bar, kan?#$e#Itu karena dekat dengan rumahku.

summer_Fri.0: ...Yeah?#$e#Kau anak muda yang baik. Kenapa kau membuang-buang 'waktu' untuk seorang gadis tua sepertikua?^Kau seorang gadis yang cantik. Kenapa kau membuang-buang' waktu'dengan seseorang sepertiku?

summer_Sat2.0: Jangan pikirkan anjing di sebelah rumah.#$b#Dia mungkin melihatmu, tapi dia tidak akan pernah bangun dari kandang yang sudah tua itu.#$b#Namanya Dusty.

summer_Sat.0: Seseorang mengeluh 'tentang halamanku ... mengatakan' itu berantakan. Apakah itu kau?$u#$e#Hmmm...

fall_Tue.0: Jika orang baik, aku tidak segan untuk mengorbrol.

fall_Tue4.0: Aku tidak terlihat muda lagi. Sulit dipercaya, kan?#$e#Waktu berlalu begitu cepat.$s

fall_Wed.0: *Sigh*... Aku mungkin akan makan makanan beku lagi malam ini.$s

fall_Thu.0: Penny satu-satunya yang aku punya, sehingga aku akan memperlakukannya dengan baik.

fall_Fri.0: Setiap hari rutinitasku itu-itu saja...$s#$e#Apa kauernah punya masalah?

fall_Sat.0: Aku tidak keberatan kau membersihkan rumahku?#$e#hanya bercanda, Hehehe.$h

fall_Sun.0: Bukankan kau harus bekerjao?#$e#Kau harus bersyukur bahwa kau masih memiliki pekerjaan daripada menganggur sepanjang waktu.

fall_Sun4.0: Aku rindu pekerjaan lamaku. Dulu aku menyetir truk di sekitar lembah, bertemu orang-orang, mendengarkan radio.#$e#Waktu cepat berubah.

winter_Tue.0: Apakah ku ingin sesuatu dari ku, nak?.

winter_Tue4.0: Aku berharap Penny memiliki kehidupan yang baik ke depannya. Kau akan tau bagaimana perasaanku saat kau punya anak.#$e#...Sangat di musim dingin. kulit ku terasa seperti perkamen tua.

winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny.0: Hei. Kau lebih baik mengobati 'Penny secepatnya. Dia satu-satunya yang saya punya!

winter_Wed.0: Hai nak, ada apa?#$e#Aku hanya menghabiskan waktuku seperti biasa.

winter_Thu.0: Ini dinginnya mengerikan. Mampirlahn ke bar jika kau kedingan, bukan begitu? Heh heh.#$e#Mengapa kau tidak mampir ke bar kemudian mencoba rasa 'Oh-Be-Joyful?

winter_Fri.0: Penny suka buku-buka lama. Mungkin dia lebih pintar dariku.#$e#AKu senang sekali.

winter_Sat.0: Aku seharusnya mmemancing ikan di dekat sungai.

Entries.Introduction: Oh... Hello! I'm Penny...
Entries.Resort_Entering: This island is so beautiful!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I had a great time.$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: I'm a little embarrassed wearing my bathing suit in public.$s#$b#I hope no one's looking...$s
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Somehow, the water here looks so different...#$e#I can hardly believe this is the same ocean I've been gazing at my entire life.
Entries.Resort_Towel: The wind keeps making me lose my page, but it feels really great on the skin.$h
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: I'm reading a book about a sailor who washes up on a deserted island.#$b#I wonder what I would do in that sort of a situation?
Entries.Resort_Marriage_Towel_2: Hey honey, do you mind standing a little to the left?#$b#Thanks, the sun was making it a little bit hard to read!$h
Entries.Resort: This sand is so soft and fine. It feels great on my toes!$h
Entries.Mon: Hi... #$e#Oh, did you want something?
Entries.breakUp: ...$s#$b#I... I see... *sniff* ... W... We can just be friends, then.$s
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: What you did for my family is so generous. Thank you!
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: There are some truly wonderful people in the world...
Entries.dumped_Girls: I can't bear to see you...$s
Entries.secondChance_Girls: You've left a permanent scar on my heart, @. Still... I'm ready to speak to you again.$s
Entries.Mon4: *sigh*... My mother definitely has a problem with going to the saloon too much.$s#$q 7/8 Mon_old#But it's best not to dwell on bad things, right?#$r 7 50 Mon_7#Right. It's best to be positive!#$r 8 10 Mon_8#I think it's good to be realistic.
Entries.Mon_old: #$p 7#But if I keep trying I think I can get her to change.|I guess it makes sense. There's not much I can do to change it, anyway.
Entries.Mon_7: That's how I feel. I'm just going to focus on making the future better.
Entries.Mon_8: Maybe you're right. It's better to cope with reality.$u
Entries.Mon8: I'm eager to move out. It's such a burden to be worrying about Mom all the time.#$e#I want her to be happy, but I can't stay here forever... you know?$s
Entries.Tue: I'm tutoring Vincent and Jas today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.
Entries.Tue4: $d bus#Maybe now that my mother has her bus driving job back, I can start saving more money. Things are looking a little brighter.|I'm trying to save money from my tutoring job, but it's hard with my mother out of work.$s
Entries.Tue10: Um, @? A farm seems like a good place for children, don't you think?$l#$e#It was just a thought I had.$l
Entries.Wed: We don't have a school here but I'm doing my best to give Vincent and Jas a proper education.#$e#Every child deserves a chance to be successful.#$e#Jas is very good at math and reading. Vincent is good at... well, he has an active imagination!
Entries.Wed2: You know what? I should take the children on a field trip some time. Maybe to the forest.#$e#A guest speaker would be nice... maybe someone familiar with nature?#$e#Sorry, I'm just thinking out loud.
Entries.Wed4: I've lived in Pelican Town my whole life. Can you believe that?#$e#I guess there's a lot out there I'll never experience.
Entries.Thu: We're very lucky to have a library in such a small town.#$e#When you're lost in a book, it's easy to forget the realities of your life.$u#$e#...Maybe that's why I like reading so much.$s#$e#...Sorry. I got carried away there.
Entries.Thu6: I wish I could keep a garden, but our yard is such a mess.$u#$e#Maybe I'll live in a place where I can have a garden someday.#$e#Maybe I'll live on a farm! *giggle*$h
Entries.Fri: If you dig in the dirt you can find some interesting things.#$e#One time I found a really old piece of pottery. I brought it to Gunther and he said it was over a thousand years old.
Entries.Fri2: If you dig in the dirt you can find some interesting things.#$e#One time I found a really old piece of pottery. I brought it to Gunther and he said it was over a thousand years old.
Entries.Fri4: Dishes, dishes, dishes. Ugh... If my mother wasn't always nursing a headache from her late nights at the saloon, maybe she could help around the house a little.$s
Entries.Sat: This is such a small town. You can't avoid meeting everyone.#$e#I wonder what it's like to live in the city?
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for Pierre's shop. Mom loves JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she can afford a lot more there than she ever could at Pierre's.|Mom's been complaining ever since JojaMart closed down. I think it's good for her, though. Maybe she'll drink less Joja Cola now.
Entries.Sun: Hello. Ummm...$u#$b#The weather's interesting today, don't you think?#$e#Sorry...$u
Entries.Sun4: I've been trying to keep our place clean, but it always gets messy again.$s#$e#It's hard to run a household all by yourself.$u
Entries.event_speaker_kids1: Oh no?$l#$b#Well, I guess that makes sense... you're busy with other things right now.
Entries.event_speaker_kids2: ... Me too. I'm glad you feel that way.$7
Entries.event_speaker_kids3: Yes... the urge to care for something innocent and helpless. It makes sense that we'd feel that.
Entries.event_speaker_kids4: Oh, really?$s#$b# I think you'd make a good parent.$7
Entries.event_speaker_kids5: hmm...$s#$b#If everyone thought like that, humans would die out.$s
Entries.event_speaker_kids6: Oh...$s#$b#That's kind of sad... but I guess I can understand your point.$s
Entries.event_speaker_yes: Great!$h#$b#Let me just call the children over.
Entries.event_speaker_no: Really?... Uh... Well, alright. I guess I'll see you later then.%fork$s
Entries.event_mail1: Thank you...$l#$b#I just wish George wasn't so upset... I was only trying to help.$s
Entries.event_mail2: Oh... I guess you're right.$l#$b#I'm sorry, Mr. Mullner. It was rude, what I did.$s
Entries.event_old1: I guess you're right... why stress out about something you can't change?$u
Entries.event_old2: You're right, we shouldn't ignore the reality of aging.$u#$b#I guess the sooner we come to terms with our mortality, the more time we can spend really living in the here-and-now.$u
Entries.event_old3: That's nice of you to say... I totally agree with you.#$b#We should treat our elders with the same respect we hope to receive ourselves some day.
Entries.event_old4: That's a horrible thing to say. Life is a precious thing to waste like that!$a
Entries.event_cook1: You really mean it? Thank you! ... it's such a relief to hear that.$h#$b#I've been working so hard on this recipe, and I'm really proud of it.
Entries.event_pool2: Really? I thought you'd have noticed by now...$8
Entries.event_pool4: ...Oh, @. I thought you did, but I wasn't sure.$6#$b#...I'll always remember this night.$6^You look so beautiful tonight... I... *gasp*$6
Entries.summer_Mon: Hi... Um, nice weather, isn't it?
Entries.summer_Mon4: $d cc#Thanks for fixing the community center back up. I guess you're kind of a town hero.|Hello, @. It's nice to see you're doing well.
Entries.summer_Fri: $d bus#I heard you were responsible for fixing the bus back up. Thank you.|My mother used to drive the bus to Calico Desert... but the bus stopped working a few years ago. Mayor says there's not enough money in the town coffers, or else he'd have it fixed.$u
Entries.summer_Sun: So... do you like to decorate your farm house?#$e#It must be nice having your own place to decorate.
Entries.summer_Sat: Hello. Ummm...$u#$b#The mountains look nice today, don't they?$u
Entries.fall_Mon: Hi... Um, are you doing okay?$u
Entries.fall_Mon4: It's kind of embarrassing to be the only family in town who lives in a trailer.$u#$e#I wish I could live in a nice house, someday.$s
Entries.fall_Tue4: Your farm looks really pretty right now.$h
Entries.fall_Thu6: Mom doesn't take very good care of herself...$u#$e#I worry about her.$u
Entries.fall_Fri: Fall is a sad time of year for me...$s
Entries.fall_Fri6: When I was a little girl, my father abandoned us because he said he felt 'trapped'. We haven't seen him since.$s#$b#I'm sorry to make things uncomfortable for you... It's just that this time of year makes me think of it for some reason.$u#$e#Anyway... How's the farming life going?
Entries.fall_Sun10: @! I was just thinking about the future...#$e#Where do you picture yourself in ten years?$l#$e#I have a few ideas for myself...$u
Entries.fall_Sat8: Hi @.$h#$e#Your farmhouse must be pretty easy to clean, huh?
Entries.winter_Fri2: Are you friends with Linus? He lives in a tent up in the mountains.#$e#Everyone ignores him, the poor guy. He's actually really nice... Just a little odd.#$e#It must be so cold to live in a tent this time of year.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I'm looking forward to seeing what your farm looks like in the spring.#$e#It's going to be so fresh and beautiful.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: I try to stay indoors as much as possible during the winter. I hate being cold.
Entries.winter_Thu: Oh... hi. You want to talk?$u#$e#If you find any interesting artifacts or minerals, Gunther will gladly display them in the museum.#$e#He told me he has special gifts for people who donate.
Entries.winter_Mon: On the 25th we'll be having the Feast of the Winter Star. It's one of my favorite events.#$e#It's supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in your life... but for most people it's just a time to relax and exchange gifts.

Resort_Entering.0: Pulau yang sangat indah!

Resort_Leaving.0: Liburan yang menyenangkan.$h

Resort_Shore_2.0: Entah kenapa, air disini terlihat berbeda...#$e#Aku tidak percaya laut ini adalah laut yang sama yang sering aku pandang.

Resort_Towel.0: Angin membuatku kesulitan membaca buku, tapi terasa sejuk di kulitku.$h
