Resort_Marriage_Towel_2.0: Hey cinta, apa kau keberatan jika agak bergeser ke kiri?#$b#Thanks, sinar matahari membuatku susah membaca!$h

Resort.0: Pasir disini sangat halus. Terasa enak di kaki ku!$h

Mon.0: Hai... #$e#Kau butuh sesuatu?

breakUp.0: ...$s#$b#B... Baiklah... *hiks* ... K... Kita hanya berteman saja.$s

pamHouseUpgrade.0: Apa yang kau berikan pada keluargaku sungguh tak ternilai. Terima kasih!

pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous.0: Ternyata banyak orang dermawan di dunia ini...

secondChance_Girls.0: Kau telah memberi luka permanen di hatiku, @. Tapi... Aku siap berbicara denganmu lagi.$s

Mon4.0: *sigh*... Ibuku pasti mempunyai masalah dengan pergi ke bar terlalu sering.$s#$q 7/8 Mon_old#Tapi sebaiknya jangan memikirkan hal-hal buruk, kan?#$r 7 50 Mon_7#Iya, berpikir positif lebih baik!#$r 8 10 Mon_8#Aku pikir kau harus menerima kenyataan.

Mon_old.0: #$p 7#Tetapi jika aku terus mencoba aku pikir aku bisa mengubahnya.|Aku kira itu masuk akal. Tapi bagaimanapun tak banyak yang bisa saya lakukan untuk mengubahnya

Mon_7.0: Itulahperasaanku. Aku hanya akan fokus membuat masa depan yang lebih baik.

Mon_8.0: Kau benar aku harus menerima kenyataanya.$u

Mon8.0: Aku ingin pindah. Tapi aku kepikiran ibuku sepanjang waktu.#$e#Aku ingin di bahagia, tapi aku tidak bisa selamanya disini... kau tau?$s

Tue.0: Aku mengajari Vincent dan Jas hari ini ... Aku senang utuk membuat perbedaan dalam hidup seseorang.

Tue4.0: $d bus#Aku mencoba untuk menabung dari pekerjaan mengajarku, tapi sulit dengan ibu ku yang sudah pensiun.|Mungkin jika ibuku bisa mendapat pekerjaannya kembali, aku bisa mulai menabung lebih banyak uang.

Tue10.0: Um, @? Sebuah peternakan tampaknya seperti tempat yang baik untuk anak-anak, bukan begitu?$l#$e#Itu hanya pikiranku.$l

Wed.0: Kami tidak memiliki sekolah di sini tapi aku melakukan yang terbaik untuk memberikan Vincent dan Jas pendidikan yang layak.#$e#Setiap anak-anak punya kesempatan menjadi orang sukses.#$e#Jas pintar membaca dan matematika. Vincent pintar dalam... imajinasi yang aktif!

Wed2.0: Kau tau? Aku harus mengajak mereka berlibur. Mungkin ke hutan.#$e#Seorang pembicara akan menyenangkan ... mungkin seseorang yang akrab dengan alam?#$e#Maaf, aku hanya berpikir keras.

Wed4.0: Aku sudah tinggal di Pelican Kota selama hidupku.#$e#Aku percaya diluar sana lebih banyak pengalaman.

Thu.0: Kami sangat beruntung memiliki sebuah perpustakaan di kota kecil.#$e#Ketika kau tidak memiliki buku, sangat sulit mempelajari kehidupan.$u#$e#...Mungkin itu alasan aku suka membaca buku.$s#$e#...Maaf, aku terbawa suasana.

Thu6.0: Aku berharap aku bisa menjaga taman, tapi halamanku berantakan.$u#$e#Mungkin aku akan tinggal di tempat di mana aku dapat memiliki taman suatu hari nanti.#$e#Mungkin aku akan tinggal di kebun! *giggle*$h

Fri.0: Jika kau menggali tanah, kau akan menemukan beberapa hal menarik.#$e#Aku pernah menemukan sepotong guci tua. Aku membawanya ke Gunther dan dia bilang itu berusia lebih dari seribu tahun.

Fri2.0: Jika kau menggali tanah, kau akan menemukan beberapa hal menarik.#$e#Aku pernah menemukan sepotong guci tua. Aku membawanya ke Gunther dan dia bilang itu berusia lebih dari seribu tahun.

Fri4.0: Piring, piring, piring. Ugh ... Jika ibuku tidak pulang larut malam dari bar, mungkin dia bisa sedikit membantuku.$s

Sat.0: Ini adalah sebuah kota kecil. Kau tidak akan bisa menghindar dari orang-orang.#$e#Aku ingin tau rasanya tinggal dikota.

Sat2.0: $d Joja#Hal berubah banyak setelah JojaMart berdiri. Ini benar-benar buruk bagi toko Pierre. Ibu menyukai JojaMart karena harganya murah, sehingga dia mampu lebih banyak di sana daripada di Pierre.|Ibu sudah mengeluh sejak Joja Mart ditutup. Saya pikir itu baik untuknya. Mungkin akan berhenti minum Joja Cola.

Sun.0: Hello. Ummm...$u#$b#Cuacanya bagus, bukan?#$e#Maaf...$u

Sun4.0: Aku sudah berusaha untuk menjaga tempatku bersih, tetapi selalu akan berantakan lagi.$s#$e#Sulit untuk menjalankan rumah tangga sendirian.$u

event_speaker_kids1.0: Oh tidak?$l#$b#Yah, aku kira itu masuk akal ... Kau sedang sibuk dengan hal-hal lain sekarang.

event_speaker_kids2.0: ... Aku juga. Aku senang kau merasa seperti itu.$7

event_speaker_kids3.0: Ya ... dorongan untuk membantu sesuatu yang tidak bersalah dan tak berdaya. Masuk akal bukan?

event_speaker_kids4.0: Oh, ya?$s#$b#Aku pikir kau akan jadi orang tua yang baik.$7

event_speaker_kids5.0: hmm...$s#$b#Jika semua orang berpikir seperti itu, manusia akan mati.$s

event_speaker_kids6.0: Oh...$s#$b#Itu menyedihkan ... tapi aku kira aku bisa mengerti maksudmu.$s

event_speaker_no.0: Sungguh?... Uh... Baiklan, aku harap bisa bertemu denganmu nanti.%fork$s

event_mail1.0: Terim kasih...$l#$b#Aku harap George tidak begitu marah ... Aku hanya berusaha untuk membantu.$s

event_mail2.0: Oh... Aku harap kau benart.$l#$b#Maaf Mr. Mullner. Itu salahku.$s

event_old1.0: Aku harap kau benar... kenapa setres hanya karena kita tidak bisa mengubah suatu keadaan?$u

event_old2.0: Kau benar, kita tidak harus mengabaikan kenyataan.$u#$b#Aku kira semakin cepat kita dekat dengan kematian, semakin banyak waktu yang kita bisa habiskan.$u

event_old3.0: Itu bagus ... Aku setuju denganmu.#$b#Kita harus memperlakukan orang tua kita dengan hormat, sama seperti kita menghormati diri kita sendiri.

event_old4.0: Itu hal yang mengerikan di katakan. Hidup adalah hal yang berharga!$a

event_cook1.0: Kau yakin? Terima kasih! ... Aku lega mendengarnya.$h#$b#Aku bekerja begitu keras dengan resep ini, dan aku benar-benar bangga akan hal ini.

event_pool4.0: ...Oh, @. Aku tidak yakin dengan apa yang kau lakukan.$6#$b#...Aku akan mengingat malam ini.$6^Kau terlihat cantik malam ini... Aku... *gasp*$l

summer_Mon.0: Hai... Um, cuaca yang baik, bukan?

summer_Mon4.0: $d cc#Terima kasih untuk memperbaiki komunitas ini kembali. Kurasa kau semacam pahlawan kota.|Halo, @. Aku suka kau baik-baik saja.

summer_Fri.0: $d bus#Aku mendengar kau bertanggung jawab memperbaiki bus kembali. Terima kasih.|Ibuku menggunakannya untuk pergi ke Gurun Calico... tapi bus berhenti bekerja beberapa tahun yang lalu. Walikota mengatakan tidak ada cukup uang di kas kota.$u

summer_Sun.0: Jadi... Kau suka mendekorasi kebunmu?#$e#Pasti menyenangkan punya tempat sendiri untuk didekorasi.

fall_Mon.0: Hi... Um, apa kau baik-baik saja?$u

fall_Mon4.0: Ini agak memalukan menjadi satu-satunya keluarga di kota yang tinggal di sebuah trailer.$u#$e#Aku bermimpi punya rumah sendiri suatu hari nanti.$s

fall_Thu6.0: Ibu tidak menjaga tubuhnya dengan baik...$u#$e#Aku sangat cemas kepadanya.$u

fall_Fri.0: Musim gugur adalah musim yang menyedihkan untukku...$s

fall_Fri6.0: Ketika aku masih kecil, ayahku meninggalkan kami karena dia mengatakan dia merasa 'terjebak'. Kami tidak pernah melihatnya sejak saat itu.$s#$b#Aku minta maaf untuk membuatmu tidak nyaman ....$u#$e#Anyway ... Bagaimana kehidupan bertanimu?

fall_Sun10.0: @! Aku hanya berpikir tentang masa depan...#$e#Wdi sini kau membayangkan dirimu saat sepuluh tahun?$l#$e#Aku punya ide...$u

fall_Sat8.0: Hai @.$h#$e#Kebunmu sangat bersih dan indah, kan?

winter_Fri2.0: Apa kau berteman dengan Linus? Dia tinggal di tenda di atas gunung.#$e#Semuanya mengabaikannya. Sebenarnya dia orang yang baik... Hanya sedikit aneh.#$e#Pasti dingin tidur di tenda selama bertahun-tahun.

winter_Tue4.0: Aku tak sabar untuk melihat kebunmu di musim semi.#$e#Pasti indah dan menyegarkan.$h

winter_Tue.0: Aku mencoba untuk tinggal di dalam rumah sebanyak mungkin selama musim dingin. Aku benci dingin.

winter_Thu.0: Oh... hai. Kau ingin mengobrol?$u#$e#Jika kau menemukan artefak menarik, Gunther dengan senang hati akan menampilkannya di museum.#$e#Dia bilang akan memberikan hadiah bagi siapa yang menyumbangkannya.

winter_Mon.0: Pada tanggal 25 kita akan mengadakan acara Feast of the Winter Star. Itu salah satu acara favoritku.#$e#Itu seharusnya menjadi waktu untuk bersyukur atas semua hal yang baik dalam hidup... tetapi bagi kebanyakan orang itu hanya waktu untuk bersantai dan bertukar kado.

Entries.Introduction: Hey, it's Mr. @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.^Hey, it's Ms. @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.Resort: I'm losing a lot of money being away from the shop...$s#$b#But, you know what? It's worth it.
Entries.Resort_Shore: Mmm... that salty smell of the sea is making me want some sashimi.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Eh, let the kids play in the sun. I'll just sit in this chair.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Drink after drink... Gus must be making a killing!
Entries.cc_Complete: This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.#$e#For a small town like this, one store is enough! There's too much social pressure for me to overcharge, anyway.
Entries.joja_Begin: This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon...$s
Entries.MovieInvitation: Hey, that's a great idea... It'll be nice to get out from behind the counter. I'll meet you there!
Entries.Mon: Welcome! If you're looking for seeds, you've come to the right place!
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hello, er... my son?$s^Hello, er... daughter?$s
Entries.Mon4: Hi, @. Need any seeds or fruit tree saplings?
Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's Abigail doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Entries.Tue: Sometimes I get new items in stock, so make sure to stop by every so often.#$e#It's a lot of work to run a shop.$h
Entries.Tue6: You know, I used to be a pretty good boxer back in the day... my right hook was the stuff of legend!$h
Entries.Wed: It's my day off today.#$e#Hmmm... what to do...$s
Entries.Wed4: When I was younger I always had something interesting to do... now I find myself just wasting time whenever I'm not at work.$s
Entries.Thu: I'm happy to buy any produce off you.#$b#I'll give you a fair price, of course!
Entries.Thu2: I really do appreciate your business, Mr. @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.^I really do appreciate your business, Ms. @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does Abigail look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.Fri: #$1 pierreJoja#Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to compete with their selection.$k$s#$e#Hi there. Is your farm doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.
Entries.Sat: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price.
Entries.Sat8: I'll tell you a secret. Sometimes, when the store is empty, I'll practice my opera singing behind the counter.$h#$e#Don't tell anyone.
Entries.Sun: #$1 pierreBlue#*sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...$k$s#$e#I wish I could go for a walk, but I can't leave the store unattended.#$e#I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great...$s
Entries.Wed6: #$1 pierre1#*sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just bored with domestic life.$s#$e#Some day I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.#$e#Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money...$s
Entries.Thu4: Hey, @. You're my number one customer!
Entries.summer_Mon: I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.
Entries.summer_Wed: I'm so glad to have a day off from work.
Entries.summer_Thu: Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*
Entries.summer_Fri: Oh, hi. Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?
Entries.summer_Sat: Summer is a good time to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think?
Entries.summer_Sun: Ugh... It's so hot in here.
Entries.winter_Mon: You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.#$e#It's really going to cut into our profits.
Entries.winter_Wed: #$1 pierreDin#I'm going to surprise Caroline tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!$k#$e#Finally, a day of relaxation.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hi. In the mood for a litle shopping?
Entries.winter_Fri: I mainly deal in edibles, so if you've got any ores or wood you'd better try selling them somewhere else.
Entries.winter_Sat: Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?
Entries.winter_Sun: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now.#$e#It would be fun to throw a snowball.
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.#$b#Better go all out, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: It's starting to get cold outside...#$b#That means more people come into the shop to warm up... hehe.
Entries.fall_Fri: #$1 pierreMEGA#My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. hehehe.$k#$e#Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.$h
Entries.fall_Sat: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.#$e#Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.#$e#Don't get any ideas...
Entries.fall_Sun: If I didn't have this shop to run I would be outside right now...#$e#The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.
Entries.Event_naga1: Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?$h#$b#...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
Entries.Event_naga2: You would really do that to me? You're terrible.$s#$b#You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbors are the worst.$3

Introduction.0: Hai. @, seoorang petani baru! Aku Pierre, pemilik toko.^Hai. @, seoorang petani baru! Aku Pierre, pemilik toko.#$b#Jika kau butuh bibit, kau bisa membelinya di tokoku. Aku juga akan membeli hasil kebunmu dengan harga yang bagus!#$e#Aglikultural juga membantu perekonomian kita!

Resort.0: Kalau aku berlibur aku tidak bisa berjualan...$s#$b#Tapi, kau tau? Ini sungguh sepadan.

Resort_Shore.0: Mmm... aroma laut membuatku ingin makan sashimi.

Resort_Chair.0: Eh, anak muda saja yang bermain di bawah sinar matahari. Aku hanya ingin bersantai di sini.

Resort_Bar.0: Minuman demi minuman terjual... Gus pasti untung besar!

cc_Complete.0: Ini mimpi yang menjadi nyata! Kau tidak bisa membayangkan betapa stres nya aku dengan Joja sebagai saingan.#$e#Untuk kota kecil seperti ini, satu toko sudah cukup! Walaupun banyak yang komplain karena harga kemahalan.

joja_Begin.0: Ini adalah hari yang menyedihkan untuk Kota Pelican... Semakin besar Joja, aku semakin bangkrut. Mungkin sebentar lagi akan kujual toko ini...$s

MovieInvitation.0: Hey, ide yang bagus... Sesekali meninggalkan kasir bagus juga. Kutemui kau disana!

Mon.0: Selamat Datang! Jika kau butuh bibit, kau datang ke tempat yang benar!

Mon4.0: Hai, @. Butuh bibit sayuran dan buah-buahan?

Mon4_inlaw_Abigail.0: Hai, @. Bagaimana tentang Abigail? Toko serasa berbeda tanpanya...

Tue.0: Kadang-kadang aku menjual barang baru, jadi sering-seringlah berkunjung.#$e#Butuh usaha keras menjalankan toko.$h

Tue6.0: Kau tau, Aku menggunakan boxer yang keren... ini juga dipakai oleh lagenda!$h

Wed.0: Hari ini aku libur.#$e#Hmmm... apa yang akan aku lakukan...$s

Wed4.0: Ketika aku muda, aku melakukan hal yang menarik... sekarang aku hanya menunggu waktu ketika aku tidak bekerja.$s

Thu.0: AKu suka membeli hasil kebunmu.#$b#Tentu saja dengan harga yang pantas!

Thu2.0: AKu menghargai usahamau @. Aku bekerja keras meningkatkan reputasiku.^AKu menghargai usahamau @. Aku bekerja keras meningkatkan keuntunganku.

Thu8.0: #$1 pierre2#Apakah Abigail melakukan hal yang sama sepertiku? Jangan bilang istriku, aku ingin menjadi ayah yang baik.$k$s#$e#Jangan bilang istriku, aku benci memasak makan malam.

Fri.0: #$1 pierreJoja#Bisnisku sedikit kesulitan sejak Joja Market berdiri. Sangat sulit bersaing dengan mereka.$k$s#$e#Hai, bagaimana kebunmu?#$e#Aku membutuhan beberapa hari hari merapikan bibitku.

Sat.0: Jika kau menemukan bahan hilar, kau bisa menjualnya.

Sat8.0: Aku akan menceritakanmu rahasia. Kadang-kadang saat toko sepi, aku latihan bernyanyi untuk opera.$h#$e#Jangan bilang siapapun.

Sun.0: #$1 pierreBlue#*sigh*... Sudah seharian aku di kasir...$k$s#$e#Aku ingin pergi, tapi aku tidak bisa meninggalkan toko.#$e#Aku dengan bunganya sudah mekar dan baunya harum...$s

Wed6.0: #$1 pierre1#*sigh*... Apapaun usahamu, kau tidak akan puas mencapai kesuksesan. APa yang salah denganku? Mungkin aku sudah bosan hidup seperti ini.$s#$e#Suatu saat aku inggin membuka toko yang sangat besar di perkotaan#$e#Sayangnya, usaha berjalan lambat ketika kau menabung uang...$s

summer_Mon.0: Aku punya bibit untuk musim panas! Kau seharusnya menyediakannya untuk misim panas.

summer_Thu.0: Semua orang menikmati musim ini daripada belanja ... *sigh*

summer_Fri.0: Oh, hai. Kau puas dengan bibitku?

summer_Sat.0: Musim panas paling enak makan salad segar, benar kan?

winter_Mon.0: Kau tidak bisa menanam apapun di musim dingin... jadi aku tidak punya bibit untukmu.#$e#Ini benar-benar mengurangi keuntunganku.

winter_Wed.0: #$1 pierreDin#Aku ingin mengejutkan Caroline malam ini dengan makan malam dan sebotol Stardew Red. Jangan ceritakan ke siapapun!$k#$e#Akhirnya, waktunya istirahat.

winter_Thu.0: Hai, kau masih punya keinginan berbelanja?

winter_Fri.0: Aku hanya menjual bahan yang bisa dimakan, jika menemakan biji besi atau potongan kayu, kau lebih baik menjualnya ke orang lain.

winter_Sat.0: IHanya perasaanku atau memang sekarang dingin sekali?

winter_Sun.0: Jika aku tidak menjaga toko, aku akan keluar sekarang.#$e#Sangat menyenangkan bermain bola salju.

fall_Mon.0: Bibit musim gugur disini! Bibit tidak akan tumbuh di musim dingin, jadi ini persedian terakhir sebelum musim semi.#$b#Lebih baik beli semua, kan?

fall_Thu.0: Mulai dingin diluar...#$b#Itu artinya orang-orang akan ke toko untuk menghangatkan diri... hehe.

fall_Fri.0: #$1 pierreMEGA#Mimpiku membuka banyak toko sampai aku kaya raya. hehehe.$k#$e#Hai, bagaimana dengan kebunmu?#$e#Mungkin bebberapa hari bibitku akan tumbuh.$h

fall_Sat.0: Aku senang membeli hasil bahan ternakmu.#$e#Ya, itu untuk keuntunganku... itu untuk menyeimbangankan toko ini.#$e#Aku tidak punya ide...

fall_Sun.0: Jika aku tidak menjaga toko, aku akan keluar sekarang...#$e#Dau-daun terlihat hebat dan jamur mulai tumbuh.

Event_naga1.0: Tarima kasih, aku hargai itu. Tapi tolong lupakan yang kau lihat itu?$h#$b#...Dan aku akan melupakan bahwa kau menyelinap di menyelinapku!

Event_naga2.0: Kau melakukannya? Kau menyebalkan.$s#$b#Kau seharusnya tidak menyelinap ke kamarku! Kau tetangga yang buruk.$a

Entries.Abigail: The valley looks more interesting in the rain... don't you think?
Entries.Robin: The rain doesn't stop me from getting a job done!$h#$e#Although soggy wood isn't a joy to work with.$s
Entries.Demetrius: Greetings. Stay inside if you want to keep warm.
Entries.Maru: When it rains I have a good excuse to work on my gadgets all day.$h#$e#It must be kind of boring for you, though.
Entries.Sebastian: If you're lucky, you might see a frog in this weather.
Entries.Linus: A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean.$h
Entries.Pierre: Most people stay indoors on days like this... It's not good for business.$s
Entries.Caroline: My garden is happy today.$h#$e#...and our water bill will be lower this month.
Entries.Alex: Hmmph. This is not good weather for sports.$s#$e#Oh well, I can always lift weights inside.$h
Entries.George: It's awful cold, isn't it? What a rotten day.
Entries.Evelyn: When I woke up I heard dripping from somewhere... I think the roof might be leaking.$s#$e#In the old days, George would've scampered right up and fixed it... *sigh*$s
Entries.Lewis: Hi there, @. Taking a break?#$e#I hope the river doesn't overflow...$s
Entries.Clint: Today would be a good day to explore the mines... Who knows, you might find some rare ores.
Entries.Penny: The raindrops are really loud on the metal roof of our trailer.#$e#...It's soothing, though.$h
Entries.Emily: It never rains in Calico Desert... That's where my friend Sandy lives.#$e#I wish I could've visited her today.$s
Entries.Haley: I spent all morning doing my hair... now the rain could mess it up.$s#$e#*sigh* ... Life is hard sometimes.
Entries.Jodi: Did you wipe your boots off before coming in? Sorry... I just cleaned the floor.#$e#But you're always welcome in here! Heh.$h
Entries.Sam: Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my Mom getting mad. Hehe.$h
Entries.Leah: Maybe I should cook something new and exciting today. Something spicy.
Entries.Shane: Hmm... this weather makes me thirsty.$s
Entries.Marnie: Hi @. You look like you're soaked...you poor thing!$h
Entries.Elliott: Sometimes when I lay in bed I can hear a distant foghorn cut through the rain.#$b#But when I look out the window I see only a curtain of gray.
Entries.Gus: There's nothing like a glass of dry red wine on a day like this, huh?#$e#I love my job. Hehehe.
Entries.Dwarf: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarves live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals.#$e#I don't expect you to understand.
Entries.Harvey: Hi @! Er... Read anything interesting in the library lately?#$e#Heh. Well, um... I'll see you around then?$u
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Krobus: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... Just how I like it.
Entries.Leo: The valley is peaceful when it rains.#$e#To me... nature is someone I know, with different moods.

Abigail.0: Kota ini lebih menarik saat hujan... benar kan?

Robin.0: Hujan tidak akn menghentikanku dari pekerjaanku!$h#$e#Meskipun udara lembab tidak menyengangka.$s

Demetrius.0: Tetap di dalalm rumah jika kamu ingin tetap hangat.

Maru.0: Meksipun hujan, aku tetap senang memperbaiki gadegetku seharian.$h#$e#Mungkin itu membuatmu bosan.

Sebastian.0: Jika kau beruntung, kau bisa melihat katak.

Pierre.0: Banyak orang tetap di dalam rumah saat hujan... Ini tidak baik untuk usahaku.$s

Caroline.0: Kebunku senang sekali.$h#$e#...dan air akan meluap karena hujan.

Alex.0: Hmmph. Cuacanya tidak baik untuk berolahraga.$s#$e#Baiklah, aku bisa berolahraga di dalam ruangan.$h

George.0: Sedikit dingan, kan? Hari yang buruk.

Evelyn.0: Ketika aku bangun aku mendengar sesuatu... Aku pikir gentengnya ada yang bocor.$s#$e#Mungkin George akan memperbaikinya... *sigh*$s

Lewis.0: Hai @. Butuh istirahat?#$e#Aku harap sungainya tidak meluap...$s

Clint.0: Hari ini, sangat bagus untuk menambang... Siapa tau kau dapat tambang langka.

Penny.0: Air hujan sangat nyaring ketika terjatuh diatas trailer.#$e#...Itu sangat menenangkan.$h

Pam.0: Apa kabar, anak muda. Masih tetap kering?

Emily.0: Gurun Calico tidak pernah hujan... Dimana temanku Sandy tinggal.#$e#Aku ingin mengunjunginya kapan-kapan.$s

Haley.0: Aku butuh berjam-jam merapikan rambutku... sekarang gara-gara hujan, semuanya berantakan.$s#$e#*sigh* ... Kadang hidup itu berat.

Jodi.0: Apa kau melepas sepatu saat kesini? Maaf... Aku menjaga lantai tetap bersih.#$e#Tapi kau selalu kesini! Heh.$h

Sam.0: Sura rintik hujan membuatku bisa bermain gitu dengan keras tanpa membuat ibuku marah. Hehe.$h

Leah.0: Mungkin aku harus memasak sesuatu hari ini. Sesuatu yang hangat dan sedikit pedas.

Marnie.0: Hai @. Kau terlihat basah kuyub...malang sekali nasibmu!$h

Elliott.0: Kadang-kadang ketika aku sedang tidur aku melihat kabut tebal saat hujan.#$b#Tapi saat aku melihat keluar hanya ada mendung.

Gus.0: Tidak ada yang lebih nikmat daripada minum Anggur Merah saat hujan, kan?#$e#Aku cinta pekerjaanku. Hehehe.

Dwarf.0: Hujan... Itu hal yang mistis. Beberapa dari kami belum pernah melihatnya.

Wizard.0: Petir adalah saat aku berinteraksi dengan elemen.#$e#Kau tidak akan paham.

Harvey.0: Hai @! Er... Sudah membaca buku yang menarik di perpustakaan?#$e#Heh. Well, um... Sampai bertemu lagi.$u

Sandy.0: Aku dengan hujan sedang turun, sehingga kau kemari?$h#$e#Aku kadang tidak tau kalau sedang hujan, sungguh...$s

Krobus.0: Ah, salurannya mengalir dengan cepat hari ini. Ini akan sangat bagus. Aku sangat menyukainya.

Leo.0: Lembah ini terasa begitu damai ketika hujan.#$e#Bagiku... alam itu seperti manusia, dengan mood yang berbeda.

Entries.Introduction: Have you met everyone in town yet? That sounds exhausting.
Entries.Resort: Wow, look at these structures!$h#$b#I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!
Entries.Resort_Leaving: That was fun!$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: Hey, look! I can see another island from here.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Hey @. You know, I was just thinking about how far the town has come since you first moved here.#$b#You should really be proud of all you've done!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: This is so relaxing...
Entries.reject_865: Veggie salt? Sounds good, but I don't need it.
Entries.reject_866: Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe show this to her?
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.cc_Bridge: Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!#$b#It's a miracle of woodworking!
Entries.cc_Complete: I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be a town hero!$h
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Mon: Have I told you that I built our house from the ground up?#$e#It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far.
Entries.Tue: Hey, if you need any materials or blueprints, my shop is the place you're looking for!#$e#Plus, your business supports the local economy.$h
Entries.Wed: Hey there, @.#$e#I was just daydreaming about some new carpentry projects.#$e#Are you doing OK at your place? How's the woodwork in your cottage holding up?
Entries.Thu: You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't shopping, you know.$h#$e#It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains.
Entries.Fri: You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He's a little shy, but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him.
Entries.Sat: Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?#$e#I love the fresh air of the mountains.
Entries.Sun: I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of his.#$e#I'm not even sure what he's working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my husband's bizarre science project...
Entries.Sun6: Hi @! It's good to see you.#$e#You're a regular member of the community now, don't you think?
Entries.event_wood1: Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!$h
Entries.event_wood2: Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!
Entries.summer_Mon: Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!
Entries.summer_Tue: If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!#$e#You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.#$e#But I'm sure you'll be pleased with the results!$h
Entries.summer_Fri: We're pretty insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.#$e#It has its pros and cons.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?
Entries.fall_Thu: You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't in the market for a building upgrade!$h#$e#It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains.
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
Entries.winter_Mon: Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood.#$e#Maybe you can collect enough to upgrade your house!
Entries.winter_Fri: My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.#$e#They were pretty old-fashioned.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for Sebby.
Entries.winter_Sat: Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?#$e#Everything looks still after a fresh snow.

Mon.0: Apakah aku sudah memberitahumu bahwa aku membuat rumah dari awal?#$e#Itu memang pekerjaanku saat ini.

Tue.0: Hey, jika kau mencari material atau blueprint, berkunjunglah ke tempatku!#$e#Ditambah, pekerjaanmu membantu warga sini.$h

Wed.0: Hai, @.#$e#Aku bermimpi tentang proyek baruku.#$e#APakah tempatmu baik-baik saja? Bagaima kualitas kayu di rumahmu?

Thu.0: Aku selalu menerimamu saat kau berkunjung meskipun kau tidak sedng ingin berbelanja, kau tau.$h#$e#Jika kau ingin tempat yang sunyi, gunung tempat yang cocok.

Fri.0: Kau pernah bertemu anakku Sebastian? Dia ada di ruang bawah.#$e#Dia sedikit pemalu, tapi aku yakin dia akan semangat bila mengenalmu.

Fri_inlaw_Sebastian.0: Aku rindu Sebby... dia sedikit tidak nyambung, tapi aku percaya padanya.

Fri4.0: #$1 RobinSeb#Aku menemukan asbak di kamar Sebastian, dan baunya aneh. Haruskah aku menghawatirkan ini?#$e#Kadang aku kawatir dengan Sebastian... dia tidak punya teman aku takut dengan masa depannya...#$e#Aku ingin bicara dengannya tapi dia selalu menutup diri.

Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian.0: Sebastian bilang kepadaku untuk berhenti merokok! Aku bangga kepadanya.

Sat.0: Rumah kita sangat indah, apa yang kau pikirkan?#$e#Aku udahara segar di pegunungan.

Sun.0: Aku harap Demetrius tidak meledakkan rumah ini dengan eksperimennya.#$e#Aku tidak tahu apa yang dia kerjakan. Aku pikir dia bereksperimen dengan tanaman.

Sun2.0: #$1 RobinDem#Suamiku hampir membakar rumah dengan eksperimennya. Salah satu dari eksperimmennya meledak dan meempercikan api! Untung aku melapisi rumahku dengan anti api.$u#$e#Maaf jika bauku aneh, @. Ini gara-gara proyek suamiku..

Sun6.0: Hi @! Senang bertemu denganmu.#$e#Kau slah satu anggota komunitas sekarang, bagaimana menurutmu?

event_wood1.0: Bagus, blueprint ini untuk membuat sepotong kue!$h

event_wood2.0: Baik, lalu aku punya blueprint to get you started!

summer_Mon.0: Kau bisa membuat apapun dari kayu.

summer_Tue.0: Jika kau ingin membangun rumahku, tinggal tanya kepadaku!#$e#Kau hanya butuh kayu dan batu yang cukup. Dan tentu saja uang#$e#Aku yankin kau akan puas!$h

summer_Fri.0: Seluruh dunia mengenal Stardew Valley.#$e#Ada pro dan kontra.

fall_Mon.0: #$1 RobinMaru#Maru ibarat permata. Dia punya sesuatu yang menarik.#$e#Jadi apa hubunganmu dengan Maru?

fall_Thu.0: Aku selalu menerimamu saat kau berkunjung meskipun kau tidak sedng ingin membangun rumah!$h#$e#Jika kau ingin tempat yang sunyi, gunung tempat yang cocok.

fall_Fri.0: Kau pernah bertemu orang liar di belakang rumahku?$s#$e#Aku tidak memikirkannya selama dia tidak menggangu.

winter_Mon.0: Hey, ini waktu yang pas untuk mencari kayu.#$e#Mungkin kau bisa mencarinya untuk membangun rumah!

winter_Fri.0: Orangtuaku menginginkanku aku menjadi tukang kayu.#$e#Mereka ketinggalan jaman.

winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian.0: Aku pikir berkebun menyehatkan bagi Sebby.

winter_Sat.0: Rumah kita sangat indah, apa yang kau pikirkan?#$e#Meskipun tertutup salju tapi tetap terasa indah.

Entries.10: Did you watch the game last night?#$b#Or wait, do you even have a TV set...?
Entries.14: Ugh, I stepped in something gross earlier... and I just bought these shoes.$s
Entries.Introduction: Hey, I'm Sam. Good to meet you.$h
Entries.Resort_Entering: Wow, what a spot!
Entries.Resort: I bet there's some cool stuff deeper on the island.#$e#Willy said we have to stay here, though... some kind of liability issues or something.$s
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'm feeling pretty good from all the sunlight.$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: Check out these gnarly waves... Guess what? I'm gonna save up for a surfboard.
Entries.Resort_Towel: %Sam is playing a jazzy tune on his guitar.
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Maybe I should learn to play the ukelele.#$e#Abby on the congas and Sebastian on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: I'm just getting juiced up, then it's back to the beach.
Entries.danceRejection: Hmm... I dunno. Maybe next year.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: Alright, I'm done with the cold shoulder act. Let's just forget about what happened.$7
Entries.breakUp: Wait... what?!$8#$b#I thought we were doing okay... I guess I was way off... alright, then.$9#$b#Yeah, sure... we can still be friends.$9
Entries.divorced: I'm sorry, @. I don't think I can still be your friend.$s
Entries.Mon2: Hey, how's it going?#$e#Last night I practiced guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy.$s#$e#Bye, I've got something to do...
Entries.Mon: Hey, farmer.
Entries.Mon8: I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samson'.$10#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
Entries.Tue: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Take it easy.
Entries.Tue4: Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Sleeping feels nice but sometimes I wish I could skip it... it's just such a time-waster.
Entries.Wed: I'm trying to come up with a new song for my band, but I'm blanking...#$q 19/20 Wed_old#Hey.. What do you think my new song should be about?#$r 20 30 Wed_20#Farming, mining, and chopping wood.#$r 8820 30 Wed_20#A city in the sea.#$r 8821 30 Wed_20#Trains.#$r 19 -50 Wed_19#Choose anything. It'll still be a horrible song.
Entries.Wed_old: $p 19#But I already know what you think about it.$a|Thanks to your help I'm already done with the lyrics!$h
Entries.Wed_19: Hey, man... what the heck is your problem? Sorry I asked.$a
Entries.Wed_20: Hey, you know what? That sounds perfect. Thanks!$h
Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Entries.Wed10: Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!^@. Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.$10
Entries.Thu6_1: I think my Dad might be coming back in a year or so.#$e#I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.#$e#You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
Entries.Thu6_2: ...I have mixed feelings about my father being back. He seems strange.$s#$b#But I guess I haven't seen him in 3 years... so that could explain it.
Entries.Thu_3: *sigh*... what am I still doing here?
Entries.Thu: The clouds look great this time of year, don't they?#$e#Like scoops of vanilla ice cream floating on blue raspberry sauce... Or maybe I'm just hungry.
Entries.Thu2: My Dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...#$e#He'll come back someday.#$e#...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...$s
Entries.Thu_2: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.Thu2_2: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.Fri: Did I ever tell you we used to live in the city?#$e#There's a lot more stuff going on, but it's also kinda noisy and hectic... It's hard to say which is better.
Entries.Fri4: Dad used to work as a garbage man in the city.#$e#You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's trash.
Entries.Fri10: The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.Sat4: Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my Grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h
Entries.Sat: Hmm. I just remembered that I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.#$e#This happens to me all the time.
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes I wonder if my mother is actually happy with her life...$s#$e#I asked her once and got the feeling she was hiding some inner pain.
Entries.Sun: Oh, it's a nice day... isn't it?
Entries.spring_21: Sometimes those spring petals that float around make my nose drip.$s#$e#I like summer best, myself.
Entries.Event_band1: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.Event_band2: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.Event_band3: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.Event_band4: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.spring_12: My little brother gets so excited for festivals. He's been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.
Entries.spring_23: Why couldn't the flower dance be today so I could get work off?$s
Entries.winter_7: One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.#$e#We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again.
Entries.fall_26: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old man who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. He always makes sure no one is around to see him working.
Entries.summer_10: I don't have to work tomorrow! I've never been so happy.$h
Entries.winter_24: The Feast of the Winter Star is supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in life.#$b#Me? I'm mostly interested in the food. Hehe.$h
Entries.event_snack1: He's right... That's what happened.$s^She's right... that's what happened.$s
Entries.summer_Mon2: Hey, how's it going?#$e#I'm hungry.#$e#See you later.
Entries.summer_Mon6: Have you been to the desert yet?#$e#You can find some interesting things there. Dad took me a couple times when I was younger.
Entries.summer_Mon: There's a little less pollen in the summer... my nose is really happy.
Entries.summer_Tue: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Goodbye for now.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#I'm so energized during summer I hardly have to sleep!
Entries.summer_Wed: Hi. Taking the day off?#$e#Sounds interesting.
Entries.summer_Wed2: I saw a spider on my ceiling last night. They sure like the warmth.#$e#I hope he didn't crawl into my mouth while I was asleep...$s
Entries.summer_Thu: Dad was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.
Entries.summer_Thu6_1: Sometimes I can hear my Dad pacing down the hallway at night.$s#$b#...But he won't tell us what's troubling him.
Entries.summer_Fri: You know... I used to live in the city and I have to admit, this place is much nicer in the summer.$h#$e#The city is so hot with all that concrete.
Entries.summer_Sun: When you see hot air balloons drifting over the sea, you'll know that summer's in full swing.
Entries.fall_Mon2: I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable#$e#...$h
Entries.fall_Mon: Oh, hi. Are you making friends with anyone in town?#$e#Bye.
Entries.fall_Tue: My shoes always seem to wear out this time of year. Look, my toe's poking through!$h#$e#That's what happens when you skateboard too much.
Entries.fall_9: I ordered a new pair of shoes online. They're the same style so I know they'll fit right.
Entries.fall_16: I ordered some shoes online more than a week ago! Man, they're really taking a long time.#$e#I guess we must really live in the middle of nowhere.$s
Entries.fall_23: Ah, my feet feel great in these new shoes. They're a little crisp, but they'll break in. Especially after I run through the haunted maze this weekend.$h
Entries.fall_Tue4: Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Just stop by whenever you want.
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey... something smells good, like pizza.#$e#Do you smell that? Maybe Mom's cooking something.
Entries.fall_Thu6_1: I think my Dad might be coming back next year.#$e#I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
Entries.fall_Thu6: I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...$s#$e#...But I would miss Mom's fish casserole, so I dunno...$s#$e#I hate making decisions.
Entries.fall_Thu: Did you ever notice all the spider webs that appear during the fall?#$e#If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars.
Entries.fall_Fri: I used to live in Zuzu City, you know. The biggest difference is the noise. It's never quiet in the city.#$e#There's way more people around you, always. And it's always bright with city lights, even at night.#$e#I guess which setting you like depends on your personality.
Entries.fall_Fri10: I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.$h#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.fall_Sat4: I'm lucky to have the biggest room in the house to myself.#$e#I guess there's advantages to being the oldest child.
Entries.fall_Sat: Hmm. I think I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.#$e#This happens to me all the time.
Entries.fall_Sun8: The first week of fall is already over. Man, that went by fast.$s#$e#Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!#$e#So do you have anything new to tell me?
Entries.fall_Sun: It's hard to have fun on Sunday... I keep thinking about having to go to work tomorrow.$s
Entries.fall_14: Hi @.#$e#Hmm.. I wonder if I could grow a cactus in my room?
Entries.winter_Mon2: Everyone's indoors during the winter, so I can play guitar as loud as I want.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.#$e#Take it easy.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#Well, it's a good time of year to catch up on all the sleep I've missed.$h
Entries.winter_Wed: $d Joja#I hate working at JojaMart, but how else am I going to make money in this town?|I'm glad I work at the museum now. It's way more interesting than that depressing JojaMart ever was.
Entries.winter_Thu6_1: I think my Dad is coming back this spring.#$e#It's been 3 years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange.
Entries.winter_Thu6: Dad's been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.
Entries.winter_Thu: My Dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.#$e#He's coming back soon, though.
Entries.winter_Thu_2: One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitos are gone.
Entries.winter_Fri: The worst thing about the snow is getting your feet soaked. You're lucky in those thick boots.
Entries.winter_Sat4: I just remembered I need to change the strings on my guitar.#$b#Okay, I'm going to write a note on my wrist so I remember to do it tonight.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h
Entries.winter_Sun8: It would be fun if we could go sledding, wouldn't it?#$e#I don't think there are any good hills nearby.$s#$e#Plus, I don't have a sled.#$e#So, how have you been doing lately?
Entries.winter_Sun: Try not to make a mess in the house or my Mom will flip.

Entries.accept_866: A Stardew Valley rose? That's so lovely! Thank you!$h#$b#Whenever I miss the valley, I'll smell this rose. Hehe.$h#$b#Here, take this. It's been on the shelf for 10 years and no one has bought it. You can have it!
Entries.Mon: Hello hello, sweetie!#$b#I'm so glad that the bus is back in service. It was starting to get lonely out here.#$e#...I almost went out of business.$s#$e#Hey, but now you're here to buy a whole bunch of seeds... right, sweetie?$h
Entries.Tue: You can find coconuts and cactus fruits outside. Feel free to take as many as you can find.#$e#They're oooh-yummy, too. Heeee!~$h
Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emily in town, could you tell her I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h
Entries.Thu: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm not supposed to talk about it.#$e#Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley?
Entries.Fri: You wouldn't have much luck farming out here, honey.#$e#Well, unless you were a cactus farmer.$h
Entries.Sat: Hi! Welcome to Sandy's Oasis, the number one destination in Calico Desert!#$e#*whisper* Did I sound professional?$h#$e#Make sure to check out our seasonal seed selection.#$e#You look really thirsty. Here, have a taste of this ice cold milk. [184]#$e#Tasty, huh?$h
Entries.Sun: It's always sunny here, even in winter!#$e#Actually, it's a little hot for my tastes... my delicate skin burns quickly in the sun.$s
Entries.Thu2: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm really not supposed to talk about it.#$e#Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley
Entries.Thu4: Hey... I think I can trust you. You can keep a secret, right?#$b#*whisper* That guy in the back... it's some kind of exclusive club. I've never been inside myself, but they pay me a generous monthly rent so I don't ask any questions.#$e#SOOOOoo! How's that Stardew Valley weather right now?
Entries.Fri4: My name's not really Sandy, you know. It's just good for business.#$e#But everyone calls me Sandy anyway, so I've just gotten used to it.
Entries.Wed8: Isn't it expensive, coming to the desert so often like you do?#$e#You must really like to see me, huh? Hmmm... $h
Entries.Sun8: Hi there, honey. Yep, it's just me, alone in this big old shop. Hmmm...#$e#Well, except for that creepy guy in the back. But he never moves a muscle, so I often forget about him.
Entries.Wed10: Hey, it's @! I'm glad to see you, kid. I was starting to think you'd never come back!#$e#If I didn't have this shop to run I'd come back to the valley with you for a day or two... just you and me on the old farm.$s#$e#You'll just have to visit me more often so I don't get depressed.$h
Entries.Tue10: Hi!~ Stay as long as you like.#$e#The air conditioning sure feels nice, doesn't it?

accept_866.0: Mawar Stardew Valley? Sangat cantik! Terimakasih!$h#$b#Setiap aku merindukan Valley, aku selalu mencium aroma mawar ini. Hehe.$h#$b#Ini, ambil ini. Ini sudah ada di lemariku selama 10 tahun dan tidak seorangpun membelinya. Kau boleh ambil ini!

Mon.0: Helo, sayang!#$b#Aku ingin busnya selesai diperbaiki. Aku ingin ketenangan di luar sana.#$e#...Aku hampir tidak ada pekerjaan.$s#$e#Hey, kau kesini ingin membeli bibit... benar, sayang?$h

Wed.0: Halo! Jika kau melihat temanku Emily titipkan slamku padanya.#$e#Terim kasih!$h

Thu.0: Kau lihat orang dibelakang? Aku tidak ingin membicarakannya.#$e#Namun... apa cuaca yang kau suka di desa ini?

Entries.Introduction: Oh. You just moved in, right? Cool.#$e#Out of all the places you could live, you chose Pelican Town?

Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'm ready to get back home.

Entries.Thu4: Why does everyone like Maru so much? Sure, she's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s

Entries.Thu8: Could you picture me living on a farm?#$e#It seems ridiculous, but I have been thinking about it lately.
Entries.Fri: Uh... I don't really know you.
Entries.Fri2: *sigh*... If gas wasn't so expensive I'd ride my motorcycle to the city today.#$e#$q 15/16 Fri_old#So what do you do when you aren't working?#$r 15 0 Fri_bad#More Farming#$r 16 30 Fri_good#Comic books#$r 15 -30 Fri_bad#Shopping#$r 15 -30 Fri_bad#Sports

Entries.Fri_bad: Oh yea? Hmm... Not really my thing, but everyone's different I guess.$u
Entries.Sat: What? I didn't hear you... I'm busy thinking about something.#$e#What do you want?
Entries.Sat2: You know, I should be doing something productive right now. I just lose focus too fast...$s#$b#Maybe I should drink more coffee?
Entries.Sun: Hey. Your name is @, right?
Entries.Sun4: I usually stay inside, but I do go to the beach now and then.#$b#Pretty much only when it's raining, though.#$e#For some reason, staring off into the bleak horizon makes me feel... I dunno. Like it's worthwhile to keep pushing on, I guess.
Entries.Fri8: What's new?$h#$e#I'll be at the saloon tonight destroying Sam at pool again.$h
Entries.Sun10: I was just thinking about you...$l
Entries.Event_game2: Good choice. That works well with my role.
Entries.Event_cave1: Not so fast! I want to know what it is.
Entries.Event_cave2: Really? It was making a lot of noise!
Entries.Event_cave3: It's too dangerous without a sword. But I like your sense of adventure.$h

Entries.event_city1: Hmm... Not exactly how I'd put it but, yeah.

Entries.summer_Mon: Everyone is so happy in the sun. I don't get it.
Entries.summer_Mon6: Everyone is so happy when it's sunny out...#$e#Different people like different things, I guess.
Entries.summer_Tue: I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. I feel more at home.
Entries.summer_Wed: What's the point of going outside? I've already seen it all.
Entries.summer_Wed8: Why am I grinning? I guess I've been unusually happy lately...$l
Entries.summer_Thu: I definitely don't want to go swimming, if that's what you're going to ask.$s#$e#Oh, you just stopped to say hi? Sorry.
Entries.summer_Thu10: If you ever wanted to go swimming... I guess I'd do it.$l
Entries.summer_Mountain_58_35: #$c .5#The temperature only starts to get comfortable at night.#$e#It always seems to stay a little cooler by the lake.

Entries.summer_Sat: I hope we're not having mushroom casserole tonight...$s
Entries.spring_12: I'm not too big on festivals. Lots of commotion, too much social interaction... More stress than fun, if you ask me.
Entries.spring_23: Ugh... Tomorrow is the worst festival of the year by a mile. Just wait and see how stupid I look during the flower dance.
Entries.fall_20: Are you looking forward to the Spirit's Eve festival? It's probably my favorite.$h
Entries.fall_26: The Spirit's Eve festival is tomorrow. I really hope they have those skeletons on display again this year.$h#$e#I almost feel like they're my friends at this point.
Entries.summer_10: Hehe... It might be funny to put something disgusting in the potluck soup tomorrow. Just don't poison anyone.#$e#Why ruin the potluck? Hmm... I guess some people feel liberated when the rigid structures of society break down a little. Maybe I'm weird.
Entries.summer_27: Tomorrow we'll all be gathering at the docks to see the migration of the moonlight jellies. I think it starts at ten o'clock.
Entries.winter_24: It's the eve of the winter star today. Better make sure you've got an empty stomach for the feast tomorrow.
Entries.summer_Sun: I usually only go outside after dark. Does that sound weird to you?
Entries.summer_Sun4: Last night, I saw a group of bats flying around near the lake.#$e#I guess maybe they are feeding on the mosquitoes this time of year?
Entries.fall_Mon: So... it's the big harvest season, isn't it?
Entries.fall_Mon4: You're probably making a lot of money on your farm, huh?#$e#I guess I should get a job soon...$s
Entries.fall_Tue: Pumpkin spice this... pumpkin spice that... man, I do get sick of these seasonal fads.
Entries.fall_Tue6: Who does Demetrius think he is, telling me what to do? He's not even my real father.$a
Entries.fall_Wed: *yawn*... what time is it? I think I slept too much last night.
Entries.fall_Wed8: I'm glad you showed up. I was starting to get bored.#$e#Now I feel a lot more energetic, believe it or not.
Entries.fall_Thu: My room might be a little less depressing if I had a window...$s
Entries.fall_Fri: *yawn*... I was up until 3 reading this new book...#$q 62/63 fall_Fri_old#Do you read, @?#$r 62 -30 Fri_bad#Yep. The classics.#$r 63 30 Fri_good#Only Sci-fi and Fantasy#$r 62 0 Fri_bad#I like a good Romance#$r 63 -30 Fri_bad#No, I don't read books

Entries.fall_Fri_good: Hey, me too. There's nothing like a good fiction to push the boundaries of the imagination.$h
Entries.fall_Fri6: I've been reading a book about a farmer. Reminds me a lot of you, actually.$h#$e#Sorry if that creeps you out.$h
Entries.fall_Sat: I was *this* close to moping in bed the entire day. Kinda wish I had, now.
Entries.fall_Sun: The sun is coming out less and less these days... wonderful.
Entries.winter_Mon: I'm enjoying this gloomy weather... although I have to say, it's a little cold.
Entries.winter_Mon4: Nothing surprises me anymore... nothing makes me laugh.#$e#Yeah, I know... I'm being a little dramatic.
Entries.winter_Tue: Hmm... I don't really have anything to say. I still don't know you very well.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey...#$b#It's hard to think of new things to talk about, sometimes. Even after you know someone.#$e#...Sorry.
Entries.winter_Tue6: I was so close to screaming at Mom for throwing away my old comic collection... But something stopped me.#$e#Hmm... with age comes wisdom.
Entries.winter_Tue10: You came here to see me?$l#$e#...$h
Entries.winter_Wed4: Hey, don't let me stop you from getting your work done.#$e#If you aren't busy I don't mind if you stick around.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: I wonder what's for dinner tonight... *grumble*$s
Entries.winter_Thu6: I should learn how to cook. That would be useful.
Entries.winter_Fri: It's fun to live so close to the train tracks. It's a reminder that there's a big world out there.
Entries.winter_Fri8: When I was younger I'd run out to the railroad whenever I heard a train coming.#$e#Whatever happened to those days...? *sigh*$s
Entries.winter_Sat: The frogs aren't very happy in winter.#$e#Poor little guys.$s
Entries.winter_Sat6: I like winter but I do feel bad for all the cold animals out there.#$e#I guess they're used to it, though... like me.

Entries.winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Maru's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.
