Morris_PlayerSignedUp.0: Bagus! Selamat datang di perusahaan Joja! Kembali besok dan kita akan membicarakan membangun kembali komunitas... Oh, dan jangan lupa bawa dompetmu! Hehe.#$b#Sekarang, aku akan menelfon Mayor Lewis dan membicarakan pembangunan ulang Community Center yang tua itu...

Morris_ComeBackLater.0: Kembali besok dan kita akan mulai membangun Community Center... Pastikan kau bawa uang banyak. Hehe.

Morris_Greeting.0: Selamat datang di JojaMart! Apa kabarmu hari ini?#$b#Kurasa kita belum pernah bertemu. Aku Morris, kepala bagian Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.#$b#Apabila kau memutuskan untuk bergabung, aku dengan senang hati membantumu untuk pengalaman baru.

Morris_WeekendGreeting.0: Selamat datang di JojaMart! Bagaimana akhir minggu mu?#$b#Kami sedang mengatur ulang sistem member di Joja. Kuharap kau akan bergabung!

Morris_FirstGreeting.0: Selamat datang di JojaMart! Apa kabarmu hari ini?#$b#Kami sedang mengatur ulang sistem member di Joja. Kuharap kau akan bergabung!

Morris_FirstGreeting_CommunityCenterComp.0: Selamat datang di JojaMart! Apa kabarmu hari ini?#$b#Sayangnya, karena beberapa alasan, pendaftaran membership Joja sedang tidak tersedia. Tapi saya takin akan segera tersedia kembali!

ProfessorSnail_Hint_828.0: Setelah melakukan penelitian aku menemukan terdapat spesies katak yang hidup di pulau ini. Spesies ini tinggal di tempat yang gelap, lembab, dan banyak vegitasi...

ProfessorSnail_Hint_827.0: Dulu, terdapat spesies langka kalelawar yang tinggal disini. Kalelawar spesies ini tahan terhadap suhu panas ekstrim. Menarik, kan?

ProfessorSnail_Hint_826.0: Hmm... Firasatku mengatakan kalau duri ular bisa ditemukan di bagian barat pulau.

ProfessorSnail_Hint_825.0: Jika kau melihat benda bergerak di permukaan tanah, pastikan kau menggalinya. Kau tidak akan tau apa yang akan kau dapatkan!

ProfessorSnail_Hint_824.0: Sebelum aku terjebak di gua, aku sedang menulusuri parit kecil di sekitar sini. Bebatuan di sana dipenuhi fosil! Jika menjadi kau, aku akan memecahnya agar dapat tulang.

ProfessorSnail_Hint_822.0: Kau tau, kalau kau menyaring air, kau bisa saja menemukan benda-benda menarik dari sungai.

ProfessorSnail_Hint_821.0: Kau tau, terdapat tempat memancing yang sangat bagus di pulau ini. Dan setau ku, ikan sangat menyukai tulang-tulang purba...

ProfessorSnail_Hint_820.0: Apakah kau pernah dapat kelapa emas dari pulau ini? Banyak rumor mengatakan kau bisa dapat barang-barang menarik kalau membuka kelapa tersebut...

SummitEvent_Dialogue1_Lewis.0: Kau tau, @... Aku sudah menjadi walikota cukup lama.#$b#Banyak orang yang datang dan pergi. Warga kota sudah melalui banyak kesulitan bersama.

SummitEvent_Dialogue2_Lewis.0: Tapi harus ku akui, selama aku menjadi mayor, aku sangat bangga ketika kebun %farm menjadi luarbiasa di tanganmu.$h#$b#Aku yakin kau sudah melampaui ekspektasi, tekad, dan mimpi kakek mu.#$b#Dan secara tidak langsung, kau juga mengubah Stardew Valley.

SummitEvent_Outro_Lewis.0: Mungkin kau tidak sadar, tapi aku sangat peduli dengan kebun itu, @.#$b#%Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, aku sangat khawatir dengan masadepan Stardew Valley.$s#$b#Tapi sekarang, aku akhirnya bisa tenang.#$b#Siapa yang menyangka dengan datangnya satu orang ke kota akan mengubah semuanya?$h#$b#...Terimakasih banyak.

SummitEvent_Dialogue1_Morris.0: Kau tau, ketika aku ditugaskan kesini %year tahun lalu, aku menganggap ini adalah kemunduran dalam karirku.#$b#Mengapa manajer hebat dari Joja sepertiku harus ke kota kecil Pelican Town?$h

SummitEvent_Dialogue2_Morris.0: Tapi harus ku akui, aku merasakan ikatan dengan Stardew Valley setelah bertahun-tahun di sini.#$b#Kerja di sini membuatku melihat sudut pandang baru. Sulit mengatakannya, tapi sungguh pengalaman yang tak ternilai.

SummitEvent_Outro_Morris.0: Aku hanya ingin bilang, @... Aku sangat menghargai segala yang telah kau lakukan untuk Joja.#$b#Kekuatan Joja berasal dari para member nya, dan kau menjadi contoh member yang sangat baik. Itu membuatku bangga bekerja di perusahaan ini.$h

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Alex.2: speak Alex "Aku tidak akan bisa sampai titik ini tanpamu, @.

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sebastian.0: Sebelum aku bertemu dengamu, aku menghabiskan seluruh waktuku dengan lari dari kenyataan... Karena kupikir aku tidak akan pernah dapat kebahagiaan.#$b#...Tapi kau menunjukkan padaku dunia yang penuh warna.$h"
SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sebastian.3: speak Sebastian "...Itu salah satu alasan kenapa aku mencintaimu...

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sam.0: Kau tau? Aku merasa banyak berubah setelah bertemu denganmu#$b#...Mungkin menjadi lebih sedikit 'dewasa'... hehe.$10#$b#Dan sekarang, aku sangat bersemangat menantikan masa depan denganmu...$l#$b#Walaupun hanya melakukan kegiatan yang biasa saja, seperti... uh... berbelanja dan mengganti popok... hah...$10

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Shane.0: Jika aku tidak bertemu denganmu, @... Aku mungkin bahkan tidak akan ada di sini.#$b#Dan itu sangat disayangkan, karena pemandangan burung-burung di sini sangat fenomenal!$h"
SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Shane.3: speak Shane "Heh... A... Aku sering berusaha melucu, karena...karena...$s#$b#Karena selama ini kupikir dengan mencairkan suasana aku tidak perlu membuka diri dan orang lain akan tau kelemahanku."
SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Shane.5: speak Shane "Tapi setiap waktu denganmu, aku mulai bisa menerima diriku yang sebenarnya.#$b#Uh.. Maksud perkataanku adalah...#$b#Aku tidak menyesal sedikitpun sudah menikah dengamu!$h

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Elliott.0: Heh... Sekarang sudah jelas...$h#$b#Kita kahirnya mencapai puncak, tapi bukan hanya dengan fisik... tapi juga secara metafor.#$b#Oh, sungguh puitis!$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Harvey.0: Saat aku berada di sampingmu, aku tidak takut jatuh dari tebing atau menerjang bebatuan tajam...$l"
SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Harvey.4: speak Harvey "...$8#$b#A... Aku sangat mengagumi dan mencintaimu, @...$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Abigail.0: Berdiri di sini, memandang cakrawala... Aku merasakan kemungkinan yang tak terbatas.#$b#Aku sangat bahagia bisa menjelajahi bagian dari dunia, denganmu di sisi ku...$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Emily.0: Ini adalah momen yang spesial...#$b#Entah kenapa aku selalu tau kalau suatu hari aku akan berdiri di sini bersama denganmu. Aku merasakannya dari hatiku.#$b#Dan sekarang, semua jadi kenyataan."
SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Emily.2: speak Emily "Dunia merupakan sesuatu yang spesial dan juga misterius...$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Haley.4: speak Haley "Oh, entah kenapa...#$b#Sejak kecil, aku punya impian, aku akan menuju puncak dengan cinta sejatiku, dan aku akan berciuman dengannya.$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Leah.0: Kupikir kita berdua akhirnya menemukan apa yang kita cari di tempat ini.#$b#Aku tidak ingin berada di tempat lain, selain di sini bersama denganmu.$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Penny.0: Kita mempunyai rumah dan keluarga yang indah... Dan sejak dulu, hanya dua itulah impianku.$l

SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Maru.0: Kau telah mencapai banyak hal sejak pindah kesini, @. Dan itu luarbiasa."

Entries.1: Location/Meet The Wizard/You received a letter from the local wizard. He claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the wizard's tower./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.2: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/Within a secret lock-box, you found a note with peculiar instructions. It's signed by a 'Mr. Qi'./Leave a rainbow shell in the box at the train platform./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.3: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found another note written by 'Mr. Qi'. The request is even more unusual this time./Place 10 beets inside Mayor Lewis' fridge./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.4: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found yet another strange note within the Mayor's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic./"Give the sand dragon his final meal."/null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.5: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You found another note in the sand dragon's eye. It seems Mr. Qi's strange scavenger hunt has come to an end./Inspect the lumber pile beside your house./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.6: ItemHarvest/Getting Started/If you want to become a farmer, you have to start with the basics. Use your hoe to till the soil, then use a seed packet on the tilled soil to sow a crop. Water every day until the crop is ready for harvest./Cultivate and harvest a parsnip./24/h7 8/100/-1/true
Entries.7: Building/Raising Animals/Robin, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop or barn so that you can raise animals./Build a Coop./Coop/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.8: Crafting/Advancement/As you gain experience, you'll discover new crafting recipes to increase profit and make life easier. A scarecrow, for example, will prevent crows from snacking on your precious crops./Reach Farming level 1 and craft a scarecrow./8 true/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.9: Social/Introductions/It would be a nice gesture to introduce yourself around town. Some people might be anxious to meet the new farmer././null/25/0/-1/true
Entries.10: Basic/Copper Ore/You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know./Bring a piece of copper ore to Clint's blacksmith shop././-1/0/-1/false
Entries.11: Crafting/Forging Ahead/If you're going to keep mining, you should build a furnace./Craft a Furnace./13 true/12/0/-1/true
Entries.12: ItemHarvest/Smelting/Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to Clint's instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar./Use your furnace to smelt a Copper Bar./334 1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.13: Basic/To The Beach/Someone named Willy invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you./Visit the beach south of town before 5:00pm./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.14: Basic/Explore The Mine/There's an old mine shaft in the mountains north of town. There could be valuable minerals inside, but Marlon hinted that it might be dangerous./Reach level 5 in the mines./17/17/0/-1/false
Entries.15: Monster/Initiation/If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in the Adventurer's Guild./0 of 10 slimes slain./Green_Slime 10/16/0/-1/false
Entries.16: Location/Initiation/You sucessfully dispatched 10 slimes. Now you can enter the Adventurer's Guild./Enter the Adventurer's Guild./AdventureGuild/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.17: Basic/Deeper In The Mine/It seems that the mine elevator is still functional. It will allow you to quickly return to any elevator doors you've discovered. A deeper expedition might be in order./Reach level 40 in the mines./18/18/0/-1/false
Entries.18: Basic/To The Bottom?/So far, there's no sign of the bottom. How low does it go?/Reach the bottom of the mine./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.19: Basic/The Skull Key/You found a strange looking key in the bottom of the mines./Discover the purpose of the Skull Key./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.20: Basic/Qi's Challenge/You've been challenged to reach level 25 in the skull cavern. You've been promised a substantial reward if you're successful./Reach level 25 in the Skull Cavern./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.21: Basic/Marnie's Request/Marnie came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack./Bring a Cave Carrot into Marnie's shop./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.22: Basic/Fish Casserole/Jodi swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 7:00 PM. Her only request was that you bring a largemouth bass for her fish casserole./Enter Jodi's house with a largemouth bass at 7:00 PM./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.23: Location/Archaeology/You found an ancient-looking object. Could it be some kind of artifact from long ago? Perhaps Gunther, curator of the local museum, has the answer./Visit Gunther at the museum./ArchaeologyHouse/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.24: Basic/Archaeology/Gunther asked if you'd consider donating any new artifacts or minerals you find to the museum. He says he'll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods./Donate an artifact or a mineral to the museum./-1/-1/250/-1/true
Entries.25: Basic/How To Win Friends/Giving gifts is a great way to build friendships. Learn each person's individual tastes and you'll be popular in no time./Give someone a gift./-1/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.26: Basic/"Rat Problem"/There's something odd going on in the Community Center.../Investigate the Community Center/-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.27: Basic/Goblin Problem/There's a goblin blocking the path to the Witch's hut. There must be some way to get him to move... Perhaps I should seek out more information on Goblins./Gain entrance to the Witch's hut./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The Wizard asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.29: Basic/Strange Note/You found a note, barely legible, asking you to bring "may-pal serrup" to the "seecrit wuds"./Bring "may-pal serrup" to the "seecrit wuds"/-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.30: Basic/Cryptic Note/You found a note that reads, "Someone is waiting for you on level 100 in the Skull Cavern"/Reach level 100 in the Skull Cavern/-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.31: Basic/A Winter Mystery/You encountered a suspicious looking figure by the bus stop. When it saw you, it fled toward town. Could there be a clue to its whereabouts?/Find the shadowy figure./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.100: LostItem/Robin's Lost Axe/Robin lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch./Find Robin's lost axe./Robin 788 Forest 110 81/-1/250/-1/true/Hey, you found my axe! What a relief... I almost chopped my toe off with the other one I was using. Thank you!
Entries.101: ItemDelivery/Jodi's Request/Jodi needs a fresh cauliflower for a recipe she's making. She's asking you to bring her one./Bring Jodi a cauliflower./Jodi 190/-1/350/-1/true/Oh, that looks so delicious! Thank you, this is just what I wanted. It's going to be perfect for my yellow curry.
Entries.102: LostItem/Mayor's "Shorts"/Mayor Lewis has lost his purple "shorts". He's asking you to find and return them... Discreetly./Find and return Mayor Lewis' purple shorts./Lewis 789 AnimalShop 13 7/-1/750/-1/true/You found them... where? ...Oh!...Uhmm...Heh.#$b#There? I have no idea how they could've gotten there...*cough*#$b#This stays between you and me. Got it?$u
Entries.103: ItemDelivery/Pam Is Thirsty/Pam is hankerin' for a pale ale. Regular old beer won't do. You can brew one yourself if you have hops and a keg./Bring Pam a pale ale./Pam 303/-1/350/-1/true/Gimme that. *slurp*... Ahh, that's the stuff.#$b#It's real nice and hoppy... notes of citrus and pine, but with a robust body to keep it grounded.#$b#Thanks, kid. This means a lot to me. I knew I could count on you.$h
Entries.104: ItemDelivery/Crop Research/Demetrius needs a fresh melon for his research./Bring Demetrius a melon./Demetrius 254/-1/550/-1/true/This is perfect! It's just what I need for my research. It's going to be hard not to eat it! Thanks a bunch.
Entries.105: ItemDelivery/Knee Therapy/George needs a hot pepper to soothe his aching knee./Bring George a Hot Pepper./George 260/-1/200/-1/true/Took you long enough... hmmph... Well it's good and spicy at least. Thanks.
Entries.106: ItemDelivery/Cow's Delight/Marnie wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth./Bring Marnie one bunch of amaranth./Marnie 300/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the amaranth I asked for! Thank you so much... my cows are going to love this!$h
Entries.107: LostItem/Blackberry Basket/It's blackberry season, but Linus can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is./Find Linus' basket and return it to him./Linus 790 Backwoods 27 27/-1/0/-1/true/My basket! Thank you. This means a lot to me.$h
Entries.108: ItemDelivery/Carving Pumpkins/Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm./Bring Caroline a pumpkin./Caroline 276/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the pumpkin! It's a good one... Abigail will be so happy when she sees this. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.109: ItemDelivery/Catch A Squid/Willy is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights./Bring Willy a squid./Willy 151/-1/800/-1/true/Hey, you did it! Not bad. Not bad at all. I'm impressed.#$b#Winter's a good time to break out the old fishing rod, isn't it?
Entries.110: ItemDelivery/Clint's Attempt/Clint wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him./Bring Emily an Amethyst./Emily 66/-1/0/-1/true/Oh, my favorite stone! You're so sweet!$h#$b#Huh? It's from who?$u#$b#Oh, you got it at Clint's? Well I don't care where you got it from, it's beautiful! Thank you! *smooch*$h
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The wizard wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring Wizard a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You've earned my gratitude, and a 1000g reward. Now go.
Entries.112: ItemDelivery/A Favor For Clint/Clint got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals./Bring Clint an Iron Bar./Clint 335/-1/500/-1/true/Hey, it's the iron bar I asked for. It looks strong... perfect.#$b#Thanks, @. I appreciate this.
Entries.113: ItemDelivery/Robin's Request/Robin wrote to you asking for some hardwood./Bring Robin 10 pieces of Hardwood./Robin 709 10/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you brought it! I know I can always count on you, @.$h#$b#Mmhmm... This wood is perfect. It's exactly what I need. Thanks!
Entries.114: ItemDelivery/Fish Stew/Gus wants to make fish stew, but he needs an albacore./Bring Gus an Albacore./Gus 705/-1/400/-1/true/*sniff*...*sniff*... What's that? Something smells like albacore!#$b#Aha! You brought it! Thanks a million!
Entries.115: ItemDelivery/Fresh Fruit/Emily wants a taste of spring. She's asking for a fresh apricot./Bring Emily an Apricot./Emily 634/-1/600/-1/true/Oh... You followed through! Thanks, this looks delicious!$h
Entries.116: ItemDelivery/Granny's Gift/Evelyn wants to surprise her husband with a gift./Bring Evelyn a Leek./Evelyn 20/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, thank you, dear. This leek looks delicious. George will be so happy.#$b#He loves when I make eggs with leeks for breakfast.
Entries.117: ItemDelivery/Pierre's Notice/Pierre will pay "top coin" to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff./Bring Pierre some Sashimi./Pierre 227/-1/1000/-1/true/It's about time! I was starting to get the shakes, I wanted this fish so bad. *munch*... Mmm, now that's good.#$b#Thanks, @.$h
Entries.118: ItemDelivery/Aquatic Research/Demetrius is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one./Bring Demetrius a Pufferfish./Demetrius 128/-1/1000/-1/true/There you are. The specimen looks perfect. I'm going to get it on ice straight away. Thanks, @!
Entries.119: ItemDelivery/A Soldier's Star/Kent wants to give his wife a starfruit for their anniversary./Bring Kent a Starfruit./Kent 268/-1/500/-1/true/Hey. Shhh... Don't let Jodi see.#$b#Ah, this looks juicy. She'll love it. Thank you so much.$h
Entries.120: ItemDelivery/Mayor's Need/Mayor Lewis wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business./Bring Lewis a bottle of Truffle Oil./Lewis 432/-1/750/-1/true/You got the oil? Let me see...#$b#It's high quality... very slick. Great. Thank you.
Entries.121: ItemDelivery/Wanted: Lobster/Gus put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster./Bring Gus a Lobster./Gus 715/-1/500/-1/true/Something smells like fresh lobster. Oh, that's good.$h#$b#Take care, friend.
Entries.122: ItemDelivery/Pam Needs Juice/Pam's TV Remote is dead. She's having a tough time going back and forth between the couch and the TV dial./Bring Pam a Battery Pack./Pam 787/-1/400/-1/true/Hey, you pulled through with the battery pack! Thanks, kid... You're a life-saver!$h
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The Wizard is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring Wizard an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my gratitude. Now, leave.
Entries.124: ItemDelivery/Catch a Lingcod/Willy is challenging you to catch a Lingcod./Bring Willy a Lingcod./Willy 707/-1/550/-1/true/Hey, that's a real lunker! You've certainly got the angler's blood in you.$h
Entries.125: ItemDelivery/Exotic Spirits/Gus wants to make a Coco-no-no, but he's missing the main ingredient./Bring Gus a Coconut./Gus 88/-1/600/-1/true/Coconut! Now there's a soothing sight for my winter eyes.$h#$b#It's going to be perfect for my coco-no-no. Thanks!
Entries.126: ItemDelivery/Errand for your Wife/Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fiber for a secret project./Bring Emily 200 fiber./Emily 771 200/-1/0/-1/false/Oh, this looks perfect... and it's sustainably sourced, too! Thanks so much, @.$h#$b#Now, I've got my work cut out for me. It'll be a few more days before it's ready...
Entries.127: Basic/Haley's Cake-Walk/Your wife is organizing a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake./Enter Town on a sunny morning with a chocolate cake./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.128: SecretLostItem/.../.../.../Abigail 191 100 129/-1/0/-1/false/That necklace! Where did you find it?$7#$b#Well, thanks for bringing it to me, @. My mom will never know...$h
Entries.129: SecretLostItem/.../.../.../Caroline 191 50 128/-1/0/-1/false/What's this? My old necklace?$s#$b#That's strange, I didn't even notice it was missing... Well, thanks for bringing it back, @.$h
Entries.130: Basic/The Pirate's Wife/An old lady living on Ginger Island is asking you to find a keepsake of her husband's. She gave you an old photograph of a soldier that washed up on shore, hoping it would help in some way./Find a keepsake that belonged to Birdie's husband./-1/-1/0/-1/true

1.2: Kau mendapat surat dari wizard. Dia mengaku bahwa punya informasi mengenai bangunan community center.

2.2: Didalam sebuah kota misterius, kau menemukan catatan dengan sebuah perintah yang aneh. Disitu tertanda 'Mr. Qi'.
2.3: Taruh rainbow shell di dalam kotak di peron kereta api.

3.2: Kau menemukan catatan lain dengan tertanda 'Mr. Qi'.Kali ini perintahnya lebih aneh.
3.3: Taruh 10 beets ke dalam kulkas walikota Lewis.

4.2: Kau menemukan catatan aneh lain di dalam kulkas walikota. Kali ini, Perintahnya tidak jelas.

5.2: Kau menemukan catatan di mata naga pasir. Sepertinya petualangan mencari tahu kebenaran Mr. Qi telah selesai.

6.2: Jika kau ingin menjadi seorang petani, kau harus mengetahui dasar - dasarnya. Gunakan cangkulmu untuk meratakan tanah, lalu gunakan bibit pada tanah yang sudah diratakan untuk menanam tumbuhan. Siram setiap hari sampai tanamanmu siap untuk dipanen.

7.2: Robin, si tukang kayu, tinggal di bagian utara kota. dengan membawa uang dan material yang dibutuhkan, dia akan membangun bangunan baru di kebunmu. Kau butuh dia untuk membangun coop atau barn sehingga kau bisa mulai merawat hewan.

8.2: Setiap kau mendapatkan experience, kau akan mendapat resep crafting baru untuk menambah penghasilan dan mempermudah pekerjaan. Contohnya Scarecrow, item ini berfungsi untuk mencegah burung gagak mencuri tanamanmu.
8.3: Capai Farming level 1 dan craft sebuah scarecrow.

9.2: Akan menjadi langkah yang bagus jika kau mengenalkan dirimu pada penduduk kota. Beberapa orang mungkin ingin berkenalan dengan petani baru mereka.

10.2: Kau menemukan sebongkah copper ore. Kau tidak tahu apa gunanya, tapi mungkin seorang pandai besi tahu.
10.3: Bawa copper ore ke toko pandai besi Clint.

11.2: Jika kau suka menambang, kau butuh a furnace.

12.2: Dengan menggunakan furnace, kau bisa melebur beberapa logam. menurut petunjuk dari Clint, jika kau menaruh 5 copper ore dan 1 coal di dalam furnace, Furnance akan menghasilkan sebuah copper bar.
12.3: Gunakan your furnace untuk membuat Copper Bar.

13.2: Seseorang bernama Willy menyuruhmu untuk temui dia di pantai di bagian selatan kota. Dia bilang ada sesuatu yang ingin beri padamu.
13.3: Pergi ke pantai di bagian selatan kota sebelum jam 5:00pm.

14.2: Ada sebuah terowongan pertambangan di dalam gunung di utara kota. Kemungkinan banyak mineral yang berguna disana, tapi Marlon mengingatkan bahwa disana mungkin berbahaya.

15.2: Jika kau bisa mengalahkan 10 slime, kau akan diterima di Adventurer's Guild.

16.2: Kau berhasil mengalahkan 10 slime. sekarang kau bisa memasuki Adventurer's Guild.

17.2: Sepertinya lift tambang masih berfungsi. lift ini berfungsi untuk mengantarmu ke pintu lift yang telah kau temukan sebelumnya. Diperuntukkan untuk ekspedisi lantai bawah.

18.2: sejauh ini, tidak ada tanda - tanda dari lantai dasar tambang. sampai sejauh manakah?

19.2: Kau menemukan sebuah kunci aneh di lantai dasar tambang.

20.2: kau di tantang untuk pergi ke lantai 25 skull cavern. Kau akan dijanjikan hadiah yang menjanjikan jika behasil.

21.2: Marnie datang ke kebunmu dan memintamu untuk mebawakannya sebuah cave carrot. Dia ingin mengajari kambingnya berbicara, dan cave carrot adalah makanan kesukaan kambingnya.

22.2: Jodi datang ke kebunmu dan mengajakmu makan malam jam 7:00 PM.Dia memintamu untuk membawakannya seekor largemouth bass untuk masakannya.
22.3: Masuk ke rumah Jodi dengan membawa largemouth bass saat jam 7:00 PM.

23.2: Kau menemukan sebuah benda yang terlihat kuno. Apakah ini sebuah artifak peningglan zaman dulu? Mungkin Gunther, si penjaga musium, punya jawabannya.

24.2: Gunther memintamu untuk medonasikan artifak atau mineral baru yang kau temukan ke musium. Dia bilang dai akan memberimu imbalan untuk beberapa donasimu.
24.3: Donasikan artifak atau mineral ke musium.

25.2: Memberi hadiah adalah cara terbaik untuk mempererat pertemanan. Cari tahu hal - hal yang disukai setiap orang dan tidak lama kau akan menjadi populer.

26.2: Ada sesuatu hal aneh yang terjadi di Community Center...

27.2: Ada goblin yang menghalangi jalan ke arah Witch's hut. pasti ada satu cara agar dia bisa pergi... Mungkin aku harus mencari informasi lebih tentang Goblin.

28.2: Wizard memintaku untuk mengambil tinta ajaib dari rumah mantan istrinya... tapi untuk ke sana aku butuh dark talisman.
28.3: Masuki sewer dan tanya pada Krobus tentang dark talisman.

29.2: Kau menemukan catatan, sangat sulit dibaca, meminta untuk membawakan "seerrop meepaal" ke "seecrit wuds".

30.2: Kau menemukan catatan yang berbunyi, "Seseorang menunggumu di lantai 100 Skull Cavern"

31.2: Kau melihat figur misterius mencurigakan di tempat bis. Saat figur itu melihatmu, ia lari kearah kota. Dimanakah ia berada?

100.2: Robin kehilangan kapak kesayangannya. Terakhir kali dia mengingat menggunakannya, pada saat dia memotong kayu di sebelah selatan peternakan Marnie.

101.2: Jodi butuh cauliflower segar untuk resep masakan yang dia buat. Dia memintamu untuk membawakannya satu.

102.2: Walikota Lewis kehilangan "celana" ungunya. Dia memintamu untuk menemukan dan mengembalikkan celana tersebut padanya... Secara rahasia.
102.3: Cari dan kembalikan celana ungu Lewis.

103.2: Pam sangat ingin meminum pale ale. Dia tidak ingin bir yang biasa. Kau bisa membuat pale ale jika kau punya buah Hops dan sebuah keg.

104.2: Demetrius membutuhkan melon segar untuk penelitiannya.

105.2: George butuh hot pepper untuk meringankan pegal pada lututnya.

106.2: Marnie ingin memberi sapinya perawatan spesial. Dia memintamu seikat amaranth.

107.2: ini adalah musim blackberry, tapi Linus tidak bisa menemukan keranjangnya! Dia memintamu untuk menolongnya untuk menemukan keranjang itu. Dia tidak tahu dimana letak keranjang itu sekarang.
107.3: Temukan keranjang Linus lalu kembalikan padanya.

108.2: Caroline ingin mengukir sebuah labu berama putrinya. Dia memintamu untuk membawakannya sebuah labu dari kebunmu.

109.2: Willy menantangmu untuk menangkap seekor a squid. Dia bilang kau bisa menangkapnya di laut saat malam musim.

110.2: Clint ingin kau memberi Emily sebuah amethyst. Dia ingin kau bilang pada Emily bahwa itu darinya.

111.2: Wizard ingin kau masuk ke tambang dan mengambil Void Essence untuknya. Dia bembutuhkan benda itu untuk mantra gelapnya.

112.2: Clint dapat sebuah palu baru dan dia ingin mengetes palu itu dengan logam yang bermacam - macam.

113.2: Robin memintamu untuk membawakannya beberapa hardwood.

114.2: Gus ingin memasak ikan rebus, tapi dai butuh sebuah albacore.

115.2: Emily ingin merasakan buah musim semi. Dia meminta darimu sebuah apricot segar.

116.2: Evelyn ingin memberi kejutan untuk suaminyadengan sebuah hadiah.

117.2: Pierre akan membayarmu "top coin" untuk siapapun yang membawakannya sashimi. Tampaknya Pierre benar - benar mengidamkan sashimi.

118.2: Demetrius sedang mempelajari tingat racun pada pufferfish. Dia ingin kau membawakan satu untuknya.

119.2: Kent ingin memberi istrinya starfruit untuk merayakan ulang tahun pernikahan mereka.

120.2: Walikota Lewis ingin sebuah truffle oil. Dia tidak menjelaskan untuk apa. Mungkin itu bukanlah urusanmu.

121.2: Gus mengeluarkan selebaran dan disana dia meminta siapa saja yang bisa memberinya lobster segar.

122.2: Remot TV Pam rusak. Saat menonton dia harus - bolak balik dari sofa ke TV hanya untuk mengganti channel.

123.2: Wizard sedang membuat tongkat dengan kekuatan dahsyat. Tak ada yang tahu untuk apa dia membuatnya. Dia butuh iridium bar untuk menyelesaikannya.

124.2: Willy menantangmu untuk menangkap ikan Lingcod.

125.2: Gus ingin membuat Coco-no-no, tapi dia tidak punya bahan utamanya.

126.2: Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fiber for a secret project.

127.2: Your wife is organizing a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake.
127.3: Enter Town on a sunny morning with a chocolate cake.

130.2: An old lady living on Ginger Island is asking you to find a keepsake of her husband's. She gave you an old photograph of a soldier that washed up on shore, hoping it would help in some way.
130.3: Find a keepsake that belonged to Birdie's husband.

Entries.Robin: Hey there!^I had some extra wood lying around... I thought maybe you could use it. Take care!  ^   -Robin %item object 388 50 %%[#]A Gift From Robin
Entries.Demetrius: Dear @,^I was conducting a field study the other day, and I found this specimen. ^I hope you find it as interesting as I did.    ^   -Demetrius%item object 392 1 394 1 132 1 66 1 %%[#]A Gift From Demetrius
Entries.Linus: Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -Linus %item object 136 1 143 1 202 1 227 1 228 1 %%[#]A Gift From Linus
Entries.Pierre: Dear valued customer,^Thanks for visiting 'Pierre's'! Enclosed is your 'Cash-back Rewards Program' rebate. See you soon! ^   -Pierre^  P.S. Sorry for the stock message, @. Enjoy! %item money 250 601  %%[#]A Gift From Pierre
Entries.Caroline: Dear @,^Here's a vegetable from the little garden I keep out back. You probably have more veggies than you know what to do with, but oh well.   ^   -Caroline%item object 190 1 192 1 24 1 %%[#]A Gift From Caroline
Entries.George: Found some good quality stone. ^Maybe you can build with it or something.  ^   -George %item object 390 35 %%[#]A Gift From George
Entries.Evelyn: Hello there, dear,  I hope your farm is doing well.^ I'm sending you a little something from my kitchen... I hope it didn't crumble in the mail.  ^   -Evelyn  %item object 216 1 220 1 223 1 %%[#]A Gift From Evelyn
Entries.Pam: Hey. ^I found this in a drawer somewhere. Thought you could use it.   ^   -Pam %item object 346 1 349 1 787 1 %%[#]A Gift From Pam
Entries.Lewis: @,^I'm really glad you've become part of our community! I've enclosed a 500g check from the Stardew Valley Agricultural Fund to help you continue your good work. ^Maybe you can buy some more seeds with it.  ^  Sincerely, Mr. Lewis%item money 500 501 %%[#]A Gift From Lewis
Entries.Gus: @!^I made you a little treat this morning in the saloon. Dig in!   ^   -Your friend, Gus%item object 224 1 213 1 211 1 207 1 200 1 195 1 198 1 %%[#]A Gift From Gus
Entries.Clint: Um, Hello...     ^Sorry, I'm not good at writing letters. I made one metal bar too many, and I thought you might need it.  ^   -Clint, the blacksmith %item object 334 1 335 1 336 1 %%[#]A Gift From Clint
Entries.Jodi: Dear @,^I ordered too much fertilizer for the garden!! I bet you can put it to some good use. Take care!  ^   -Jodi %item object 368 5 369 5 370 5 %%[#]A Gift From Jodi
Entries.Kent: Hello, @.^This item was collecting dust in the toolshed. I figured you might be able to use it.  ^   -Kent%item object 286 1 287 1 288 1 787 1 %%[#]A Gift From Kent
Entries.Emily: Hi!^How are you doing? I hope you enjoy the gift I've sent you... Well, goodbye! +   ^   -Emily %item object 397 1 428 1 440 1 %%[#]A Gift From Emily
Entries.Marnie: Dear @,^You're such a good neighbor I thought I'd send over some animal feed to make your job easier. Keep it up! ^   -Marnie %item object 178 30 %%[#]A Gift From Marnie
Entries.Shane: Hey,^I thought it would be fun to send you a letter. I don't really know what to write, though.^ Here, I've enclosed a treat for you. Don't tell anyone, but I snagged this from the back room of JojaMart ages ago.^Okay, see you soon. ^   -Shane %item object 215 1 206 1 %%[#]A Gift From Shane
Entries.Wizard: Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard%item object 422 1 82 1 84 1 70 1 %%[#]A Gift From the Wizard
Entries.Sandy: Greetings from Calico Desert!^Come visit me soon, I'm really bored out here :(. I've included a gift from the desert. You can come and thank me in person!   ^   -Sandy %item object 88 1 90 1 218 1 %%[#]A Gift From Sandy
Entries.afterSamShow: @,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -Sam[#]Sam's Thank-you Note
Entries.afterArtShow: Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Leah[#]Leah's Thank-you Note
Entries.haleyGarden: @,^I thought it would be fun to write you a note.^ I had so much fun with the cows yesterday... I'm starting to understand why you chose the farmer's life! Hope to see you soon.  ^   -Haley[#]Haley's Note
Entries.PennyCleanTrailer: Sorry about what happened at my place yesterday... My mom can get into bad moods sometimes.^Please just forget it happened.  ^   -Penny[#]Penny's Apology
Entries.Duck: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise chickens, so I'm now selling ducks at my shop!       ^   -Marnie[#]Ducks For Sale!
Entries.Rabbits: Dear @,^I now have rabbits in the animal shop! They will provide you with fluffy wool ...and more!       ^   -Marnie[#]Rabbits For Sale!
Entries.Sheep: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise cows, so I'm now selling sheep at my shop!       ^   -Marnie[#]Sheep For Sale!
Entries.Goats: Dear @,^I now have goats available for purchase at the animal shop. You've done well so far!       ^   -Marnie[#]Goats For Sale!
Entries.Pigs: Dear @,^You've come a long way since you first arrived. As a result, I've decided to start selling pigs at my shop. These pigs are trained at finding gourmet truffles!       ^   -Marnie[#]Pigs For Sale!
Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's hand in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Lewis[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.Bouquet: @,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're romantically interested, you've got to give them one of my beautiful flower bouquets. I'm selling them now, for a very fair price! If you want to start a family someday, this is the first step! ^   -Pierre[#]About Bouquets
Entries.RobinCooking: Dear @,^here is an old recipe that my grandma passed down to me. Enjoy!   ^   -Robin%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Robin's Family Recipe
Entries.DemetriusCooking: I wanted to say 'thanks' for taking an interest in my work. Here's a cooking recipe that I like. ^   -Demetrius%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Demetrius' Recipe
Entries.LinusCooking: @,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -Linus%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Linus' Recipe
Entries.PierreCooking: TOP SECRET:^Here's the recipe for my famous blueberry tart.^Don't tell anyone! I'm giving it to you because we are such good friends. ^   -Pierre%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Pierre's Famous Tart
Entries.CarolineCooking: Dear @,^nothing is more satisfying than cooking with fresh vegetables from your own garden! I've enclosed a recipe to help you out. Take care, ^   -Caroline%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Caroline's Recipe
Entries.GeorgeCooking: Figured I'd give you this recipe I had laying around. Try not to burn it. ^   -George%item cookingRecipe %%[#]George's Recipe
Entries.EvelynCooking: Dear @,^I usually don't give out my recipes... but since you've been such a sweetheart to George and I, I've written this one down for you. ^   -Evelyn%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Evelyn's Recipe
Entries.PamCooking: Hey Kid,^here's the recipe for a little treat my pappy used to make. Cook it slow. ^   -Pam%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Pam's Recipe
Entries.LewisCooking: @,^remember to eat healthy, or you won't have enough energy to work hard! I'm including one of my favorite recipes. Make sure to use ripe tomatoes! ^   -Lewis%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Lewis's Recipe
Entries.GusCooking: Dear @,^Here's a recipe from my saloon. I only share this with my good friends! ^   -Gus%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Gus's Recipe
Entries.ClintCooking: Well, I know a couple of recipes.^I thought I'd send you one... maybe it'll help you mine more ore or something.^Take care. ^   -Clint%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Clint's Recipe
Entries.JodiCooking: @,^this recipe of mine won 1st place in a cooking competition! I hope you like it. Thanks for being a friend! ^   -Jodi%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Jodi's Recipe
Entries.KentCooking: Picked up this recipe overseas. Enjoy.^Want to say thanks for making me feel welcome. ^^   -Kent%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Kent's Recipe
Entries.EmilyCooking: @!^Flip this letter over for instructions on how to make a super-healthy meal!^You'll feel energized. See you soon. ^   -Emily%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Emily's Healthy Recipe
Entries.MarnieCooking: Dear neighbor,^when I'm not taking care of animals I like to experiment in the kitchen. Since we've become friends I want to share some recipes with you.^I hope you like this! ^   -Marnie%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Marnie's Recipe
Entries.ShaneCooking: @,^I found this recipe in a magazine and I thought it sounded interesting. Feel free to give me a taste if you make it. hehe. ^   -Shane%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Shane's Recipe
Entries.SandyCooking: Dear @,^I was so bored out here in the desert that I wrote you a letter. There's a recipe for a delicious soup enclosed. Come visit me soon! ^   -Sandy%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Sandy's Recipe
Entries.WillyCooking: Dear @,^I'd like to share an ol' cooking recipe my pappy used to make. It's important the fish is FRESH.  ^   -Willy%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Willy's Ol' Recipe
Entries.mom1: Dear @,^  How are you doing, sweety? I've missed you so much since you left. I hope the farming life is everything you hoped for. ^   Love, Mom.   ^   P.S. I sent your favorite cookies < %item object 223 1 %%[#]From Mom
Entries.mom2: Dear @,^  It's been so long since I heard from you, dear. Things are the same as ever back home. I miss you very much. ^  Love, Mom ^ P.S. Found an envelope with some money Grandpa left for you. %item money 500 501 %%[#]From Mom #2
Entries.mom3: Dear @,^  I saw an article about you in the local paper! It sounds like the country life is a good fit for you! I'm so proud of you. Take care, sweety. Love, Mom[#]From Mom #3
Entries.mom4: Dear @,^ How are things going? You must really be making a fortune on that farm. Don't forget your dear old mother when you're a millionaire! ^  Love, Mom   ^   P.S. Enjoy the cake!%item object 221 1 %%[#]From Mom #4
Entries.dad1: Dear @,^  Have you settled into your new life yet? I can't believe you're all grown up now... Time sure flies. Now that you're gone I have all this extra money laying around, so I included a little gift.^  Love, Dad.%item money 500 501 %%[#]From Dad
Entries.dad2: Dear @,^  How is the country life going for you? It's been lonely here without you, but I'm proud of what you're doing.^  Love, Dad  ^  P.S. Found an envelope with some money Grandpa left for you. %item money 500 501 %%[#]From Dad #2
Entries.dad3: Dear @,^  I read an article about you in the local paper! I'm so impressed with your progress on the farm! Keep this up and dear old Dad might be retiring in a fern islands luxury bungalow after all ;).^  Love, Dad[#]From Dad #3
Entries.dad4: Dear @,^ I know you're busy on the farm and that's why you can't visit. I understand. You've been working so hard... keep it up and you can accomplish anything! ^ Love, Dad  ^  P.S. Included some quality stone %item object 390 30 %%[#]From Dad #4
Entries.newsstory: Greetings, @.^It is our pleasure to inform you that your farm will be featured in next week's 'up & coming' column of the Stardew Valley Tribune! Congratulations. We're impressed with your quick progress. ^   -SVT[#]News Story
Entries.pierreBackpack: ADVERTISEMENT:^"I keep finding cool stuff, but my backpack is full!"^^Does this sound like you? Well, Pierre's got you covered!^^Stop by Pierre's General Store TODAY and check out our affordable size 24 backpack!^ See you soon![#]Backpacks From Pierre's
Entries.pierreHours: ADVERTISEMENT:^^Pierre's General Store is now open 7 days a week![#]Pierre's Extended Hours
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^I'd like to apologize for joking about your Grandpa's old cottage when we first met. It's really a nice little house!^^However, you might need some more space someday. That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house.^(Continued on next page)^^The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^    Your local carpenter,^        Robin[#]Robin's Services
Entries.taxPassed: Dear @,^the shipping tax passed. As of today, a 3% tax will be deducted from all your shipping profits. The reduced fee for public services is also in effect. See you soon! ^   -Mayor[#]Tax Approved
Entries.taxRejected: Dear @,^the shipping tax was rejected. Your shipping profits will remain as they are. Fees for public services will remain the same as well. See you soon. ^   -Mayor[#]Tax Rejected
Entries.quest10: @,^I've heard you've been giving some people a hand around town! Everyone seems really thankful. I'm awarding you this month's "Best Neighbor" award (with a small cash prize). Keep it up! ^   -Mayor%item money 500 501 %%[#]Best Neighbor
Entries.quest35: Dear @,^You've been such a help around town since you moved here... everyone keeps telling me all the wonderful things you've done for them! Please accept this thank-you prize. ^   -Mayor%item money 2500 2501 %%[#]Thank-you From Lewis
Entries.quest100: @,^I am pleased to announce that you've been chosen as "Neighbor of the year"! That comes with a 10,000g prize! Congratulations! Everyone in town wants to say 'thanks' for all you've done. ^   -Mayor%item money 10000 10001 %%[#]Neighbor Of The Year
Entries.hero_update: @,^it's time for the quarterly Stardew Hero rankings! I've enclosed them in a separate envelope. Good luck this season!  ^   -The Mayor[#]Stardew Hero Rankings
Entries.CF_Fish: Dear @,^ Your angling skills surpass even my ol' Pappy's... I'm impressed. ^ This stardrop's been passed down from Willy Sr. to Willy Jr. for... oh, heck. Prob'ly a thousand years.^Seein' as I don't have any kids... I want you to have it.^^ -Willy   ^  %item object 434 1 %%[#]Willy's Family Heirloom
Entries.adoptionLetter: Dear @ and spouse,^Congratulations! Your adoption application has been approved.^We're working hard to choose the perfect baby to match your profile.^Your new family member will arrive in 2 weeks.^^-Ferngill Adoption Agency[#]Adoption Notice
Entries.stardewHeroMine: Secret Message: If you can reach the bottom of the mines one more time, a secret awaits you. Be careful, the mines have become more dangerous.[#]Secret Message
Entries.fertilizers: Dear neighbor,^I hope you are feeling settled in your new home. I am writing to let you know that Pierre's store is now selling fertilizers! Why don't you swing by and see if you can afford a few dozen boxes or so?  ^   -Pierre[#]Pierre's Fertilizers
Entries.fertilizers2: Dear @,^I am now selling higher quality fertilizers, as well as new crop selections! See you soon. ^   -Pierre[#]Pierre's High Quality Fertilizers
Entries.abbySpiritBoard: Hi @.^One of these days you should come to my room after dark... Maybe around 8pm. ^I want to show you something. ^   -Abby[#]Abby's Note
Entries.pennySpa: Meet me in the bath house after dark. ^   -Penny[#]Penny's Note
Entries.incubator: Dear @,^^Thank you for purchasing a coop upgrade! In addition to doubling the capacity of your coop, I've taken the liberty of installing an incubator. ^To use the incubator, simply place an egg inside. If you have space left in your coop, the egg will hatch in several days!^^As always, thanks for your business.^-Robin[#]About The Incubator
Entries.hatter: Hi.^^Me sell hats. Okay, poke?^^Come to old old old haus, poke. Bring coines.^^-hat mouse[#]Hiyo, Poke
Entries.Beat_PK: Congratulations!!^^You beat 'Journey Of The Prairie King', and were randomly selected in our exclusive winner's sweepstakes! ^You've won a Prairie King Arcade System of your very own!^Now you can enjoy 'Journey Of The Prairie King' from the comfort of your own home.^^You deserve it!^-Prairie King Development Team %item bigobject 141 %%[#]P.K. Congratulations!
Entries.JunimoKart: Congratulations!!^^You beat all the levels in 'JunimoKart'... you're actually the first person in the entire Ferngill Republic to do so!^Your prize: a home version of Junimo Kart!^^Have fun!^-Junimo Kart Development Team %item bigobject 159 %%[#]Junimo Kart Success!
Entries.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -Elliott[#]Elliott's Reading
Entries.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -Elliott[#]Elliott's Note
Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -Harvey[#]Harvey's Surprise
Entries.samMessage: @,^meet me in front of my house tonight after dark. ^   -Sam[#]Sam's Note
Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -Alex[#]Alex' Invitation
Entries.lewisStatue: @,^^In the future, I'd appreciate it very much if you refrained from placing my PRIVATE belongings in town for all to see!^^I'm very displeased!^^Take this money and never speak of my 'project' to anyone.%item money 750 751 %%[#]Lewis' Angry Letter
Entries.marnieAutoGrabber: @,^I've got a new item in stock... It's called the "Auto-Grabber".^^This thing can milk your cows and goats, shear your sheep, gather eggs, and pluck your wooly rabbits... all on its own!^^It's considered a 'luxury item', so I'm charging 25,000g.^^    -Marnie[#]Auto-Grabber Notice
Entries.EmilyClothingTherapy: @,^I have this crazy new idea that I want to involve you in... It's called "Clothing Therapy".^^Please come to the Mayor's house today to see what it's all about.^^ Love, Emily[#]Emily's Idea
Entries.EmilyCamping: @,^Let's go camping! ^^ Meet me in the secret woods after 10pm.^^ Love, Emily[#]Emily's Invitation
Entries.EmilyDoneCamping: Thanks for joining me last night... I had a great time.^I'm actually glad that bear showed up!^^See you soon^^  Love, Emily[#]Emily's Note
Entries.foundLostTools: Dear @,^Someone dropped your tools into the lost and found bin last night.^^Stop by the mayor's office to pick them up. ^^  -Mayor Lewis[#]Lost Tools
Entries.fishing2: I've got some new items in stock...^A deluxe fishing pole and some bait that you can attach to it!^You can use bait to make fish bite faster. Hope to see you soon! ^   -Willy[#]Willy's New Items
Entries.fishing6: Come by the shop and check out the new rods I'm selling.^They're the best money can buy... and you can customize them with different kinds of tackle!^Hope to see you soon! ^   -Willy[#]Willy's New Items #2
Entries.wizardJunimoNote: My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My chambers are west of the forest lake, in the stone tower. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 1 true %%[#]Wizard's Summons
Entries.winter_18: Dear @,^I would like to give you some information about an upcoming event: the Feast of the Winter Star. It's a time for the community to come together and think back on all the good fortune we've had this year.^A favorite tradition is the "secret gift exchange", where everyone in town is randomly assigned to someone else. On the day of the festival, everyone brings a gift for their secret friend and surprise them with something special!^This year, your secret friend is:^    %secretsanta ^Don't tell anyone! The feast will take place on the 25th from 10AM to 2PM at the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Secret Gift-Giver
Entries.ccBulletinThankYou: Dear @,^Everyone around town has been talking about your great generosity lately!^Apparently, packages have been appearing in people's houses containing items they posted about years ago on the community center bulletin! And the packages are all addressed from your farm!^Thanks for going out of your way to do something like that... all of us in town are delighted! ^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Bulletin Board Thank-you
Entries.guildQuest: I see you've been exploring the old mine. You've got the adventurer's spirit, that much I can tell.^If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in my adventurer's guild. ^Be careful.    -Marlon %item quest 15 true %%[#]Quest To Slay Slimes
Entries.skullCave: I see you've entered the Skull Cavern. Well done.^I've got a better challenge for you, kid. Make it at least 25 levels deep. I've got a mountain of $ to send if you can do it.^  Your friend, Mr. Qi %item quest 20 %%[#]Qi's Challenge
Entries.robinWell: Robin here!^I know there's a lot of stone scattered around your farm.^If you have a surplus, you might consider having me build a well for you.^Wells can be placed all over your farm, and serve as convenient places to refill your watering can.^^Just swing by my shop with 75 stones and 1000g when you're ready for it.^-Robin[#]Build A Well
Entries.landslideDone: To our valued JojaMart customers:^Our team members have removed the landslide caused by our drilling operation near the mountain lake. I'd like to remind you that our drilling operation is entirely legal (pursuant to init. L61091, JojaCo Amendment). Responsible stewardship of the local environment is our top priority! ^^We apologize for any inconvenience this accident may have caused.^As always, we value your continued support and patronage!^^-Morris,^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Removed Landslide
Entries.QiChallengeComplete: You did it.^ I'm very impressed.^ Enjoy your reward.^   -Qi. %item money 10000 %%[#]Qi Challenge Complete
Entries.spring_2_1: Hello there,^Just got back from a fishing trip. You should come down to the beach some time.^I've got something for ya.^-Willy %item quest 13 true %%[#]Willy's Invitation
Entries.spring_12: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're holding the Egg Festival in the town square. ^^You should arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to attend.^You wouldn't want to miss the annual egg hunt!^  -Mayor Lewis[#]Egg Festival Notice
Entries.spring_15_1: Hello, dear...^^I know you're just getting started as a gardener, so I wanted to give you a little tip.^^Most crops only grow in one season. When summer arrives, your spring crops will all die out. So plan ahead!^^-Granny Evelyn[#]Evelyn's Tip
Entries.spring_23: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all getting together for the Flower Dance.^^If you can find a partner, you might even want to participate in the dance yourself!^There's a little clearing beyond the forest west of town where we hold the dance. Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you're interested.^  -Mayor Lewis[#]Flower Dance Notice
Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Luau.^^The highlight of the event is the communal potluck. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Luau Notice
Entries.summer_28: Dear @,^Tonight at around 10 o'clock PM, a rare and beautiful event will take place.^^The moonlight jellies will be passing by Pelican Town on their long journey south for the winter.^^We're all gathering at the beach to watch. You don't want to miss this!^See you tonight,^ -Demetrius[#]Dance Of The Moonlight Jellies
Entries.fall_9: Dear @,^One week from today, we are holding the Stardew Valley Fair in the town square!^It's the biggest event of the year, drawing people from all across the country to our humble town.^If you'd like, you can set up a grange display for the event. Just bring up to 9 items that best showcase your talents. You'll be judged on the quality and diversity of your display.^The fair starts at 9 AM... don't miss it!^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Stardew Valley Fair Notice
Entries.fall_15: Dear @,^I just want to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening tomorrow.^Don't forget to bring your 9 items for the grange display.^Remember, the fair starts at 9AM in the town square. See you there!^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Stardew Valley Fair Reminder
Entries.fall_26: Dear @,^Notice a chill in the air? It could just be the approach of winter...^Or it could be the tingle of a dark specter, here to help us celebrate tomorrow's festival... the Spirit's Eve.^Come to town at 10 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis[#]Spirit's Eve Notice
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering in front of Marnie's house for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor Lewis[#]Festival Of Ice Notice
Entries.winter_14: Starting tomorrow, a traveling merchant fleet will dock at Pelican Town for the yearly night market.^^The market starts at 5pm, and will be in port for the next three days.^^Please visit the beach after 5pm to join the festivities. There's free coffee![#]Night Market Notice
Entries.spring_11_1: MISSING:^I lost my favorite Axe! If you find it, please return ASAP. I'm having a tough time without it. There's 250g in it for whoever finds the thing.^   -Robin%item quest 100 %%[#]Robin Lost Her Axe
Entries.spring_19_1: Farmer @-^I have a request for you. I need fresh cauliflower for a recipe I want to make. Could you bring me one?^   -Jodi%item quest 101 %%[#]Jodi Asks For Cauliflower
Entries.summer_3_1: @-^This is embarrassing... I lost my lucky purple shorts. I'm telling you because I think I can trust you.^If you find them, bring them back to me DISCREETLY. I'll pay well.^Thanks.^   -Mayor Lewis%item quest 102 %%[#]Lewis Asks For A Favor
Entries.summer_14_1: Hey Kid,^My throat's about as dry as a desert bone. I'm real thirsty for a pale ale. You got one? Regular old beer won't do. I need a pale ale.^   -Pam%item quest 103 %%[#]Pam's Request
Entries.summer_20_1: @-^I'm gathering data on the correlation between soil alkalinity and crop fructose levels. Long story short, I need a fresh melon from your farm. If you brought me one I'd be very grateful.^   -Demetrius%item quest 104 %%[#]Demetrius Asks For A Sample
Entries.summer_25_1: To Farmer @:^My knee's acting up again, and you know what helps? ^Rubbing the darn thing with hot pepper.^ Trouble is, my supply's run dry. If you've got one to spare I'd be much obliged.^   -George %item quest 105 %%[#]George Needs A Pepper
Entries.fall_3_1: Dear @,^I'd like to give my cows a special treat. They're such good girls and hungry, too. Could you bring me one bunch of amaranth? They love the stuff. ^Thanks, Dear.^   -Marnie %item quest 106 %%[#]Marnie's Request
Entries.fall_8_1: Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -Linus%item quest 107 %%[#]Linus Lost His Basket
Entries.fall_19_1: @-^I'd like to buy a pumpkin from you. My daughter and I want to carve a jack-o-lantern for the upcoming Spirit's Eve festival. ^   -Caroline%item quest 108 %%[#]Caroline's Request
Entries.winter_2_1: Hey, I've got a little challenge for you:^    Catch me a squid.^You can fish them from the ocean at night. They only show up in the winter, though.^   -Willy%item quest 109 %%[#]Willy's Challenge
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -Clint %item quest 110 %%[#]Clint's Unusual Request
Entries.winter_12_1: @-^I am researching the forgotten art of shadow divination. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 111 %%[#]Wizard's Request
Entries.winter_17_1: @,^Sorry to bother you again, but I need another favor.^I got a new hammer and I want to try it on a variety of metals.^Could you smelt an iron bar and bring it to me? ^Thanks.^ -Clint %item quest 112 %%[#]Clint's Request
Entries.winter_21_1: @-^How are you doing? Hope the winter hasn't been too hard on you.^Anyway, I'm writing to ask you for some hardwood. I need about ten pieces, if you've got it.^If not, no worries. Take Care!^  -Robin%item quest 113 %%[#]Robin's Request
Entries.winter_26_1: Dear @-^I want to make fish stew, but I need an albacore! I know they're almost out of season... sorry about the short notice. Could you catch one for me?^   -Gus%item quest 114 %%[#]Gus Needs A Certain Fish
Entries.spring_1_2: Notice:^^The price of raw materials at Robin's shop and Clint's shop has increased.[#]Raw Material Price Notice
Entries.spring_6_2: @-^I'm really craving a fresh apricot. I haven't been able to find one at the store, so I'm asking you. I'll pay you well for it!^   -Emily%item quest 115 %%[#]Emily's Request
Entries.spring_15_2: Dear @,^I'd like to surprise my husband with a gift. He's a big fan of leeks. Could you bring me one?^   -Granny Evelyn%item quest 116 %%[#]Evelyn's Surprise
Entries.spring_21_2: NOTICE^Pierre here... I really, really want a plate of sashimi. I'll pay top coin to whoever brings me some.^   -Pierre%item quest 117 %%[#]Pierre's Craving
Entries.summer_6_2: Fisherman Wanted^I need a good pufferfish specimen. I'm conducting an experiment on the toxin created by the pufferfish.^Reward: 1000g^ -Demetrius%item quest 118 %%[#]Demetrius' Study On Toxins
Entries.summer_15_2: Dear Farmer @,^I'd like to give my wife a starfruit for our anniversary. Are you growing any on your farm? If you brought me one, I'd be very grateful.^   -Kent%item quest 119 %%[#]Kent Needs A Gift
Entries.summer_21_2: @,^I need truffle oil. Don't ask me why.^ -Mayor Lewis%item quest 120 %%[#]Lewis' Request
Entries.fall_6_2: Wanted: 1 Fresh Lobster for a marvelous bisque I'm creating.^Who: Gus, proprietor of the Stardrop Saloon^Reward: 800g %item quest 121 %%[#]Gus Needs Lobster
Entries.fall_19_2: NOTICE^Does anybody have one of them battery packs? My TV remote died, and it's a real hassle getting off the couch to change the station.^  -Pam%item quest 122 %%[#]Pam Needs Help
Entries.winter_5_2: @,^I'm creating an enchanted staff of phenomenal power.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -M. Rasmodius, Wizard %item quest 123 %%[#]Wizard Needs A Rare Item
Entries.winter_13_2: I've got another challenge for you: Catch me a Lingcod.^They don't go down easy, but I know you can do it.^  -Willy%item quest 124 %%[#]Willy's Challenge #2
Entries.winter_19_2: Dear @,^I'm at my wit's end. I desperately want to make a Coco-no-no at the saloon, but I have no way of getting a coconut!^Can you help me?^  -Gus%item quest 125 %%[#]Gus Needs A Coconut
Entries.winter_24: Dear @,^Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star.^Did you get a gift for your 'secret friend'... %secretsanta?^The feast starts at 9 AM in the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Feast Of The Winter Star Reminder

A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^Since you have no money, we were obligated by law to provide this service free of charge.^^-Morris^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Legally Required Notice
Entries.passedOut2: @, ^You're lucky I found you last night! You were unconscious, and someone was searching your pockets. I have no idea how much money they took... they ran away as soon as I approached. Be more careful!^^-Linus[#]Note From Linus
Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}g to cover your medical expenses.^^-Dr. Harvey[#]From The Office Of Dr. Harvey
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Since you have no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Dr. Harvey[#]Harvey's Free Medical Service
Entries.passedOut4: @, ^^Found you face-down in the mud during my 3:00 AM sweep.^^You should try to make it home a little earlier next time!^^     -Marlon[#]Note From Marlon
Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, Elliott^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted Elliott, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've travelled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 6
Entries.MarlonRecovery: @,^Found your lost item.^^Be more careful next time!^   -Marlon%item itemRecovery %%[#]Marlon Found Your Item
Entries.RarecrowSociety: Dear @,^^Your dedication is truly impressive...^^Only a select few manage to acquire the complete Rarecrow collection!^^Please accept this blueprint to commemorate your achievement.^   -The Z.C. Rarecrow Society%item craftingRecipe Deluxe_Scarecrow %%[#]From The Rarecrow Society
Entries.CarolineTea: Dear @,^^Thanks for stopping by my sunroom yesterday. I usually drink tea alone, but it was fun to share with you!^^I've enclosed instructions on how to prepare and grow your own tea. No pressure, but if you do end up growing some, make sure to bring me a cup!^^-Caroline%item craftingRecipe Tea_Sapling %%[#]Caroline's Tea Note
Entries.WoodChipper: Hey @,^^Just wanted to let you know about a new item I'm carrying... it's called a 'Wood Chipper'.^^You can use it to break hardwood into several pieces of regular wood!^^I know wood can be hard to come by in the winter, so if your supply gets low, consider picking one up.^       -Robin[#]Wood Chipper Notice
Entries.willyBackRoomInvitation: @,^^I've unlocked the back room of the shop.^Come by when you have a chance.^There's something I want to show you.^^-Willy[#]Willy's Back Room Invitation
Entries.KrobusCrafting: @, I'm not sure how the human message system works, so I asked Wizard to help me write this letter.^^I hope you are doing okay.^^I wanted to share this with you... it's notes on how my people build a certain item.^^   -Krobus%item craftingRecipe Dark_Sign %%[#]A letter from Krobus
Entries.georgeGifts: Dear @,^^Thank you so much for the leeks. They look fresh and delicious. George will love them.^^Today, I'm going to surprise him with 12 little gift-wrapped treasures (thanks to you!). Stop by if you want to be there!^^-Evelyn^^P.S. Please accept this gift. I think you'll enjoy it!%item bigobject 246 %%[#]Evelyn's thank-you note
Entries.robinResource: Hey @,^^Congratulations on completing my little challenge. I'm impressed!^^As an added bonus, I've included the blueprints for a new type of chest. Enjoy!^^-Robin^^^^P.S. -- Now that you have all those resources laying around, why not swing by for some construction work?%item craftingRecipe Stone_Chest %%[#]Robin's Resource Rush
Entries.ClintReward: Um, Hello...     ^Thanks for helping me clear out those monsters.^^I'm not scared at all! ...But it should make the mines safer for everyone else... right?^^Take this blueprint. (Hope it doesn't make me obsolete...)^^   -Clint, the blacksmith%item craftingRecipe Geode_Crusher %%[#]Clint's Thank-you
Entries.ClintReward2: Um, Hello...     ^Thanks for helping me clear out more monsters.^^Maybe next time, I'll take care of them myself... if I have time!^^Take this item. I found it in the back room...^^   -Clint, the blacksmith%item object 286 10 287 5 231 3 %%[#]Clint's Alternate Thank-you
Entries.MSB_Pierre: Dear @,^^I guess people didn't take to 'Pierre's Prime Produce' like I'd hoped...^^Anyways, here's my old 'Mini-Shipping Bin'.^The next time you get your hands on some produce worthy of the 'Pierre's Prime' luxury brand, maybe you could have them shipped my way?^^   -Pierre%item bigobject 248 %%[#]Pierre's Prime Produce
Entries.MSB_Lewis: @,^I wanted to thank you for taking care of my special order. All of the hard work you've done has been a great boost to Pelican Town's image.^Here's a 'Mini-Shipping Bin' as a token of my appreciation.^Place it anywhere and I'll be sure to make a stop when I make my rounds.^^   -Lewis%item bigobject 248 %%[#]Lewis's Thank You
Entries.WizardReward: The specimen you delivered offered great insight into the machinations of the fell beings we call 'monsters'.^^I've formulated a pungent tincture that these beings find intoxicating. Use it with caution...^^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard%item craftingRecipe Monster_Musk %%[#]The Wizard's Discovery
Entries.WizardReward2: Thanks to the ectoplasm you delivered to me, I've made a major breakthrough in the field of arcane engineering.^^Enclosed, you'll find blueprints for a most useful machine...^^   -M. Rasmodius, Wizard%item craftingRecipe Mini-Obelisk %%[#]The Wizard's Breakthrough
Entries.DemetriusReward: Hi @,^^Thanks for your help with the fish.^Nature is usually good at keeping things balanced, but sometimes artificial factors can cause an imbalance.^^I've enclosed a blueprint from a science magazine that you might find interesting.^^-Demetrius%item craftingRecipe Farm_Computer %%[#]Demetrius' Thank You
Entries.willyHours: Good news!^^The ol' boat is seaworthy once again, thanks to you!^^Stop by the back room whenever you want a ride.^^My shop is now open at 8AM every day, so you can get an early start.^^-Willy[#]Willy's Boat

Entries.pamNewChannel: Hey kid,^^Thanks for the 'juice'. It definitely had a ...one-of-a-kind... flavor.^^By the way, have you ever tuned in to channel 736? It's a seasonal fishing program that you might find interesting.^^Take care,^-Pam[#]Pam's Tip
Entries.emilyStones: Hi @,^^Thanks again for the wonderful gemstones.^These will be perfect for my energy re-alignment work!^I wanted to thank you with this special gift. I hope you create some wonderful items with it!^^-Emily%item bigobject 247 %%[#]Emily's Gemstones

Entries.WillyTropicalFish: @,^^Congrats on a successful island fishing trip. I'm proud of ya!^^Here, take this special fish tank. It'll make a great piece in your house.^^-Willy%item furniture 2312 %%[#]Willy's Tropical Challenge

pierreHours.0: IKLAN:^^Toko Pierre kini buka seminggu penuh!

robinKitchenLetter.0: Hai peternak @,^^Aku mau minta maaf sudah bercanda soal rumah kakekmu saat pertama kali bertemu. Itu sungguh rumah kecil yang bagus!^^Bagaimanapun juga, kau mungkin butuh ruang lebih suatu hari nanti. Disitulah aku bisa membantumu. Jika kau membawakanku bahan baku dan membayar biaya, Aku bisa memperluas rumahmu.^(Baca di halaman selanjutnya)^^Ekspansi pertama yang kutawarkan itu meliputi dapur. Dengan dapur, kau bisa memasak dengan resep yang kau pelajari!^^Namun demikian, Kuharap kau mulai betah di Stardew Valley!^^ Tukang kayu-mu,^ Robin

taxPassed.0: Halo @,^pajak pengiriman diberlakukan. Pada hari ini, seluruh hasil keuntungan pengirimanmu akan dipotong 3%. Pemotongan biaya untuk pelayanan publik juga berlaku. Sampai jumpa lagi! ^ -Walikota

taxRejected.0: Halo @,^pajak pengiriman telah ditolak. Keuntungan pengirimanmu akan tetap seperti semula. Biaya untuk pelayanan publik juga akan tetap sama. Sampai jumpa lagi. ^ -Walikota

quest10.0: @,^Kudengar kau sering memberi hadiah kepada beberapa penduduk setempat! Semua orang tampaknya benar-benar berterima kasih. Aku akan menghadiahimu penghargaan "Tetangga Terbaik" bulan ini (dengan hadiah uang). Lanjutkan! ^ -Walikota%item money 500 501 %%

quest100.0: @,^Aku sangat senang bisa mengumumkan bahwa kau telah terpilih sebagai "Tetangga Terbaik Tahun Ini"! dengan hadiah 10,000g! Selamat! Semua orang ingin mengucapkan 'terima kasih' atas semua yang kau lakukan. ^ -Walikota%item money 10000 10001 %%

winter_18.0: Halo @,^Aku ingin memberi informasi tentang acara yang akan datang: the Feast of the Winter Star. Ini waktunya bagi masyarakat untuk datang bersama dan mensyukuri keberuntungan yang kita dapatkan pada tahun ini.^Tradisi yang paling kita sukai "secret gift exchange" dimana semua orang di kota ini memberikan hadiah kepada seseorang secara acak. Pada hari saat festival, semua orang harus membawa hadiah spesial untuk teman rahasia sebagai kejutan!^Tahun ini, teman rahasiamu adalah:^ %secretsanta ^Jangan beritahu siapapun! Pesta akan diadakan di alun-alun pada tanggal 25 dari jam 10 pagi sampai jam 2 siang. Sampai jumpa nanti! ^ -Walikota Lewis

ccBulletinThankYou.0: Halo @,^Belakangan ini semua orang di kota membicarakan tentang kemurahan hatimu!^Sebelumnya, bingkisan muncul di rumah-rumah penduduk. Bingkisan-bingkisan tersebut berisi barang yang mereka tulis beberapa tahun yang lalu di papan buletin Community Center! Dan semua bingkisan tersebut ditujukan dari peternakanmu!^Terima kasih sudah repot melakukannya... kami semua sangat senang! ^ -Walikota Lewis

guildQuest.0: Kulihat kau sudah menjelajahi tambang tua. Kau memiliki jiwa petualang.^Jika kau bisa membunuh 10 slime, kau akan mendapatkan tempat di Adventurer's Guild. ^Hati-hati. -Marlon %item quest 15 true %%
